reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: I am student at IIITDM Kancheepuram.

detailed_review.Placements: From my knowledge, Chennai has high opportunities. If we know things like coding languages, we can take the help of the professors and build two to three projects, then apply for the internships. On average, people will get 6 LPA - 9 LPA package. I heard from seniors that he got a job that pays Rs 20,000 - Rs 30,000 per month.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel is fine, and they will clean the washrooms daily. They will also clean the floors. The quality of food and taste is also okay but once or twice every 2 weeks, the mess food is not that much tasty and well prepared. They will provide high-protein foods like paneer and dal. For right now, there is no chicken curry for free so we have to pay the bill. Sports are available like cricket, football, badminton, volleyball, basketball, cricket, chess, carrom, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, and some of the faculty explain one concept from two to three point of view for the better understanding of the students. There will be timings for the faculty availability in a week so if we have any doubts, we can approach them. Some of the teachers are very friendly if we behave properly with them.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Smart Manufacturing
reviews.review_title: Excellent infrastructure and friendly campus vibe.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rate for B.Tech in smart manufacturing is reported as 28.6% ongoing. According to last year 2024, a much higher figure was indicated, with 73% of smart manufacturing batch placed. The highest package offered is 12.2LPA in 2025, average package offered is 6.75LPA in 2024, and the lowest package offered is 6LPA, according to 2024 data. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Adobe, Samsung, Google, Virtusa, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Lecture halls are technologically equipped to support dynamic discussions. Group discussion and interview room support placement activities. The entire campus, including the academic blocks and hostels Wi-Fi is enabled. LAN connections are also available in hostels. We have advanced department labs.  The institute has specialized labs across disciplines.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are supportive, and they are helpful to the students too much. Every faculty member is highly talented and knowledgeable. Everyone has done Ph.D. in their respective courses. The teaching quality is excellent, and they are using the smart boards when required and projector for slides. They often use the blackboard for better understanding of the students. They are giving homework, assignments, and projects to make a real-type prototype for every project.
detailed_review.Other: I chose smart manufacturing at IIITDM Kancheepuram because it is one of the first institutions in India to offer this unique program that blends Mechanical Engineering with Electronics, Computer Science, and Data Analytics. The course is closely aligned with Industry 4.0, which focuses on automation robotics, IoT, and AI in manufacturing. I wanted to gain interdisciplinary knowledge and skills that would prepare me for the future of modern industry.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Everything is good, faculty is .

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate is 80%, the highest package is 45 LPA, and the lowest is 9 LPA. AMD, Intel, Google, startup companies, JPMorgan, and some others are among the top recruiting companies. For campus placement, I can give an average rate of about 80%, with two roles being VLSI engineer, electronic design engineer, and some others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I can give 4 stars, which is more than enough. Classrooms and library, I can give 4-4.5. The mess is below average. The medical facility is good. Sports and games, I can give 4.5.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are supportive. They are knowledgeable, and the course curriculum makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not too hard; you can pass easily. The pass percentage is 98%, which depends on the student. If they try, they can easily get 8.5, which is good.
detailed_review.Other: I took this course because I like dealing with hardware and VLSI, mainly for the skills. There is only one fest, which lasts about 5 days: "Samghatha." Don't expect much; extracurricular activities are average.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's a good college to study if you have a lower rank to join NITs.

detailed_review.Placements: 35 LPA is the highest. I don't know the lowest package. Overall average placements. Many students do internships, such as a paid internship, because they are important and a good thing. The ECE department is good here, and you can be taught by good lecturers, except that some of them are common.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Small rooms for freshers. Building a new one until then, average rooms. Food is good. Sports are the best thing in college. Wi-Fi is not available in the hostel rooms, whereas you get Ethernet, which does not often work properly, but you can get Wi-Fi in college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, except for some. Exams' difficulty is medium to hard. For one semester, they conduct a mid-term and a final exam. One semester only lasts for 70 days here, i.e., 70 working days. Teachers are all highly qualified.
detailed_review.Other: Events are not up to the mark. Scholarships are available in all colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Mess food is below average.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% is the placement rate. The highest package is 45 LPA, and the lowest is 9 LPA. AMD, Intel, Google, startup companies, JPMorgan, and some others come for campus placement. I can give an average of about 80%. Roles offered are VLSI engineer, electronic design engineer, and some others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi (Ethernet) is, I can give 4 stars more than enough, classrooms and library I can give 4-4.5 stars, mess is below average, medical facility is good, sports and games I can give 4.5, sometimes they have Ethernet access. There is one canteen in college, and the price is affordable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are supportive. They are knowledgeable. The course curriculum makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not too hard, you can pass easily. The pass percentage is 98%. It depends on the student if they try, they can easily get 8.5, which is good.
detailed_review.Other: I took this course because I like dealing with hardware and VLSI, mainly for skills, only fest is there, which is about 5 days. Samghatha, don't expect much, extracurricular activities are average.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Indian Institute of Information Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The maximum number of students in my college have joined the CSE course. It now has one of the most job offers. Many students have joined through JEE Main or EAMCET. The highest package was 40 LPA, and the lowest package was 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have the best infrastructure provided by the government. We have nice AC classrooms and AC hostel rooms. We have Wi-Fi available here all the time. We also have so many libraries here and so many labs for doing experiments. We have so many varieties of food items here
detailed_review.Faculty: The best faculty are placed here. They are well-trained and well-educated professors. Their teaching skills are very nice, and we absolutely understand what they teach. This course is completely relevant to software companies and not about industries. The semester is more difficult, even some faculty members cannot find the answers for the exam paper.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Management is responsible, and I won't recommend this institute. Join other IIITs and NITs.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package is just 32 LPA, relatively lower than many other IIITs. The highest stipend is 1.1 LPA by Amazon. ECE has 62.5% placement rate, and 32 LPA is the highest salary. Average would be around 12 LPA. In CS AI the highest is 32 LPA. 71% is the placement rate. In mech, the highest is 12.5 LPA, and 70.5 is the placement rate. In some, the highest is 12.5 LPA, and 60% is placement rate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Library is small and closed on Sunday. Wi-Fi works only in the academic block, and it won't work in hostels. Classrooms are limited and small. Lab is just a waste of time. Food is the worst in my opinion. No proper hygiene, and the institute will not claim its mistake. There is no lighting on campus, and water in hostels will stop at 11:00 AM. No one cares about you.
detailed_review.Faculty: Coming to teachers, they have degrees but they cannot teach well. You cannot understand things because of the way of teaching. Curriculum has design courses that you feel are very useless at this point and waste a lot of time. Semester exams are not difficult, they are easy but they won't test your caliber.
detailed_review.Other: Coming to the events part, this institute is too boring and many festivals are ignored and not given any priority even though they are the major festivals. Finding an education loan is a bit difficult i.e., contacting management is difficult. They have to change the system of the institute. It won't encourage students to research and feed them with classes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering + M.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering (VLSI Design)
reviews.review_title: It's good for everything, but it offers average packages only.

detailed_review.Placements: Yearly, around 80% students are placed, some go to higher education also. In dual degree VLSI, the lowest package is 10LPA, the highest is 30 LPA, and the average is 17 LPA. According to the highest package, recruiters are from AMD, and companies like Nvidia also come for recruitments.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, library, and everything is good, you can participate in many sports, and the gym is also there. Washing machines are available in hostels, everything is good, labs and infrastructure are also good. I recommend you come to this beautiful campus. The campus is so good and hostels are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: To say about the exam, they are between moderate and hard, depending on the subject. Teachers are qualified from reputed institutions. I promise you they are always supportive and encouraging. The course curriculum is good, which helps you a lot. Semester difficulty is between moderate and tough.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: IIITDM Kancheepuram is an overall package that is good for academics and cultural events.

detailed_review.Placements: I think in the previous year, about 60-70% of students got placed. The highest package offered is around 20 LPA, and the average package is 11 LPA. The lowest package is 6 LPA. We received recruiters from AMD, etc. About 80% of students got internships from different courses in companies like AMD, Microsoft, etc. Roles like VLSI design engineer, embedded system engineer, and software AI ML are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In IIITDM Kancheepuram with respect to the ECE department facilities, labs are well-equipped and teachers are knowledgeable. The hostel has a LAN facility, and the library has a good Wi-Fi facility. The hostel rooms are provided with necessities, but the only issue is that it is a bit congested on one half of the hostel block for boys. The food provided is decent, there is no non-veg menu but it can be accessed by purchasing a separate token for it. Medical facilities are good. Sports are top-notch.
detailed_review.Faculty: The institute offers a strong academic foundation with an industry-relevant approach. Faculty members are PhD-certified professors from IITs. They encourage students to participate in research and projects. Semester exams are decent if we are active during college hours.
detailed_review.Other: I am passionate about electronics so I chose ECE and IIITDM Kancheepuram. It has a lot of future scope in semiconductors. It is decent and no need for improvements with current faculty members. In IIITDM Kancheepuram, there is a balance between extra cultural and academic life. With participation in clubs, we can create a great network with people.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: Placements are good, faculty members are not very good but okay. Food is not good.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, 61% of students got placed. The highest salary is 32 LPA, average salary is 13 LPA. However, top package offering companies select very few people. This year Visa and Contentstack give the highest package of 32 LPA. Companies like Mathworks, AMD, Oppo, KLA, and Equinix are also high-paying recruiters of above 20 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are good some are bad (last floor). Hostel fee is compact. Medical facilities are good enough. There are 2 basketball courts, 5 badminton courts, 2 large grounds, one for cricket, one for football, 2 volleyball courts, 1 table tennis, and a kabaddi court. We also have kho-kho court and 2 table tennis courts. We have a large gym and indoor games are available like carrom and chess.
detailed_review.Faculty: Not all teachers are good. But it's okay as long we keep learning. Exams can be easy to difficult, we can't predict. Grading will be relatively (depending on class average) so it doesn't matter. Pass marks are average 2. Just taking the course alone doesn't help a lot we have to put more effort into self-improving skills.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CS AI because I always wanted CSE and I thought AI would be great. Events are also good. There are many clubs to join and explore our interests.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: Noteworthy placements, good infrastructure, and some good faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, more than 88% were placed. The highest is 14 LPA, the lowest is 5.5 LPA and the average is 12.95 LPA. The major recruiting companies are Gameskraft, Zoom, Mathworks, and KLA. From the numbers, we can observe most of the packages entered about 12LPA without much deviation. Top roles offered are full sack developed, AI/ML engineer, data scientist, and software engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Unlike many other colleges in IIITDM K students are required to use LAN in hostels which can be inconvenient sometimes. The library is just like any other library you might have come across. There is a separate building with 2 floors of library and other floors connection labs. Then about classrooms, all classes are not the same. Some have ACs while others don't. The messy food is nothing to worry about. There is a medical center open all the time. In sports and games, IIITDM K has been the leading winner for the past many years.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. The content of any class will be basic but if you ask any questions they will go deeper into the subject. It has been decided that the batch of 2029 will be given a new curriculum which is good. The difficulty of sem exams depends on your required grade, for getting an 8 is easy while a 9 might be tough. The pass percentage is around 40%.
detailed_review.Other: Talking about fest it is better than any other it's in terms of budget. There are many clubs you can choose from, but you have to pass their entrance test conducted at the end of 2nd sem. The surroundings are good because you can get any food required and fun activities like swimming. There are also scholarships based on your grades and your requirements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of IIITDM Kancheepuram - Indian Institute of Information Technology Design & Manufacturing.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements in our college were very good in previous years but in a few years the average package became less and now the college is trying more to bring more companies. The college is also offering a placement exam which helps us in the interview and the club present in it is very useful for getting a good job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is great, very close to nature and it is very peaceful. The hostel is good with great facilities. The only problem is the weather is a bit harsh, as it is Chennai. The college buildings and hostel buildings are very nice they are great.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum of our college is taken from IITS which is very great, some of the subjects like design are also included which are very engaging. The only problem is in the first year the curriculum is common to all branches which makes non-core subjects to read but it helps in the branch change, over 2nd year. The curriculum is very nice and only involves the core subjects.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) + M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, a considerable college for good campus life. Best in creative and innovative ideas.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a good percentage of students get placed, nearly 70–80% in my branch. The top companies that come for recruitment at our college are Visa, Goldman Sachs, Flipkart, MathWorks, Infosys, and many more. The highest package offered is 35 LPA, the lowest is 9–10 LPA, and the average is 20 LPA. Around 75% of students get internships and PPOs in companies like Amazon, Infosys, Flipkart, Qualcomm, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our campus is really good in terms of infrastructure, with spacious hostel rooms and 2 students per room. In our department, classrooms are huge and well-maintained. The hostel mess is also comparatively good. We have two messes that are well maintained with hygienic food and clean plates. They ensure cleanliness in the mess and provide both South Indian and North Indian dishes in both messes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-educated and highly graded from top universities. They are very helpful and easily approachable to students. The teaching quality is average. Some courses are not helpful for your branch and are just for credit completion, but some are really relevant and make students industry-ready. The semester exams are of average difficulty, if you prepare well for academics, you can easily pass all courses. Around 95% of students get easily pass. Faculty members are well-educated and support students in their courses.
detailed_review.Other: The reason I chose this course is because I have always have an interest in it. The best thing about this course is the good placement in my branch. The attendance in my course is nearly 85%, which I think must be reduced. Apart from this, everything is fine. Events and fests are really less comparatively, and the campus crowd is less. However, connectivity is good, and the college has an easy transport system. Scholarships are also provided. There are many clubs on campus that provide both knowledge and entertainment.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: The infrastructure is good, but placements are average.

detailed_review.Placements: The number of students eligible this year is 31 and 20 offers are made by recruiters. 62% of students get placed in the CSE-AI course but in CSE IT, 86% of students get placed. The highest package offered is 32 LPA for 4 students including CSE and CSE-AI branches by Visa. The average package is 13.86 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Amazon, Google, Capgemini, Trimble, AMD, Samsung, etc. Top roles like AI research scientist, data scientist, machine learning engineer, etc., are offered to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We should really appreciate the infrastructure of laboratories, but classrooms have a very weak Wi-Fi connection. The library is a bit small. Cafeteria food is actually not so good. I have fallen sick too. Mess food is appreciable but the saddest part is we need to pay extra for non-veg, which costs around Rs. 30. Medical facilities are good with free treatment for all common illnesses and health camps too. Sports and games are also given importance with large grounds but playing equipment is less even in a gym too. We have an ATM, xerox shop, and ultimate store with all basic needs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very knowledgeable, but few lack communication and teaching skills in theory. Labs are handled by teaching assistants who are students of M.Tech. Courses here will provide a strong base for our knowledge but we need to build as there is a lot more to learn. There are sociology courses too which help us understand the industry, product marketing, designing, etc. Exams are actually difficult as they will be of higher standards but the grading system here is relative in which a student's performance depends on his coursemates too.
detailed_review.Other: Events are nice with good organisation. There are many clubs like mars, the developers club, the autonomous underwater vehicle club, Google development club, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I made a good decision by joining it. It has a good college life and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Compared to other batches, computer science course students get more placed in better companies. In the last year (2024), nearly 80% of students got placed from both on-campus and off-campus selections with an average salary of 7 LPA from our course. The highest package is 32 LPA. Most of them get or do internships by their 4th year-end.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is built on a total of 52 acres in which there are 4 hostels, 1 academic block, 1 laboratory block, 1 mess, 1 cafeteria, 1 sports complex, 1 provisions store which is more than enough for the campus students. The total strength is nearly 2500. we have access to Wi-Fi in all the places where buildings are there. It has good medical facilities. The mess food is average but all other things are above average. Some workers maintain the college campus regularly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified. They have good knowledge of the subject. They all have secured their PhDs from IIT or NITs but sometimes lack in explaining. The course curriculum is relevant and helps us develop skills and prepare for further studies. It does not make us completely industry-ready but we should learn some external skills and be prepared. Semester exams are difficult but grading is given relatively and pass percentage is also relative.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of IIITDM Kancheepuram.

detailed_review.Placements: My course is computer science and engineering. It has the highest package of around 34 LPA, and the average package is about 12 LPA. We get internships from many companies and the placement rate in my college is around 90% which is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have 24-hour Wi-Fi in our college with a LAN connection. We have a 24-hour water supply in our college. The quality of the food is quite decent, not bad. We have many sports stadiums like cricket stadium, football ground, and badminton ground.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in the college are very good and nice. They teach very good and are highly qualified professionals. Course curriculum in our college is mostly relevant to the present software industry and semester exams in our college are quite difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose computer science and engineering course and this course is the best in the college and has the best placement in the college. I wish that separate holiday to be given while doing the course project.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure as it is constructed in 2007.

detailed_review.Placements: Students who apply for placements, around 80-90% of students, will be placed. The highest package is around 55 LPA, and the average is around 15 LPA, with the lowest being 9 LPA. Amazon, Accenture, Deloitte, Cazio, etc., will visit. Around 80% of students will get internships. They will get through related courses like AI, ML, etc. Randomwalk, Accenture, will recruit.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is nice. There will be Wi-Fi facilities in every building. The institute itself provides it. There will be a separate building for labs with 5 floors. The library is also available. You will be provided with geysers, and TV rooms are available in the hostel. The quality of food is good, and you will have chapathi every day, so there is no problem for North students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty has done their Ph.D. from IITs, so all are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Yes, the course curriculum is relevant. The curriculum makes the student industry-ready. The mid and end-semester exams are somewhat difficult, and professors will check the knowledge of what you learned in the course. Questions will test your understanding.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in Computer Science, mainly the Artificial Intelligence field, so I selected this course. It would be better if they focused mainly on the artificial intelligence field. There are three fests—Samgatha, Vashist, and Meraki—conducted once every year. Students can explore themselves in the clubs. For SC and ST students, no academic fees are required. No EWS scholarships are applicable.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering + M.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering (VLSI Design)
reviews.review_title: A brief review on IIITDM.

detailed_review.Placements: At present, there are no placements in IITs also. The highest package in our college is 54 LPA. The average package in our college is 12 LPA. In my course, the top companies are Nvidia, Snapdragon, etc. Maybe the percentage of placements may increase at our graduation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a separate laboratory complex for labs. It has 6 floors and contains more than 40 labs, like for coding, Verilog, VHDL, embedded systems, etc. Classrooms have in-built central AC systems and can hold up to 180 students per class. Wi-Fi is available everywhere in the academic block and in the hostel. The food quality is a bit low, and the taste is different when compared to our food. All types of games are available to learn and play.
detailed_review.Faculty: When it comes to faculty, I am a bit not satisfied with them. Because some of the faculty fail the students intentionally and keep them writing until their graduation years. Yes, the course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. If we start reading from the beginning of college, the semester exams will be top. As time moves, it becomes difficult.
detailed_review.Other: My course is an ECE dual degree in VLSI. This specialization allows me to work on chipsets like processors graphic cards, etc. The faculty should change their mindset of stopping the students from graduating. There are mainly three fests: Miraki, Smagatha, and Freshers.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Outstanding faculty and great experience at IIITDM KANCHEEPURAM CSE.

detailed_review.Placements:
Good placements and the best companies are there. 
70%–80% percent were placed according to previously placed batch. The highest package for CSE department is about 25,00,000, and the lowest package is around 8,00,000. You will get the best experience at this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The IIITDM Kancheepuram is best known for its infrastructure and here we will have 1 girls hostel and 2 boys hostel, which are 13 floors each. And per room 2 for 1st,  2nd, and 3rd years, and at the final year, you may get single rooms for each.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty and the curriculum in the IIITDM KANCHEEPPURAM are very good, and the exam pattern and the syllabus for the exams are fully dependent on the faculty. There will be one midterm and one endterm for both lab and theroy exams. There will be no difficulty in semester exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty and management of the college.

detailed_review.Placements: In the college around 40-45% of the students gets placed for our course. The average package offered at this college was between 3-4 LPA. Top recruiting companies were TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Philips etc. Students were getting internship opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good infrastructure for our course. The college has Wi-Fi, labs, a library, canteen, hostel, sports, medical etc. Facilities for its students. All these facilities were properly maintained by the college management. The college offers all the modern facilities to the students for the best quality of learning.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the college were helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. The quality of the teaching was good. The course curriculum of the IIITDM was relevant and also made the students industry-ready. Semester exams at our college were not hard to pass and the pass percentage was 80%.

college_info.college_name: IIITDM Kancheepuram IIITDM Kancheepuram Admission 2025: Cutoff, Fees, Eligibility & Application

faqs.question: What is the qualification for IIITDM?
faqs.answer: The overall qualification for IIIT Kancheepuram is twelve years of school education. Candidates can find below the course-wise qualification for IIITDM: Class 12 with a minimum 75% aggregate BE/BTech in relevant subject with a minimum 60% aggregate Graduation with a minimum 60% aggregate Master's degree with a minimum 50% aggregate *This information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What BTech specialisations are offered at IIITDM Kancheepuram?
faqs.answer: Tabulated below are the BTech specialisations offered at IIITDM Kancheepuram along with the integrated cousres: Specialisation in BTech

faqs.question: What is the rank of IIITDM Kancheepuram for BTech?
faqs.answer: The National Institute Ranking Framework (NIRF) which evaluates and ranks colleges and universities based on various crucial factors has awarded the IIITDM Kancheepuram a rank band of 151-200 in the Engineering category in 2025. IIITDM Kancheepuram is counted amongst the top Engineering and design Institutions established by the Ministry of HRD, Government of India. The institute offers UG, PG and doctoral-level programmes in the fields of Engineering, Design, Sciences and many other streams.

faqs.question: Is it worth joining IIITDM Kancheepuram for BTech?
faqs.answer: The institute has maintained a decent placement record for BTech. During 2025 placements, 113 job offers were made to BTech studenst and the highest package stood at INR 31.64 LPA. The following table depicts the IIIT Kancheepuram BTech placement details for 2025: Students can also check below infographic for IIITDM Kancheepram reviews by students on Shiksha for its BTech course:

faqs.question: What rank should I score to get a seat for B.Tech at IIITDM Kancheepuram?
faqs.answer: IIITDM Kancheepuram accepts DASA UG score for the admission to BTech courses. IIITDM Kancheepuram current admission are scheduled to be announced in 2025. Meawhile, the IIITDM Kancheepuram cutoff 2023 was ranged from 412 to 954 for the General AI category candidates. As per the cutoff data, we can assume that for the upcoming session, the required rank will stand between a range of 300 to 900 . And, for the BTech in CSE specifically, candidates have to acquire a rank nearly at 500.

faqs.question: What M.Tech specialisations are offered at IIITDM Kancheepuram?
faqs.answer: Listed in the table below are the specialisations offered at IIITDM Kancheepuram under the M.Tech programme:

faqs.question: What is the cutoff for IIITDM Kancheepuram in 2025?
faqs.answer: Round 1 IIITDM Kancheepuram GATE cutoff 2025 is out for students who appeared for the exam. For students in the General AI category, the score ranged from 350 to 483 , with M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Artificial Intelligence) emerging as the most competitive MTech specialisation followed by M.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering (Microelectronics and VLSI Systems) .Candidates can refer to the table below to view the IIITDM Kancheepuram GATE cutoff 2025 across different M.Tech specialisations

faqs.question: Is there any minimum eligibility requirement for IIITDM Kancheepuram M.Des admission?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates seeking admission to the Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design and Manufacturing, Kancheepuram M.Des course need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria. To be eligible for IIIT Kancheepuram M.Des admission, candidates must have a bachelor's degree in Engineering/ Design/ Architecture (under 10+2+4 years regular) with a minimum aggregate of 60% (55% aggregate in case of SC/ ST/ PwD) or equivalent grades in the qualifying degree.

faqs.question: How to get admission at IIITDM Kancheepuram MDes course?
faqs.answer: Admissions at IIITDM Kancheepuram for the MDes course is decided on the candidates performance in the CEED entrance exam. To be eligible to appear for the CEED entrance exam, candidates need to have at least 60% marks in their bachelor's degree and fill out an online application form from the official website of the university.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: IIITDM Kancheepuram provides various facilities for students. The campus is residential and provides the following accommodation to all its students.
Check out more details in the below videos:
list: Library:The institute has a central library with a large and diverse collection of books by international and national authors.
Hostel:This facility is available for boys and girls. The hostel room is equipped with a reading table, a chair, and a cot.
Dining and Shopping:The facility of dining and shopping is also available in the campus.
Medical Aid Centre:Medical assistance is available 24x7 for all the residents. The institute has also tie-ups with nearby hospitals.
ATM:An Indian Bank ATM and e-launch service facility are available for the residents.

data.description: IIITDM Kancheepuram has more than 80 faculties in the departments of Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Sciences and Humanities, Mathematics, Physics, English, and the School of Interdisciplinary Design and Innovation. Most of these faculty members have PhD degrees from the Indian Institute of Technology.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 96 published reviews , 87 reviews are verified.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about IIITDM Kancheepuram - Indian Institute of Information Technology Design & Manufacturing

likes.text: Some top companies visiting the campus for recruiting are GOOGLE, Cognizant, TVS, TECH MAHINDRA, L&T, TCS, MICROSOFT, APPOLO TYRES and many others.
Mandatory internship in the pre-final year helped students to get more placement offers as pre placements.

likes.text: Wi-Fi facility, Ethernet, computer labs, electronics labs, design labs, mechanical labs, library, outdoor sports and indoor games are available here.
The hostel rooms are spacious and every student is provided with a table, cot, chair, and cupboard.

highlights.summary: Institute of Aeronautical Engineering (also known as IARE) is a private institute, established in 2000 in Hyderabad, Telangana. IARE is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 23 courses at UG and PG levels in 11 specialisations such as Aeronautical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering and Computer Science Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and BBA in Full Time mode. IARE fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 76,000 to 3,60,000. IARE has an annual seat intake of 1212 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. As per the recent IARE placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 4,62,727. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

IARE Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Aeronautical Engineering (Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: The college is furnished with high-standard furniture and digital classrooms.

detailed_review.Placements: 80–90% of students are placed in my course every year. In 2025, the highest placement at IARE is 61 LPA, offered by Microsoft. The average package is 8 LPA. Many top companies recruit here, including Microsoft, IBM, Capgemini, L&T, TCS, Deloitte, and J.P. Morgan. The courses offered include CSE, AIML, IT, Cybersecurity, and Aeronautical Engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College provides a rich environment with a green and clean campus. Wi-Fi is throughout. Classrooms and library are top-notch. Labs are furnished with high-quality desktops and processors. Labs are fully equipped. They maintained regularly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in academics and co-curricular activities. The curriculum at IARE is designed to build industry-relevant skills. There is a placement and training center that helps students improve and upskill. The semester is not very easy, but we can clear it if we study well.
detailed_review.Other: The college is excellent for those who really want to work in the industry.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It is good for study, strict sometimes.

detailed_review.Placements: Most students are placed well. The highest package is 60 LPA. Companies like Microsoft, Amazon, and Juspay come for hiring. Microsoft offers the highest package, with two students placed at 60 LPA and 5 students at 54 LPA, and so on. Overall, the placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good and well-maintained. As it is near the outer area, traveling is a bit harder. All the rooms and facilities in the college are maintained well. For games and sports, there is a separate block for indoor games, open from 3 PM to 5 PM. The canteen is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is good, and their dressing style is well maintained. They wear blazers while teaching. Teaching is friendly and interactive. Projects are given to students for better understanding, and good skills can be learned. The BT23 pass percentage is high.
detailed_review.Other: Events are conducted, but not as good as expected.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: According to my rating, I will rate my college 4/5, the facilities and infrastructure are good.

detailed_review.Placements: I am Nirosh. Students who got placed in the course are 50/100 percent. On our campus, the highest package is 21LPA, as far as I know. The top recruiting company are cognizant, many of the students got internship from your course in central institute of tool design and as well as cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are good but some of the facilities are not up to the mark. I am a day scholar, and I do not know about the food and the other stuff. The canteen in college is well cleaned and they provide quality food with hygiene.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the facilities are helpful and knowledgeable. Some teachers are top notch. The course curriculum is most relevant but not fully industry ready. The semester exams in the college are quite medium.  Some facilities are not very good in their lectures.
detailed_review.Other: Apart from the studies the college provides hackathons and they also provide a startup to support our ideas. The college does not have proper grounds for the sports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Great learning experience with strong placements and supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: **Placements:** 90-95% of students are placed every year. CSE specializations, including AIML, usually have the highest placement rate in the institute. The highest package: 54 LPA. The lowest package is 3-3.5 LPA. Around 70-80% of students in the AIML branch received internships. IARE is recommended for good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: High-speed campus-wide Wi-Fi is accessible in classrooms, labs, libraries, and common areas. Dedicated AI & Machine Learning Labs, Data Science Labs, and Programming Labs are equipped with high-performance systems. Air-conditioned seminar halls are available for presentations and workshops. Thousands of books on AI, ML, Data Science, CSE, and core engineering.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the AIML department are highly qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. Many faculty members hold Ph.D. degrees and have strong expertise in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. They are approachable, supportive, and encourage students through doubt sessions.
detailed_review.Other: IARE hosts multiple cultural and technical events such as Ignite, Samshodhana, and Teach fests, along with hackathons, coding competitions, and project expos.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I chose this branch as it's trending now. Events are few, but when done, they do it nicely.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college placements are okay only. Before many companies were coming, but now little less. The highest salary they told was around 60 LPA, and the minimum mostly stays near 2 LPA. Average also comes around 5 LPA only. Big companies like Amazon, Flipkart, congnizant, tcs, lummen had come earlier, so if we work properly, we still have chance. I don? T know much about job roles, mostly teach or branch side only. Around 50?60% students get placed before finishing graduation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Library in our college is big only, with many books and place to sit and study. Teachers mostly use PPTs because classrooms have SMART TVs and are quite spacious. College also does different workshops, clubs, and some outdoor sessions. Wi-Fi is there on every floor and block, so network issue comes less, but sometimes internet becomes slow. Overall, the infrastructure is good only.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some exam papers come easy, some medium, and few become little tough also, because our own department prepares them. Corrections they mostly do themselves, and final checking goes to JNTU side. Many teachers in our college have 10+ years experience, so teaching is good and they clear doubts when we ask. But some teachers only finish the syllabus fast-fast and go, not much interaction. Overall, faculty is trained and qualified.
detailed_review.Other: Events in our college don? T happen very often, but whenever they do, they conduct them very nicely only. I chose this branch because right now it is one of the most trending branches in engineering graduation. So I felt it will give good future chances.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement rate and nice infrastructure and facilities besides some loopholes.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rate is 80 percent. If you are capable, you can get placed with a good package. CGPA is also important to get a good placement. The highest package is 51 LPA and average package is 4-7 LPA. Recruiting companies are Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, Microsoft, Amazon, Accolite, Tata Technologies, IBM, Deloitte, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms, labs, and library are well-equipped with systems, digital teaching, and books available. Campus hostel is at MLrit 1st campus. Buses are provided. Food is also good. Wi-Fi is there but in some areas it's slow, and ACs are there but usually not used.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semesters are okay but sometimes they schedule 2 exams per day; it's so stressful. Other than that, all okay. Main thing is there is no cheating in exams. Very strict. If you are caught by appropriate things in the exam hall, action will be taken seriously. Every examination hall is under CCTV surveillance. Faculty are also well-qualified. Course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry ready.
detailed_review.Other: Fests (traditional day, annual day, DJ NIT (often), freshers, etc.). Don’t hope too high but you can enjoy. Events (technical events like hackathons and webinars and some extracurricular events like art and craft, idol making, etc.). Once in a year they conduct sports and games competition in the college. And there are different types of clubs like Rhapsody (music), Plus (dance), Edam, Kumbhakaran, Chitrakala, etc. Campus environment is good (green and clean) but in rainy season there is some difficulty because of lake beside college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus, decent placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are okay only. Before, many companies were coming, but now they have reduced a bit. The highest package they said was around 60 LPA, minimum mostly around 2 LPA, and the average comes near 5 LPA only. Big companies like Amazon, Flipkart, Asian Paints, Qualcomm also came before, so chances are there if we work properly. I don’t know much details about different job roles, but mostly teach and branch-related only. Mostly around 50 to 60 percent of the students will be placed before they complete their graduation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is also good only. College has Wi-Fi in every block and every floor, so network problems are not there much. But sometimes the net will be slow. Classrooms are also big and have smart TVs, so teaching is mostly through presentations or PPTs. Library is big, many books are available, and we can sit and study also. College also conducts many clubs, workshops, and some outdoor sessions.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are also well experienced, qualified, and trained. Many teachers have experience above 10 years, they teach pretty well and clear doubts also if we ask. But few teachers just finish syllabus only and go, not much interaction. Exam papers are made by our department only, some papers easy, some medium, and some a little tough also. Mostly the corrections are done by them, and the verification is done by JNTU.
detailed_review.Other: I have actually chosen this branch because this is the most trending branch in today’s engineering graduation. In our college, the events are not conducted much, but if they are conducted, then they are conducted very nicely.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: My college is good for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: IARE is one of the top colleges in Telangana. It has good placements in the final year. Around 70 percent of students get placed in college. Most students get the best internships with top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, the infrastructure and available courses are the best. The classrooms are very neat and well-maintained. Wi-Fi is always available. Labs and the library are maintained properly by the lab instructors and staff. It has super infrastructure facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, teachers are very helpful and clear our doubts. They explain in many ways to help us understand. Semester exams are not difficult but somewhat different from mid-term exams. The pass mark is 21 in every subject in the semester examinations.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course through EAMCET.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Our college is better for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, many students got placements according to their performance in the placement center. Our college is better for placements. A maximum of 70 percent of students got placements in our college. High package companies visit our college to hire students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college library has all types of books, but first we have to get access to go to the library. In the library, no phones are allowed, and it is peaceful. Classrooms and labs are well-structured. Labs are maintained by lab instructors with proper formal dress and correct timings.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, teachers are helpful. They clear our doubts. In our college, the pass percentage is 21 marks in semester-wise examinations. Semester exams are not difficult. During semester examinations, teachers help us to understand topics easily.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am very satisfied with my college because of the good faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college of Institute of Aeronautical Engineering, there are good placements, and also in this and last year, 80 percent of students got placed in companies. The highest package this year is 60 LPA and last year was 50 LPA, and it's gradually increasing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, there is very good faculty and also good infrastructure. We are very happy with that structure, and there are almost 300+ faculty members to teach the students. The hostel fee is somehow expensive, but it is also very worthy for that money.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, the faculty, curriculum, and exams for my course are very good. There is also very good teaching staff and quality teaching, and the given curriculum is very useful. It makes the students ready for the industries and also higher-level companies.
detailed_review.Other: Actually, there is a very good future for CSE, so I also want to become a software developer, which is why I chose this.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Industry-aligned faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: I am pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology (IT) department at the Institute of Aeronautical Engineering College. At present, I'm in 3rd year of my academics. In our senior batch, about 73 percent of students landed in IT roles. The highest package is around 25 LPA, and the average is close to 9 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel at MLRIT is provided for campus students due to the campus area and infrastructure. The MLRIT hostel campus is peaceful with a homely atmosphere. The hostel mess includes both vegan and non-vegan food items, and the students should follow the mess timings because the same mess is available for both boys' and girls' hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: The campus employs qualified instructors with strong industry connections. All the faculty members share knowledge along with subjective knowledge. The courses offered in my department are moderately tough. The semester exams are easy and can score very well.
detailed_review.Other: Festivals and events, and celebrations are vibrant, with Navrari Navali, Freshers Day, Graduation Day, Orientation Day, NSS-blood campaign, traditional Day, and annual Day.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Our college is better for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, many of the students got placements according to their capacity. Many companies offer our college. Many of the students are taking internships and working. Some of the students who are very talented in coding get offered positions in very high companies with high packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, faculty members are more supportive, and they encourage us to gain coding skills and help us get placements through our campus. There are many facilities available in our college. Many fests and cultural activities are also conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, teachers are very helpful. They clarify our doubts and help us understand topics more easily. The pass percentage in our college is to get 21 marks in each subject for semester-wise examinations and 14 marks in lab internals.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: A good college with supportive faculty decent placements and strong infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course our college has fewer placements because we are in Data Science but others have about 4LPA which is average for everyone. Better to take another course I do not have other option so I joined our course. Its better to join core CSE they have good placements in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our department infrastructure is so good that we like our college infrastructure. It is good and very private and security is provided. The food is not so good but we can eat it. The facilities in our college are good not so good. They also conduct many events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and very well educated and they explained. The pass percentage in our college is very high because of the college professors. They teach us very well that the curriculum activities do not take place because our college is only interested in keeping children growing in subjects only.
detailed_review.Other: You can join this college if you do not have any other chance to get better than this. If you get into a top college go for it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: They are working really hard for the students to get placed.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement process is going on, and almost 300 students have already been placed with the highest package of 61 LPA and the average package of 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are cognizant, and others like LTIMindtree, Capgemini, and Accenture.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every student has their personal Wi-Fi login where they can access the internet in the college premises with restricted access, and it can be used for particular things. The hostel food is good with different varieties provided. The security they provide and the safety measures are satisfactory.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are really helpful and help in completing the assignments. The curriculum is also relevant to the things that need to be learned. The pass percentage is almost 80 percent. This makes the students industry-ready, and they provide special training to make students better.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because of my interest in technology, and it helps me improve and increase my knowledge in that particular domain. Everything is good, and this has to be maintained.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Aeronautical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college for aeronautical branch.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, the overall placements are nearly 80%. However, if you consider aeronautical engineering, the placements are not that good. Most of the students try for internships and jobs in the CSE field, so placements in this branch are not very good. The average package is 4–5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities available in the college are very good, Wi-Fi is also decent, and there are charging ports everywhere, like in labs, classrooms, and the library, for using laptops. The hostel is also very good but is far from the college, however, bus facilities are available. Hostel food and facilities are also decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty here are well-qualified and have their PhDs, the teaching quality is good overall, and they provide full support to students, especially during exams. It’s good that most students pass the exams, and the teaching mostly makes the students industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: Rare colleges have good placements and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 65 per cent of marks students are placed in this college. The highest level of package is 61 LPA, and the lowest package is between 3 and 6 LPA. The top recruiting companies for the course in security are Microsoft. About 30-50 per cent of students got an internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are very good for the course/department. Then the classrooms are very good. We have a library too. Good wi-fi connection. The hostel is very good, with nice food, good accommodation and a playground.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The teachers are very helpful, and the teaching quality is very good. 
 The course curriculum is relevant, very good and the best courses are provided. The semester exams are conducted strictly and at a difficult level overall, with a pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I am interested in it, and the best thing about this course is doing cyber things, preventing any kind of attacks and helping others.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: It is a small college with very basic placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Decent placements are offered. Around 40% of students were placed. The lowest package is as low as 2 LPA. The highest package is as high as 40 LPA. Top recruiters include Qualcomm, Infosys, Flipkart, Amazon, Asian Paints, TCS, etc. I don’t have much information about the top roles. Students get very few internships from outside. Most are provided by the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is not available throughout the college. It is not even available in classrooms. We have LAN in labs, that's it. The quality of food is decent. It's better to go to other private hostels nearby rather than the college hostel, as the food is the same daily. Sports facilities are available and are supported.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers help only if we ask them. They are qualified and have decent knowledge about the subject, but not in-depth knowledge. Semester exams are not so simple. The curriculum does not make students industry-ready. Teaching quality depends on the teacher. Some teach well, while others don't.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college to study at.

detailed_review.Placements: Software engineer, AWS interns, product engineer, engineer trainee, etc. are some of the roles offered. Cognizant, TCS, Microsoft, Tech Mahindra, Amazon, etc. are some of the recruiters. About 80 to 90 students in my branch are placed, the highest package is 33 LPA and the lowest is 2.5 LPA. ServiceNow, BigWorks, JustPay, TCS, and Infosys (only girls) are also recruiters.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Not that good infrastructure. The classrooms are okay, all are well-equipped but not working properly. There is no proper classroom maintenance in summers and no proper ventilation. All the branches are clumsy in one small area. The labs are well designed, but only some of the labs meet today’s need for software
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the faculty are way too good, and many of them are just acting like faculty. There is no proper out-of-the-boundary knowledge, all bookish knowledge is replicated. There is no proper engagement while teaching. Some faculty are too good and help to explore different knowledge about hackathons, internships, etc.
detailed_review.Other: My college is good compared to other colleges in proper discipline, events, and clubs. It is well structured for all different branches but has no proper training to meet industry-level requirements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Everything is good about IARE college, including good facilities and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students are placed in our college. The lowest package is 2.5 LPA, and the highest package is 52 LPA. The highest package of the year is this, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA. At the same time, Codevita is helpful.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Furniture and infrastructure are good in our college. The hostel has a good mess and offers all types of sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful in our college to get good placements. The hostel provides the same quantity of food and has good quality as well. There are no issues with the IARE college. The college is very strict in maintenance.
detailed_review.Other: The Information Technology branch was chosen in our college, and all the branches are very beautiful, having all types of events, festivals, and traditional events.

reviews.review_title: Good college,with average facilities.

Cognizant, TCS, Microsoft, Tech Mahindra, Amazon, etc. are the top recruiters. Service now, Big works, Just pay, TCS, and Infosys are only for girls.

What are the career opportunities for BTech IT graduates in India?
placement_faqs.answer: The BTech IT course leads to a lot of earning opportunities for graduates to work on a platter. You can enter into industries such as IT advisory and consulting, healthcare, education, banking, trade, and commerce, etc. You can work as IT Engineer, IT Specialist, Mobile App Developer, Computer Programmer, Networking Systems Administrator, Database Administrator, Web Developer, Cyber Security Analyst, and many more profiles. The average BTech IT salary in India is also quite decent for fresh graduates, between INR 4 LPA and INR 7 LPA . Reference Link Information Technology Career Scope

sections.heading: Introduction
text: For more information about Institute of Aeronautical Engineering check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Institute of Aeronautical Engineering has a fully computerized with bar-coding system duplex library which can accommodate more than 35000 volumes of books. The first floor has circulation books, newspapers, back volumes of the periodicals whereas the second floor accommodates reference books and current periodicals. The library has subscribed to more than 180 online journals of IEEE, ASME and has the subscription of more than 156 Indian journals and magazines in print. The institute also has the digital library to access e-journals, e-books and N-LIST e-resources (Through INFLIBNET) & NPTEL facility to access video lectures and has the membership of DELNET

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: Institute of Aeronautical Engineering cafeteria offers a wide range of cuisines like south Indian, north Indian and Chinese. The cafeteria also has the popular food outlets like Wings & Fries, Coffee Day and ‘Nestle.

facilities.name: Labs
available_facilities: Metallurgy and Mechanics of  Solids Lab
Data mining and Web Technologies Lab

highlights.summary:
IEM Kolkata, under the IEM Group, is accredited with an A Grade by NAAC, and its department of Management is tier 1 NBA accredited. IEM College Kolkata, through 17 departments, offers UG and PG courses to students. These courses are provided across the Engineering, Management, and various other streams. The Institute of Engineering and Management offers BTech and MBA as flagship courses. IEM is one of the first self-financed Engineering Colleges of Kolkata.
Institute of Engineering and Management is also ranked 6th by Times 2025 under the Engineering category, 93rd by The Week 2025 under the Engineering category, and 23rd by Times 2025 for MBA. Some of the courses available in the IEM College are even AICTE-approved. Some of the departments are accredited by the NBA. IEM College Kolkata offers placement assistance to students and is visited by top companies for placements such as Oracle, TCS, and others. The major highlights of IEM College Kolkata are tabulated below:
