IEM Kolkata Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The review of the best college in Salt Lake Sector V.

detailed_review.Placements: A minimum of 50 percent get placed. I don't know the exact details yet about companies like TCS, Infosys, or GreyB. I don't know the placement record very deeply, but I've shared what I have heard, and believe me, they aren't false. This college places students in some of the world's top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classes are really good with modern technologies. Labs are fully air-conditioned. I am not a hosteller, so I don't know if the medical facilities are good. The institution is very keen on sports and games. They often host events, sports competitions, marathons, and football tournaments, which make us feel very energetic after hectic exams.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly qualified. It prepares them for different fields. The exams are difficult, with the pass percentage ranging from 70 to 80 percent. Despite being difficult, faculty helps us very keenly without any doubt. They send us notes and questions to practice and are also available 24/7 for doubt-solving.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my love for electronic stuff. Everything is perfect. IEM is full of events, the campus crowd is good, and the connectivity is very strong.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A campus for perfect discipline.

detailed_review.Placements: Though it's not yet time for my placements, it's being carried on from my seniors who have had placements. Placement history and ongoing placements are great. There are a variety of companies and numerous other openings, like future studies in M.Tech or MBA, etc. For those who will be appearing for government exams, they can opt for special training with no or bare minimum extra charges within the campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The course and college infrastructure are good. There have been continuous complaints with the hostel, its food quality, and the quality of usage and drinking water of the hostel. There are no provisions for AC in the hostel as of November, 2025. During the summer, coolers are provided in rooms with extra charges per month. The hostel fee for 12 months needs to be paid in one go before the commencement of the session.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are great. Highly qualified and brilliant in their fields, but there are a few professors who are great students, but the majority of us, the students, find it difficult to understand the lectures. Hands-on lab work and projects are a part of day-to-day life; perfect for industry purposes and preparation. The semester exams are moderately difficult. The pass percentage is 50.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: IEM Salt Lake BCA: Strong placements, decent infrastructure, and good supportive faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: College provides excellent BCA placements with reputed recruiters like Deloitte, TCS, and Infosys. Around 90-95 percent of students got placed with an average package of 4 LPA to 5 LPA, and top offers reaching more than 8 LPA. It gives placement assistance as well, so students feel free to take any help.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Average infrastructure with basic labs and classrooms that need modernization. Hostel facilities are limited, with small rooms and average food quality. Libraries are good and updated with all required books. It's not good, at least in my opinion, it's a 3/5 rating.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty at this campus for BCA is knowledgeable and supportive, with a well-structured curriculum covering core IT skills. Exams are moderately tough, not so easy, not so hard, focusing on concepts and practical. Over all it deserves a 4/5 rating.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best private college. Good placements and the teachers are so helpful.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good this year. Also, if you maintain discipline and follow their instructions, we can get good placements. They also guide students who want to do higher studies or start a startup. They are too concerned about their students, the best college indeed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is not so much fancy. The food quality of the hostel and canteen is very good. There are also good medical facilities available in the college sports zone, like a basketball court, which is also there. They organize sports tournaments, also interschool.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are very concerned about their students. All faculty members are very helpful. Faculty inspires the students to work on projects to encourage them. Faculty are too updated, they are so friendly and helpful.
detailed_review.Other: Unique fests are held there, like photography, gaming, cultural, and all types. They organize fest, hackathon.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Internet of Things and Cyber Security Including Block Chain Technology)
reviews.review_title: IEM Kolkata - An overview of the total experience.

detailed_review.Placements: Most students get placed in reputed companies, and students from the last batch are well placed. The highest package offered is more than 84 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Adobe, TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, etc. If a student has good academic performance and well-developed skills, then IEM is the best place to grab on to well-provided future opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: IEM does have modern technologies, but it surely lacks a lot in infrastructure when compared to other institutions. The college hostel does provide proper housing facilities and food. However, it cannot directly compare to the best food we would find around the area.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are surely helpful in terms of providing the best possible help in terms of academics. A personal mentor assists students throughout their academics for the best possible guidance that they will need. The course curriculum is relevant, but it is also strict. Semester exams are strict and require a thorough understanding of subjects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artifcial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good, but not the best. I think it's average.

detailed_review.Placements: As a Computer Science student, I have some advice for the students that, Let x = DSA & y = Project, placement = 2x + y, where x>y, y != 0. Every year, from my course, more than 65% of students get placement through campus and off-campus. This year, the top recruiter was Royal Enfield.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provided us with many facilities, such as labs for every subject, like C lab, Data Structure lab, Java lab, and IT lab. 24/7 LAN connectivity, fresh environment, and equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Apart from all the facilities, I personally liked the training programme. I have attended two training programs. First, they taught us HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, JQuery, PHP, and MySQL. While in the second one, I learn Python, Django, Bootstrap, and SQLite.
detailed_review.Other: If you are choosing Computer Science, then this is the best place for you. Best of luck. I was very passionate about my course and gave my full potential in it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: We have a good infrastructure and facilities. The library is 24/7, and events happen every weekend.

detailed_review.Placements: Institute of Engineering and Management Salt Lake records 85 to 90 percent placement records, where the median package is 6 Lacs per annum. The top recruiter offers a package of 32 Lacs per annum from Amazon SDE, while the lowest package from our college is 4 Lacs per annum. Many companies, including TCS, Cognizant, etc., came for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The quality of the food in the mess is good, and medical facilities are also available 24/7. Sports and games have good facilities as well. The faculty and infrastructure are really nice, the Wi-Fi is always available, and the library is open all day. The classrooms are quite well advanced.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are really helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good. The course is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams in the college are really difficult; the pass percentage is 70-80%. Many students get back in more than 2-4 subjects every semester.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a keen interest in cybersecurity, and I get to learn a lot of things from this college. There are events every weekend that you can organize as well as participate in; it is worth it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has a well-equipped campus with good placements and supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 85% of students get placed from our batch. The highest package is 12 LPA, and the average package is 5 LPA. The lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Capgemini. Many students got internships in similar firms, etc. It is also very good in placement duration.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has smart classrooms, well-equipped labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, and access to a central library. Hostels are decent with clean rooms, average mess food, and medical support. It has good sports facilities like basketball, cricket, and a gym. However, other facilities are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable, with many using practical teaching methods. The course curriculum is mostly industry-relevant with updated content. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty. The pass percentage is 85-90%.
detailed_review.Other: I am part of the B.Tech CSE batch 2022-2026. I chose this course due to my interest in coding and technology. The best part is hands-on projects and regular industry exposure. I wish there were more advanced electives and startup support. The campus organises good fests. It has an energetic crowd, decent connectivity, and active extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Average life of an engineer at IEM.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 90% were placed from the ECE department this year. The highest package is 18 LPA. The average package is 7 LPA - 8 LPA. The lowest package is 3.75 LPA. Top recruiters are TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, Wipro, and Capgemini. Top roles offered are electronics design, embedded systems, VLSI design, telecom network engineering, and wireless communication.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has well-organized labs with Wi-Fi. Libraries are available all the time for the students to study. The college provides opportunities for students to participate in different sports fields. There are also good medical facilities available for all students and staff.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are always helpful. It makes the students industry-ready as the college performs different industry visits throughout the year. The lab experiments and other knowledge gained from the curriculum help them to be industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Course, facility, and teachers are good. Students get placements and internships.

detailed_review.Placements: 70% of students are placed, Top recruiting companies are Hitachi, TCS, Wipro, Infosys, TCS Digital, TCS Prime, Cognizant, Deloitte, etc. AIML degree offered, in my course with B. Tech degree. The highest package is approximately 22 LPA, the average is 5 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. 50% students got an internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All  types of labs, library, and Wi-Fi are also available. Hostel and food are hygienic. In the library, every type of book is available for higher studies, and books are also available. There is a canteen in our college. 100MB  Wi-Fi will be given to every student.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and they have a Ph.D. degree from a well known colleges like IIT and NIT. Their teaching style is very impressive. Semester exams are tough, but you can get good marks and are very strict. If any student gets more than 50% then he will passed.
detailed_review.Other: I love mechanics that's why I choose this course. I have learned many industrial things by pursuing this course. If they give less pressure to student then they can easily cracked competitive. We also get SVMCM scholarship and also IEM SCHOLARSHIP, if any student and his family faced problem then some amount of scholarship will be give to student for their future.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: As per the facilities, IEM is the best college. I am happy to study at IEM College.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 80%-90% of ECE students are placed securely every year. The highest package is 15.5 LPA and the average package is 6 LPA. Student got an internship after completing their 2nd and 3rd semester. The students got internship opportunities from TCS, Amazon, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities available at the college include purified drinking water, and there is a playground on our campus. IEM College has a big library. Our college has a big seminar hall. Our college has fully equipped labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of IEM College is very good and intelligent. The management department faculty is experienced in marketing and operations. The basic Science department's faculty has knowledge in Physics and Mathematics, and their behavior is normal.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is the core branch. That means it is scope to get a job in computer Science and electrical engineering. The best thing is that I have got the opportunity to learn coding and electrical circuits both. I wish to improve my coding skills and circuit-making skills. Many events are organized by our seniors to help our faculty. The campus crowd is too big.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA Hons.)
reviews.review_title: It is a strict college that provides all the facilities with good placements and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: A maximum students of our college get placed in good corporate companies. The highest average package for our course is around 9-12 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Decathlon, TCS, Accenture, EY, Amazon, etc. All the students get internships in different companies. Top roles offered are business analyst, area manager, sales officer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library and labs are available and easily accessible. There are smart classrooms with AC and Wi-Fi that are also available. The canteen is good, but a bit expensive. We have a games room and a sports teacher too. Medical rooms are also there on every campus, and doctors are there. All kinds of medicine are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are very helpful and qualified. They teach every topic in detail. The course curriculum is amazing here, and we have all the required subjects. Through presentations and practical skills, we are taught to be industry-ready. Exams are difficult, and the passing percentage is around 95%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: With supportive faculty, decent placements, and a good campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, around 85% of students are successfully placed. The top recruiting companies included TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, Capgemini, and also IBM, Accenture, PWC, Oracle etc. came for recruitment. Some students also received offers from start-up and mid-level tech firms. The highest package offered is around 18 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA, and the average package is 5-6 LPA. Around 60% of students received internship offers from companies such as Internshala, Aiwallha etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure for all departments is good. We have Wi-Fi-enabled labs, modern classrooms with projectors, and a well-maintained library in our college. There is good average mess food, a gym, medical facilities, doctor visits, CCTV, a playground, and 2 or 3-seater rooms. IEM is the best.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are well-qualified and supportive. They are approachable for doubts and conduct extra classes during exam time. The teaching methodology includes both theoretical and practical learning, with assignments and projects. The curriculum is mostly up-to-date and covers key subjects. However, there is room for improvement in terms of including trending technologies like AI-ML and cloud computing. Exams are held semester-wise and are moderately difficult but fair. Overall, the curriculum prepares students reasonably well for industry jobs.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course due to my interest in tech and good future opportunities. Campus life is lively with events, fests, and helpful faculty. More industry exposure and updated tech subjects would improve the course. Overall, it's a good environment for learning and growth.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: IEM - A college with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 85% of students got placed in this course. The highest salary is 20 LPA. The lowest salary is 3 LPA. The average salary is 7 LPA. L&T, Mindtree, and TCS are the top recruiting companies in this course. 60% of students got internships at Wipro and Deloitte. Data analyst and business analyst are the top roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Each floor has a Wi-Fi connection, classrooms are clean and well arranged, and library is also very big. Hostel is average. Quality of food is not so good whereas there is good medical care. All kinds of sports and games are facilities. There is a basketball court on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are IIT passouts and are knowledgeable enough. Teaching quality is really good. This course curriculum is very relevant for the upcoming years and it trains the student to become industry-ready. The semester exams are average. The passing percentage is 40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has good opportunities for the future. The best part is that in my course I can go for both core industry or IT industry. Lab facilities could have been better. There are lots of events that occur both cultural and technical. The campus infrastructure could have been better but there are lots of extracurricular activities like sports, singing, dancing, drama, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied to be a part of IEM, Kolkata.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements have been phenomenal for the past few years at our college. They have a unique reputation for placements here in Kolkata. Almost 100% of students in our course have been placed already and still, many companies are visiting for further recruitment. Top recruiting companies include TCS, Cognizant, Infosys, Capgemini, LTI Mindtree, etc. From roles like systems engineer to power programmer various roles have been offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every lab has Wi-Fi facility, and even our library has one as well. We have pretty large classrooms with attached benches and desks. There is an abundant focus on club activities as well which includes sports and teach-fests too. The quality of the facilities in our hostels is unknown to me as I never stayed there. Even the food availability and medical facilities are unknown to me too. However, we have a large canteen consisting of various food items and enjoyable and delicious too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are indeed helpful in many ways. They are mostly doctorate or pursued Ph.D. The teaching quality is great. The course curriculum is relevant. It does make the students industry-ready. The semester exams are mostly based on what is being taught in the classes. There is no such thing as a pass percentage.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of IEM College by Arpan.

detailed_review.Placements: I think if you are good at electrical engineering then you are getting a chance to get a good company. There are 60% chance of getting a good company. The highest package is 72 LPA. The lowest package is 8 LPA. 50% of students got an internship from this course. Wipro and TCS are top recruiting companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available in our college. In class, the teacher teaches us by using of projector. Also in the lab, Wi-Fi is available. In our college, there is a sports room. There are various types of food available in our college but the price is very high and the quality is below average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful with the students. Most of the teachers are qualified Ph.D. It makes students industry-ready. The semester examination is not tough anymore. Even it is very easy to pass. The passing mark is 50 out of 100.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied as the college staff and faculty members are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 90% of students got placed. The average package is between 7 LPA- 8 LPA. The highest package potential is around 18 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, Oracle, and Infosys, and many students also secured internships. The top roles are analyst, senior data analyst, software engineer, and project manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the floors have Wi-Fi. The labs are well-equipped with materials and technologies available. The classrooms are neat and clean. The libraries are filled up with a good amount of books. There are many labs like AI labs, programming labs, etc. When I first came into the hostel, I was very nervous about how the hostel would be and how the environment would be, but the hostel staff was very friendly and helpful. The hostel facilities are very good and the hostel food is also up to the mark.
detailed_review.Faculty: When I got admitted to this college I was very nervous about how the college staff and teachers would be because I was in a completely different environment. The teachers are highly qualified and are also very helpful. They are extremely knowledgeable and the quality of teaching is amazing and is up to the mark. The course is industry-relevant and makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams in the college are quite difficult as the question is made by faculty from other colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is good for placements but not for enjoying college life.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of the service-based companies come for placements of students. More than 90% of students get a decent package. Top recruiting are mass hiring companies like TCS and Accenture. Internships are mainly provided by the college based on the skillsets of faculty members.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs have a decent Wi-Fi and computer which is suitable for doing our practical learning. Classrooms are spacious and clean. The library has tons of books on every topic the college teaches. There is a games room with gym equipment along with games like table tennis and carrom.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are strict but helpful and will push us to excellence. The teaching quality is above average. The course mainly focuses on the placement perspective and teaches us to be good at our jobs. Semester exams are easy, and the pass percentage is nearly 100%. Hardly anyone fails as teachers are skilled in teaching.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Overall college is good for placement also the lab work is not so good.

detailed_review.Placements: I am studying in the department of information technology and in the campus recruitment, approximately 70% student are placed in different companies like Oracle, TCS, Cognizant, Accenture, etc. Several students are qualified in GATE exam and several students are qualified for CAT or any other exam.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure not so bad but also demands improvement. The hostel food quality is sometimes bad or sometimes good. Sports facilities should be improved and add more games in semester curriculum. Classrooms need improvements day by day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are very helpful. But for all subjects, we need a quality teacher. This course is good for a job but don't know proper industry-level quality education. Semester exams are not so difficult, they are moderate, and good question levels are there.
detailed_review.Other: Improve the quality of teachers and improve the college infrastructure, lab instruments, and setup.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The highest campus offer is 15.5 LPA. In 2021, followed by a 32 LPA offer.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 200 people are placed in my stream. The highest package is 18 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.6 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Google, Amazon, TCS, Cognizant, and Wipro. A minimum of 90% of students get internships from my course and companies like TCS, Cognizant, and Wipro. The roles offered by my course are in this stream, and I would like to go to both field jobs and IT jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: IEM Kolkata offers separate, secured hostels for both boys and girls within the campus. Facilities include 24/7 security, a hygienic mess, free Wi-Fi, and access to sports and recreation areas. IEM provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls. Accommodation is primarily on a twin-sharing basis. The hostels can accommodate over 200 boys and 150 girls. Hostels are located within the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Engineering and Management Focus, IEM Kolkata provide a programs in engineering-related areas and management, adhering to MAKAUT guidelines. The course curriculum is designed to be relevant to the specific field of study. The pass percentage is 100.

admission.title: IEM Kolkata Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: IEM Kolkata admissions 2026 are based on merit and entrance-exam scores of the candidates. The college offers BTech, BBA, MCA, MBA, MBA (general), etc at the UG and PG level. Candidates need to have a valid score in the accepted entrance exam to get admission into the preferred course. But, IEM Kolkata also selects students based on merit. Read on to learn more about the IEM Kolkata admission process , courses, and more.

faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee for BTech at Institute of Engineering and Management?
faqs.answer: INR 4.2 LPA is the total tuition fee for BTech at Institute of Engineering and Management. The hostel fee is INR 2,000, and students also have to pay a one-time fee of INR 2,000 seperate from the tuition and hostel fee. Note- This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: Can I enrol for admission at IEM Kolkata with Class 12 score?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates can enrol for admission at IEM Kolkata with Class 12 scores. The institute offers various UG courses. For UG courses, the basic eligibility criteria is to complete Class 12. However, for BTech course admission aspirants also need to have valid JEE Main scores.

faqs.question: How many rounds of WBJEE Counselling 2025?
faqs.answer: WBJEE Counselling 2025 was conducted in two rounds, namely Round 1 and Round 2, followed by the Defence quota counselling.

faqs.question: How should I prepare myself to get into Institute of Engineering and Management for MBA?
faqs.answer: In order to get prepared for admission to the MBA application at the Institute of Engineering and Management (IEM), take the following actions: 1. Research the Program: Learn approximately the professors, centers on campus, strong point opportunities, curriculum, and other information of the MBA programme that IEM offers. Make positive it suits your objectives and process desires. 2. Verify Eligibility Criteria: Examine the conditions for admission to the MBA program, along with minimal take a look at ratings (if any), educational background, and any process revel in necessities. Before filing, make certain you satisfy all necessities. 3. Get Ready for admission examinations: Start your coaching some distance earlier if the MBA school wishes you to take admission examinations such as the CMAT (Common Management Admission Test), MAT (Management Aptitude Test), XAT (Xavier Aptitude Test), or CAT (Common Admission Test). Think approximately enrolling in education programs,  Best of Luck

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for admission at Institute of Engineering and Management?
faqs.answer: The college offers BTech, BBA, MCA, MBA, MBA (general), etc. courses at the UG and PG level. For IEM Kolkata admissions , candidates need to have a valid score in the respective entrance exam to get selected.  Students can check the table below to know course-wise selection criteria: WBUT PGET/GATE/IEMJEE Merit-based WBJEE JECA + PI

faqs.question: What rank is required for IEM Kolkata BTech admission?
faqs.answer: IEM Kolkata accepts WBJEE entrance exam rank for admission to BTech program. According to the WBJEE cutoff 2023, the last round closing rank for BTech program fell between the ranges of 398 to 92292 . Among all the brances, BTech CSE was the most sought-after course specialisation. In 2022, the WBJEE rank went up to 3621 in the last round for the General AI category. Refer to the table below for more details about the cutoff trend of three years-

faqs.question: What has been the cutoff trend for IEM Kolkata BTech in Information Technology in the last few years?
faqs.answer: The Institute of Engineering and Management Kolkata admission to the BTech courses is based on WBJEE scores, followed by the WBJEE Counselling process. As per the IEM Kolkata cutoff 2023, the last round closing rank for Information Technology was 39862 for the General All India category stduents. During the IEM Kolkata cutoff 2022, the last round closing rank stood at 5726 and in 2021 it closed at 4016 for BTech in IT programme. So, comparing the last round closing ranks for all the three years, IEM Kolkata witnessed a huge decline for BTech in CSE programm.

faqs.question: Is admission money refundable for IEM Kolkata?
faqs.answer: The admission money may be returned by the Institute of Engineering and Management, Kolkata, under certain special-case circumstances. One such case could be, those candidates who only attend classes for a few days and change their college later in spot rounds may get partial fee amount refunded. faqs.answer: While filling out WBJEE application form, candidates need to pay fee online i.e., through net banking/credit card/debit card. No other mode of payment will be accepted by authorities. For SC/ST/OBC-A/OBC-B/EWS/TFW Third Gender category candidates, the application fee is INR 200. If candidates does not pay application fee, their applications will be rejected by authorities.

data.title: IEM Kolkata Placement Report 2024
summary: As per the NIRF report 2025, in all 1,054 students secured placements out of which 774 belonged to BTech program. The median package recorded for IEM Kolkata placement 2024 for BTech was INR 6 LPA . For MTech 23 students out of 45 students were placed. The median package reached INR 3.36 LPA. Compared to last year, the median salary for the BTech program has increased by 25%. Additionally, the median salary for MTech has decreased from INR 4.25 LPA to INR 3.36 LPA.
During IEM Kolkata MBA placements 257 students were placed whose median package stood at INR 16.40 LPA. in 2023 the median package stood at INR 15 LPA.

college_info.college_name: Integral University Lucknow: Courses, Admission 2026, Rankings, Fees, Placements

highlights.summary:
Integral University Lucknow is accredited by A+ Grade by NAAC. Integral University has got approval from INC, Medical Council of India, Council of Architecture, & Bar Council of India. Other approving agencies are National Council for Teacher Education, UGC, PCI, Indian Association of Physiotherapists, & UP State Medical Faculty. Integral University has a hospital which is 550-bedded and is recognised by the Department of Scientific & Industrial Research, Ministry of Science & Technology, Government of India as a SIRO. Integral Lucknow has been ranked 254 under Asian University Ranking- Southern Asia by QS Rankings 2026 and ranked 28 in Science stream and 40 in Pharmacy stream by the NIRF Ranking 2025.
Integral University Lucknow has various departments. These departments offers PG, UG, doctoral, & various other courses to its students. These programmes are provided across Nursing, Law, Engineering, & various other streams. The courses which are high on demand at Integral Lucknow are MBA and BSc programmes. Integral University Lucknow admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The university accepts national entrance exams like IUET, JEE Main, CAT, MAT, UPSEE, and others. There is a team of experienced faculty members that mentors & also trains students for their future careers. Integral The highlights of Integral University Lucknow are tabulated below:
Integral University Highlights 2026
- BCI, National Council for Teacher Education, Indian Association of Physiotherapists, UP State Medical Faculty, etc
- 254 by Asian University Ranking- Southern Asia by QS Rankings 2026

college_info_program.intro:
Integral University popular progammes are MBA and BSc. Integral University MBA course students can enter in Retail and Corporate Sector, Media Sector, and Hospitality Sector, or can take up various job opportunities relevant to their stream. The goal of Integral University is to bring innovation to education by restructuring various courses and adopting various novel methods of learning and teaching to target the development of personality.
Integral University BSc students are placed in top companies such as Deloitte, Britannia, Nestle, IBM, Wipro, HCL, and others. Integral University Lucknow is one of the top universities present in India. Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by Integral University and their respective eligibility and Integral College Lucknow fee structure:

Integral University Lucknow Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Overall, the university is excellent. Faculty members are good, but the placement rate is low.

detailed_review.Placements: The average package is about 2.5–3 LPA. Companies visit, but not very frequently. Overall, the placement rate is good compared to other universities in Lucknow. However, if you only want placement, you should consider a university other than Integral University.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My course is B.Sc. Biotechnology, and its fee is Rs. 90,000 per year. Hostel fees are separate and vary according to the type of room you choose. Mainly, two kinds of rooms are available here. They are AC and non-AC. The rooms are triple-sharing. Classrooms are well-equipped with projectors, microphones, and speakers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are excellent, highly qualified, mostly Ph.D., and helpful with studies and other issues. The teaching method is good. Mainly, three exams are conducted in each semester. The number of exams varies from course to course.
detailed_review.Other: The campus is good, neat, and clean, though a little crowded. Events and concerts are organized regularly. Overall, the university is excellent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you are serious about your studies, then you can study here otherwise, you cannot.

detailed_review.Placements: In my knowledge, only 10 to 15% get the placement. The highest placement of 2024 is 34 LPA. Top recruiting company in this college is TCS. Many students get paid internships, only 10 to 15% and the remaining 50% are unpaid. Top roles offered in our course are Software Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available in the labs, and AC is also available. Every classroom department has its library, and there is a Central library where you can study. The quality of the hostel is very good. Food is average, and the mess is there. All medical facilities, sports, and games are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very qualified and knowledgeable in helping the students in the force they teach. Students need to recharge in the industry. End sem is very difficult, 80% pass in the examination, and in the minds. There are two midterms, but you can easily pass them.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this one because I am interested in Android development. Things did improve. I am learning more by making more small projects. There is a scholarship offered by the college, and the campus is very crowded, the surroundings are very green.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Radio Imaging Technology
reviews.review_title: The teachers are very helpful and help with students' careers.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students got placed in this course. The highest package is 8 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is between 2-4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are medical diagnostic and hospital. 70% of students got internships in this course. The role offered is a radiographer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available for the course are great, including internet connection, different kinds of labs, smart classrooms, and a library. The quality of facilities is good in the hostel, the mess, and the canteen. Medical facilities have improved, and games are conducted regularly.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are not so difficult in college, and the pass percentage is 35%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to help needy people by achieving a good life in the healthcare department. The best thing about this course is that you will achieve a good life. There is no need to improve anything. Events and fests are conducted, and a huge crowd comes to watch and enjoy. Scholarships are given on time, and extracurricular activities are conducted on time.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Radio Imaging Technology
reviews.review_title: Now the teachers are very good, and they help in students' career building.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 60% of students got placed in this course. The highest package was more than 8 LPA, and the lowest was less than 3 LPA. The average was between 2 LPA to 4 LPA. Recruiting company was Health care department. More than 50% of students got internships from this course in hospitals and diagnostic centers. The role offered in this course was radiographer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure were good. We had strong Wi-Fi connection and different kinds of labs, digital classroom, and library. The quality of facilities in hostel was hygienic, and provided 3 times meals. All meds were available in the medical room. There was a small playground in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality was good. This course curriculum was relevant. It made the students industry-ready. The semester exams were not so difficult but you had to study for good marks, and the pass percentage was 35%.
detailed_review.Other: This course gave you wings to help the sick person that's why I chose this course. The best thing about this course was that you will be proud when someone got relief because of you. There was no improvement, everything was good. Events and fests whenever happens, so many people come to see them.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Radio Imaging Technology
reviews.review_title: Earlier faculty never focused on students that's why students can't get good placed.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 50% was required to be placed in this course. The lowest package was 3 LPA, and the highest package was more than 5 LPA. Top recruitment company was medical health care department. More than 50% of students got internships. The role offered in this course was radiographer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The best quality of infrastructure available like good internet Wi-Fi speed, smart classroom, and different kinds of library were there. Facilities available in hostel were fully air-conditioned bedroom and good quality food. Medical facilities were good enough, and mini field was there for playing games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very cooperative, very helpful, and highly qualified. They had great skills and knowledge, and the teaching quality was good. This course curriculum was relevant. Semester exams were not that much hard, but you had to study for good results of more than 35%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I wanted to help needy people in many ways. Through this course, I got an idea to help in medical field. The best thing about the course was that our value will be higher. Events, fests, and campus life happen here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good university with a good atmosphere, nothing is over the board as I have seen at other colleges

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are not that good. Only a few excellent students get good placements others get normal placements, which are usually different from the course they have pursued. I have seen many CS and IT guys taking jobs for marketing and other basic jobs that core companies do not usually visit, and even if they do, they dont select many.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and hostel are good, with the constant change and upgrades going on, they are improving it, and its getting better through my 4 years. I have seen great investment in infrastructure, which helps a lot as a student, and it feels good.
detailed_review.Faculty: I dont know much about other faculty members, but mine in the electrical department is very good. The teachers are very supportive, helpful, and ready for many things. They support us and motivate us for the better, and also help if we are in a situation, which is something that lacks in other departments.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Radio Imaging Technology
reviews.review_title: Now the faculty is old-fashioned.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 35 percent need to be placed in this course. Highest package is 10 LPA, and lowest package is 2 LPA. Hospital and health care are recruiters. More than 35% of students got an internship from this course in healthcare department. Radiographer role is  offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
There are more facilities like better smart classes available, a big library available for students, and different laboratories available for students. 
One of the best quality food served in the hostel, better canteen hygiene is good, air-conditioned bedrooms, a medical room available, and a big ground for the students.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are very helpful to the students. In any criteria, they will help.
They have great qualification and good knowledge. Teaching quality is good. Course is curriculum relevant. Semesters are moderately difficult, if you study hard you can get pass easily. Pass percentage is 35%.
detailed_review.Other: I want to become a doctor, but sometimes dreams can't be achieved easily. That's why I want to help people by choosing this course in healthcare department. The best thing about this course is that you will be set for future.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good and lovely college.

detailed_review.Placements: A lot of students get placed in valuable companies with an average package of 6–7 LPA. Many are working in their fields. Apart from that, many students secure government jobs after graduating from this college and have good grades.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is verified by NAAC with an A+ grade, so it has good infrastructure and a good campus view with a playground, library, auditorium, and many more facilities provided by the college. The infrastructure, as well as the nature and environment of the college, is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, with great knowledge and a helping nature. Many teachers for one subject help students and make them toward a bright future. As I know, teachers I engaged with and got a chance to work with on the project are good.
detailed_review.Other: As I have good knowledge of Computer Science, I really want to go into the tech field.

reviews.course: B.A. (Hons.) in English
reviews.review_title: It's fantastic, and its infrastructure is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Good placements are offered, and many students get placement here. The courses are worth doing from here. Once you study here, you do not need to worry about the job. You got admission here, and you are done. They will provide you best places and companies for placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is excellent. It has a very big campus with a cafeteria and garden area. You can just sit in the garden and spend time with your friends. There is a library with extremely good and helpful books which we can take from there. They also have AC in the classrooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: It has the best faculty members. The teachers are very kind and helpful. They provide the best study material, their teaching style is very good, and they are ready to help anytime. They make the classes very interactive, and we really enjoy them.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: The college is very nice. Teaching staff is very good and helpful and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 60-70% of students get placements. Packages are not officially shown. 50% of students get internships. Mostly students pursue PhD and MBA. Mostly students do not choose placements from college, they try for government exams and other self-employment, farming, and businesses.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities like museum, labs, classes, smart classes, and library are well maintained and managed on 7 floors. Library has every book needed.  We get free Wi-Fi on campus. It provides best infrastructure. Some classes are AC classes, good canteen, and fresh food served.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and have good teaching skills. Curriculum is relevant. Semester exams are not very tough and copy checking is done strictly. Exams are 3 hours long and our one MCQ based paper is for 30 minutes, and the other 3 hours for 4 questions, long strictly conducted exams proper ID checking and other formalities. Teachers are very good, helpful, and knowledgeable. They have good nature.
detailed_review.Other: There is an annual fest in February fiesta where music, dance, ramp walk, singing, qawwali, and all these events take place. Many programs are held on other occasions. Everything is good and has environment friendly infrastructure. I chose agriculture because I had farms to handle and I wanted to do business.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Integral University: A university that gives wings to your dreams.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 85% of students were placed in my course. The highest package was 50 LPA, and the lowest package was 20 LPA. Infosys, Nestlé, Amazon, Flipkart are some of the companies. About 75% of students got internships in Nestlé, Infosys, etc. Many students find placements with reputable companies, particularly in B.Tech and B.Com programs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The university has AC classrooms with A1 infrastructure, Wi-Fi available for students, smart boards and projectors in every classroom, and a library with fully furnished ACs, teachers are very supportive and provide different types of study materials like PDFs and notes; the hostel infrastructure is top class with AC in every room, elevators along with stairs featuring the latest technology in both hostel and university buildings, healthy and tasty food with proper hygiene is prepared at the canteen and mess, with separate canteens for the university and hostel; and medical facilities are available 24*7 as the university has its hospital named Integral Hospital.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and understanding. The course curriculum is also very good as it provides practical knowledge along with theoretical knowledge. Semester exams are neither very tough nor very easy. By attending regular classes, one can qualify for semester exams with a high CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am very much interested in technology. Fests and events are organized very well. Anyone can participate in events and can win good prizes and rewards.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Myself Amaan, done my graduation with B.Sc. biotechnology from Integral University IUL. Placement percentage should be above 50 depending on your skills. Top companies here for recruitment are Infosys, Accenture, HCL, and many more. So overall it's a good university.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Although facilities are good. Infrastructure is good. Canteen and eating outlets are there. We have good transportation system and budget friendly. Good food is available at university with pocket-friendly prices. Departments are good and clean with good environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are so helpful in all aspects from studying issues to placements. Though teaching quality is good, and it depends on you. Semester exams are not much difficult, lenient exams. Pass percentage is above 27 in semester exams. Although good education here.
detailed_review.Other: Seniors are helpful and good behaved. Our campus is ragging free with good environment. Fests and many events are there like same e integral, Fiesta, nukkad natak, and many more.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Arts in Liberal Arts
reviews.review_title: This is the college of dreams and happiness.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 25% of students in this course have a bright future for their employment. The highest package is 5 LPA offered by the management, and the minimum is Rs. 30,000. Nearly 75% of students get an internship on the basis of their way of knowledge. Among 20% of students who get HOD duties, 50% the service providers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good facilities, like a library, canteen, practical labs, classrooms, a mess, and the best facilities for sports. The college also has dance and all other curricular activities. These activities help students in any field to build their talent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and friendly with the students and have good knowledge of teaching. The course is very relevant in every field, whether in industries, commerce, or government jobs. Semester exams are very close to the pattern of government exams. The pass percentage of the college is 38%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this subject to fulfill my dream job of UPSC. There are many things I am improving regarding my knowledge of the global world.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Overall, the best college in Lucknow.

detailed_review.Placements: 30% of students got placed. Practical analysis are there in our course. 20% of students got internships from our college Integral University. The highest package is 8 LPA the average is 3 LPA, and the lowest package is 1 LPA. It is the main problem many students had left the college due to this.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: On campus, we are provided with Wi-Fi. Classrooms are too neat and clean just a little bit of servicing for the electrical appliances is needed for all classrooms. The quality of the hostels is very good. The food is also nice. Their security service is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are highly qualified and knowledgeable. If you have studied properly or only attended the classes then you can easily clear the exams. Teachers notes and PDFs are also very helpful. There is a library on campus where we can do studies.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
reviews.review_title: It is the best college in Lucknow and offers the best courses.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students are placed, and the average package is 5 LPA. The top recruiting companies for my course are Wipro, Airodit Software, and many national companies. All of them get internships, with many companies offering roles for front-end development and back-end development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are very good. We have a gym, a cafeteria, a nightstand, and all sports accessories. The quality of the hostel is up to the mark, and the food is also very good. Medical facilities are 24/7, and there are all types of games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is also very good. The course curriculum is very relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. The semester exam is not very hard to qualify, and the pass percentage is 98%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it helps in the country's technology growth. The best thing is that the world depends on it. Everything is good in my course, including events, fests, and campus. The crowd is 20,000, and everything is connected. There are 124 types of scholarships and extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Forensic Science
reviews.review_title: Teachers are good but facilities are not that much good.

detailed_review.Placements: Zero percentage of students get placed in my course. The package is bot offered because after my course there is no job and not a single company will come to hire students from this course. We have to do internships on our own in a private firm. There is no internship in our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. Lab facilities are also good and not that bad. Classrooms are good. There is a central library and a department library for students. The hostel infrastructure is good but the food is not good. There is the lowest quality of food and no hygiene.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They help students in a polite way. Teachers help students to study hard and clear all doubts. Semester exams are very difficult. Teachers clear all doubts and course syllabus before the semester so it is easy for students.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (Hons.) in Association with ACCA
reviews.review_title: Loving my college and would refer it to others.

detailed_review.Placements: There are approximately 65%-75% of students from the B.Com (Hons.) course who got placed through campus recruitment. The highest package is 6 LPA, offered in finance/analyst roles, the lowest package is 2.2 LPA, and the average package is 3.5 LPA. Top internships are provided in companies like HDFC Bank, LIC, and Reliance Retail. Top role offered by the course is financial analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has good campus and hostel surroundings. Every facility is provided with clean washrooms and hygienic food, and labs are fully furnished and have good and healthy surroundings for education purposes. Also, Wi-Fi connection is provided for both. Study rooms are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Well-trained faculty is provided. Their knowledge is up to the mark. They help the students during the sessions. Some of them, their understanding is mind-blowing. Also, they provide practical knowledge which helps us a lot along with the reference. Exams are conducted semester-wise and they are difficult though the passing percentage is 40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of some future purpose and I want to continue my education and pursue finance further. The rules and the restrictions in the college must be a little settled down. Also every year there are many functions such as sham-e-integral, convocation, Fiesta, and many competitions among the departments, and many sports games too.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (Hons.) in Association with ACCA
reviews.review_title: Life at Integral pursuing B.Com (Hons).

detailed_review.Placements: At my time students got placed at 7-9 CGPA. The highest package is 74 LPA, and the lowest package is 1.80 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, Flipkart, Swiggy, Tata, and BMW. I have seen many of my friends getting internships in Flipkart and Meesho with CGPA of 7-8.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good like labs, classrooms, library, and cafeteria. But the issue is of network of mobile. Rest everything is good. I opted hostel that's why I didn't know about it but the canteen is good. There is our own IUL hospital for medical services. There are many events related to sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful seeing them shows that they are experienced enough and knowledgeable. Teaching quality of many teachers is outstanding. They are very helpful and friendly. The curriculum is relevant and I think students are industry-ready. Exams are not that difficult if you focus in class exams should be a piece of cake.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I like to study commerce. I think that the whole time I studied there I didn't have any cons in my course. There are many events like Fiesta annually Sham-e-integral mushairas, games, and extra curricular activities.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college because of infrastructure and faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: If I am talking about placement, it is quite average in my opinion. They do not provide a good handsome package. Some companies are only paying for internships not for full-time jobs so if you want a job, you might think once while taking admission.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am not staying in the campus hostel, but I can share some relevant information that might help you. The campus infrastructure is of a high standard, and there are many activities available, including a badminton court, a volleyball court, a large open playground, a gym, and a library. The hostel facilities are also quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are helpful, well-qualified and knowledgeable. They studied from renowned universities. The course curriculum is followed according to UGC guidelines. Semester exams are not difficult for those who pay attention in the classroom during lecture. All over everything is pretty good.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a bachelor's degree in agriculture and want to pursue a master's degree in a business-related field. There is a college Fiesta every year, along with many other activities for student development.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The faculty is good, but placements are a bit low. The infrastructure and facilities are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 40% to 45% of students get placed. The highest package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 1 LPA to 2 LPA. Nestlé and other dairy companies mainly recruit students, often for roles like web developer. There are many placement drives scheduled by the university, but when it comes to salary, companies do not offer much to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The whole campus is good, and labs are suitable for doing practicals. The central library is one of the best things. The hostel food is one of the best things for students. Multiple sports grounds and coaching facilities. It's not as bad as a government school, but it's not as good as an NIT or other tier 2 and 3 colleges.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is good, and the course curriculum is relevant for students and makes them job-ready. Semesters are good and easy, but the end semester is a bit difficult. The main thing is that most of the faculty feel the burden of teaching due to a lack of knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in the CS branch, and the best thing about this course is that you can explore many aspects and other technologies.

college_info.college_name: Integral University Lucknow Course Admissions 2025: Fees, Eligibility, Dates & Selection Process

faqs.question: Is Integral University hard to get?
faqs.answer: No, it is not tough to get admission to Integral University. Candidates only have to fulfil the basic eligibility requirements of the respective courses. If candidates are applying via IUET, they only need to make some preparation strategies for IUET to crack the exam. Through the exam, candidates will be evaluated on their grasp of subjects studied in Class 12 and other General affairs. Here is the IUET exam pattern for students to ace the exam.

faqs.question: What is the fees for various courses offered at Integral University Lucknow?
faqs.answer: At the undergraduate level, the university offers BTech in eight specialisations, BCA , BSc , and various other courses to students. At the postgraduate level, Integral University Lucknow offers MTech in nine specialisation, MSc , and various other courses to students. Integral University Lucknow also provides PhD courses to students. The fee for various courses like BTech, MTech, BSc is INR 2.4 Lacs - INR 7 lakh, INR 1 Lacs - INR 7 lakh, and INR 1.2 Lacs - INR 5.2 lakh, respectively. There are various other costs involved like transportation, accomodation, and others. For them, please visit the official website of the uniersity.

faqs.question: Is BTech at Integral University expensive?
faqs.answer: No, if we compare the tuition fees of Integral University BTech to other top-ranked colleges of our country that offer BTech we’ll find the tuition fees is similar or less than other top-ranked colleges. The BTech tuition fees at Integral University is in the range of INR 2.5 lakh – INR 14.4 lakh. Compared to the tuition fees of prestigious colleges like IITs, Integral University is much more affordable. The tuition fees for MBA at IIM range between INR 1 lakh to 1.48 lakh per semester depending on the campus and the course chosen.

faqs.question: How many BTech specialisations does Integral University offer?
faqs.answer: Integral University offers a BTech course for a duration of four years through the Faculty of Engineering & Information Technology. This course is offered across nine specialisations. Find them below:

faqs.question: Who is eligible for Integral University BTech CSE course?
faqs.answer: Integral University offers a four-year course of BTech across nine specialisations. Those who are willing to get admission to this course must pass Class 12 with 45% aggregate with Physics, Chemistry, English/ Mathematics from a recognised board. Students are selected based on their scores in the university's in-house entrance exam or any other national-level entrance exam, which is conducted for admission to Engineering courses.

faqs.question: How to get admission to BTech at Integral University?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to BTech at Integral University, one must fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria, which is to pass Class 12 with 45% aggregate from. For admission to this course, candidates either need to qualify for IUET, which is an in-house entrance exam of Integral University or All India-level JEE Main entrance exam with a valid score.

faqs.question: Who can apply to MBBS at Integral university?
faqs.answer: To be eligible to apply for MBBS course at Integral University, candidates must pass the minimum eligibility criteria as per the course requirements. Those who pass Class 12 in Science stream (Physics, Chemistry, and Biology) from a recognised school and fulfil all the guidelines determined by the National Medical Council (NMC) are eligible to apply for the course. Candidates have to submit their marksheet/ scorecard of Class 12 at the time of applying for the course.

faqs.question: Can I get admission to MBBS at Integral University without NEET UG?
faqs.answer: No, diect admission is not possible for admission to MBBS at Integral University. Candidates aspiring to get a seat in MBBS at Integral University must qualify for NEET UG entrance exam conducted by NTA with a valid score. Without a valid NEET UG score, candidates will not be selected for the course. Further, only the entrance exam qualifiers will be able to apply for UP NEET UG Counselling process for the seat allotment.

faqs.question: What is fees for MBBS at Integral University?
faqs.answer: The tuition fees for MBBS course at Integral University is INR 76.5 lakh. Other than this, candidates have to pay for hostel fee and one-time refundable caution deposit. However, this fee is taken from unofficial sources and hence, is indicative. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the Integral University MBBS fees .

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Integral University?
faqs.answer: The tuition fees for MBA courses at Integral University range from INR 1 lakh - INR 6.5 lakh. Other than this, candidates have to pay for hostel fee and one-time refundable caution deposit, additionally. This fee is taken from unofficial sources and hence, is indicative. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the Integral University MBA fees.

faqs.question: Is there any direct admission available for MBA at Integral University?
faqs.answer: No, Integral University doesn't have the provision of direct admission to MBA. Admission to this course is entirely entrance-based. Students are required to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria and qualify for the relevant entrance exams. Students can get admission to MBA via a valid score of IUET/ CAT/ MAT/ UPSEE. Currently, MAT 2025 applications have started, interested candidates can apply for the same.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at Integral University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Integral University offers a two-year course of MBA (General) through the Department of Commerce & Management. Apart from this, the university also offers MBA in Agri-business via the Department of Agricultural Science & Technology. Those who are willing to get admission to either of the course must fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria and visit the official website of Integral University to apply online. Find here the genuine students' reviews about Intergal University MBA courses .

faqs.question: How to get admission to MBA at Integral University?
faqs.answer: Integral University admissions to MBA (General) and MBA (Agri-business) courses are entrance-based. Students have to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria and qualify for the respective entrance exams with a valid score. Find below the eligibility and selection criteria for both courses:

faqs.question: How to get admission to Integral University for BPharm?
faqs.answer: To get admission to a four-year BPharm course at Integral University, students must pass Class 12 with 45% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry & Maths/ Biology from a recognised board as per the minimum eligibility criteria. As per the selection criteria for this course, students have to qualify for Integral University Entrance Test (IUET), which is a common in-house entrance exam conducted for all courses. To know more detailed information related to Integral University BPharm admission, click here .

faqs.question: What is the BPharm fees at Integral University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fees for the BPharm course at Integral University ranges between INR 3.9 lakh - INR 6.5 lakh for four years. This fee is taken from unofficial sources and hence, is indicative. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the Integral University BPharm fees. There are other fee components that need to be paid at the time of admission.

faqs.question: Is there BPharm (Lateral Entry) course available at Integral University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Integral University offers direct admission to the second year of BPharm through Lateral Entry. This course is taught through the Department of Pharmacy at the university for a duration of three-year. Those who are willing to get admission to this course must pass DPharm course with 45% marks in aggregate from a recognised Board/ University. The selection criteria for this course is the same as of the four-year BPharm course.

The institute's ranks in the 'Pharmacy' category; have ascended when evaluated against previous year's ranking. In 2025, Integral University Lucknow climbed 5 ranks to #40 rank in the 'Pharmacy' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has ascended in the rankings. Check out the latest rankings for other ranking bodies and their categories below. According to the NIRF ranking 2025, Integral University Lucknow received #151-200 rank in the 'Overall' category. It holds a comparable status to the most prestigious universities such as Ashoka University Sonipat, and Avinashilingam for NIRF rankings under the 'Overall' category. Check out the year-by-year comparison of Tezpur University with other top institutes: IIITDM Kancheepuram IARE IEM Kolkata Integral University Lucknow Islamic University of Science and Technology YMCA UST Faridabad JNTUA College of Engineering, Ananthapuramu

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Integral University Lucknow is spread across 120 acre of land. More than 2,500 students live in on-campus hostels. Some of the facilities offered by the university are mentioned below:
Check out more on Integral University Infrastructure in the below videos:
list: The campus is only 30 km from Lucknow airport and railway station
The seminar hall is well-equipped with audio-visual facilities and can accommodate 400 students
Two special lecture theatres are available for closer interaction between the recruiters and the students. Each lecture theatre is built like an amphitheatre and has a seating of 80 students
Air-conditioned group discussion rooms/ interview rooms/ conference rooms

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Integral University has central as well as departmental library. The central library has the collection of more than 0.1 million documents comprising of books, theses, journals, dissertations and CDs/DVDs in the fields of applied sciences, bio sciences, engineering, medical sciences, education, humanities, literature and management with a seating capacity of 600 readers. The library collection includes 99255 volumes. The library also has the subscription of 300 printed and 7010 online journals with 2731 eBooks, 47000 articles, 3700 full text articles and 5875 indexed articles through online databases like Oxford university press, Cambridge university press. The library is fully automated by automated software KOHA.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Integral University has 3 hostels for boys and 2 hostels for girls. The facilities provided in the hostels are common room equipped with indoor game facilities, playground and courts for outdoor games like badminton, volleyball, cricket, skating, lawn tennis, basketball, etc., gymnasium, 24 Hrs. wi-fi, water purifier, parking, guest rooms, reading room.

data.description: Integral University Lucknow faculty are diploma, degree, and PhD holders. Integral University in Lucknow has well-skilled and knowledgeable faculty members. The faculty at Integral University in Lucknow are great scholars and have many research papers published in their name. The university also arranges faculty and student exchange programmes.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 431 published reviews , 376 reviews are verified.

highlights.summary:
Founded in 2005, Islamic University of Science & Technology (IUST) is a public university which is based in Pulwama region of Jammu & Kashmir. Established by the J&K state government, it is accredited with Grade ‘B’ by NAAC and is duly recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC) under Section 2(f) and Section 12(b) of UGC Act. All the technical and nursing programmes offered by IUST have gained approval from Indian Nursing Council (INC) and All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
IUST has strong tie-ups with numerous prestigious institutions such as United Nations University of Peace Costa Rica, Delhi University, University of Kashmir and Tokyo University of Foreign Studies, to facilitate technical, academic and cultural exchange. It comprises five schools including 18 departments and colleges that offer 11 doctoral, 14 PG, 13 UG, three diploma programmes and one certificate course in Arabic language.
The key highlights are tabulated below:
UGC, AICTE, AIU, NAAC Accreditation (Grade 'B')
Application mode (when admissions are open)
Check out more on IUST Highlights :
