KLE Technological University Hubli Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: KLE Technology University, Hubli.

detailed_review.Placements: 40 LPA is offered to 16 students. It’s heavy for E and C students, and it is good. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, Infosys, etc. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA. About 90 percent of students get placed and get their jobs, so it is a very good college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi speed is low, but the infrastructure is very good. The canteen is also good, the mess is also good, and medical facilities are free. Sports are very encouraging, and they have a separate building for sports and games. That’s all, the infrastructure is also good. They have many labs and everything.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They all have Ph.D. degrees. Their teaching qualities overall are very good. The students are very ready for placements. Exams are difficult, but the pass percentage is around 95 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Even in recession, many other colleges had a good placement rate, but our college had such a bad placement rate. Only 14 companies visited our campus, and only 5 of them are software-based. 3 are core electronics, others are coaching institutes and non-teaching like sales executive. The highest package is 7 LPA, but of the pool campus, 3.6 LPA is the lowest. Amarakosha, Vegam, Minfy are a few companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are good and have good instructors and equipment. But one thing is that equipment are not enough and get outnumbered by the number of students. Faculty members are knowledgeable but do not have an interest in teaching us; most of them are like that. Only a few of the faculty members are supportive and help us to skill up.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and the teaching quality is very nice and they are well qualified and knowledgeable. Our college is under VTU order. It only listens to VTU rules and regulations and follows according to that university. Personally, I think passing is not difficult but depends on how you study for it. There is not much break in this college; you always have to work and study.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent college with great facilities on campus, but the academics can be better.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements at KLE Teach are decent but not the best. I have seen and heard from seniors that roughly 40-50% students manage to get placed. The biggest recruiters are Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Bosch, and Deloitte. The average package offered is around 4 LPA. Most of the offers are for roles in IT services, software development, testing, and consulting. Core branch students also get a few opportunities. Around 30-40% manage to get placed through the college of tie-ups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a really good infrastructure. Classrooms are clean, spacious, and well-equipped with projectors and Wi-Fi. Labs are well-maintained with the required equipment. The library is big with plenty of books and digital resources. Hostel rooms are decent with proper facilities, and Wi-Fi works fine. Mess food is okay, but not like home, but it's still manageable. While the canteen has better options. Sports facilities like basketball, cricket, and indoor games are available. Overall, campus infrastructure is supported for both academics and student life.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are mixed. Some professors are really helpful and knowledgeable, while others are average in teaching quality. The curriculum is decent but not fully industry-oriented, so extra skills outside of classes are needed to stay ahead. Exams are manageable if you study regularly, though a few can be tricky. Overall, the pass percentage is fairly high, but scoring marks require some effort. In short, academics are okay, there is much scope for improvement in teaching methods, and making the syllabus more industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college mainly for its reputation and the variety of opportunities it offered. The best part of the campus life there is the fests, clubs, and plenty of extracurricular activities that keep things lively. The crowd is diverse, and it's easy to connect with people from different backgrounds. Campus is well-connected and has a good atmosphere on the improvement side. I feel that the curriculum could be more industry-oriented, and the placements of core branches need to be more. Overall, the experience has been positive and engaging.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college for those who really are into engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: ECE students are placed into good companies with a great package. Texas Instrument has provided a great package to the ECE students over here, and internships are provided to the students on and off the campus. All sub-branches from ECE are in good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus here is huge. We get Wi-Fi all over the college, and get to see all kinds of fully equipped modern labs. The college provides a huge campus that has separate buildings for each department. The canteen offers all kinds of food varieties and a McDonald's connected to the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is supportive and friendly. The courses are basically outcome-based learning, so what is being taught never goes to waste. Startups and projects or innovative ideas are highly supported and funded by the college, and clubs play a role too.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering ( Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: Good placements and great campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, 90% of students got placed. The highest package is 28 LPA and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon AWS, Toshiba, and others. You can check the placement information on our college website. The highest package is 41 LPA from Toshiba, and he was a CS student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi is fast and a good network. It is available everywhere on campus. The food and hostel are good compared to other hostels in Hubli. There are gymkhana, gym, and all sports activities. The gymkhana serves several sports like badminton, basketball, and all other sports. Tennis is also there.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is good and well-disciplined. The quality of teaching is good. They make students industry-ready. They update their curriculum every year. The course curriculum is exactly correct as the industry requires. They also has great labs for every subject and domain.
detailed_review.Other: My course is best as AI is booming everywhere. I had an interest in machine learning and all. There are good domains and all for students. The events are colorful and great. Connectivity and campus are all good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Journey to your goals, really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is really good. Everyone will get placement here, and the course you opted for will be great. Also, the highest package is 51 LPA, and the lowest salary is 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities at college are really outstanding. It provides free Wi-Fi all the time and also has a library which we can study. It has a ground for sports which they will be giving facilities. The mess is also good. In hostel also there's free Wi-Fi which works 24X7. The infrastructure is really good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at this university are very nice. Teachers are really nice also. The semester exams are moderate like it depends on your preparation how it will also. The pass percentage is good. Almost everyone will pass. And teaching quality is outstanding. They provide the best teaching staff and other activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Automation and Robotics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best campus, fests are amazing, professors are friendly and helpful.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, 100% of students got placed with an average salary of 3.2 LPA to 9.5 LPA maximum. Mercedes-Benz is the top recruiter. TCS recruited 11 students for the internship and offered them full-time jobs. Most of them are in designing and IT roles, and the full-time employees.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available all over the campus, and the library has different sections, which is very good. The canteen food is also good. The sports arena has a very big living space to be active, and we have a gym. Facilities like squash, table tennis, basketball court, throwball court, and the best badminton court are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are highly helpful and qualified. The course is fully relevant, and the hands-on experience helps more in the semesters. Exams are not that difficult if we attend lectures. The teachers are friendly and supportive, and they also give the opportunity to attend conferences and publish papers.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest. It provides hands-on experience and new opportunities. I would like to have more electives. The food and campus surroundings are extremely good, and we can get everything handy on the campus and in the surroundings.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Worth the money, good college life.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 80% of students are placed, with the highest package being 28 LPA, the lowest 3.5 LPA, and an average of 4.5 LPA. Companies like Bosch, Amazon, Amagi, TCS, Infosys, and some startups recruit here, and students get free internships from the college as well as internship recommendations from faculty, while many also secure off-campus internships with companies like Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has good Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms and library. They clean the classrooms every day. They have also built a new cafeteria. Mess food is average, hostel rooms are average. Sports and games are good, with many options for both girls and boys. Sports are played regularly, and students also go for inter-college competitions.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, knowledgeable, and well qualified, the curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready, while the semester exams range from hard to moderate difficulty, with about 50% of questions sometimes coming from previous papers, and more than 70% of students pass.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fests are good. There are many scholarship options, and extracurricular activities are also available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good placement for all students, and it is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: It may place the final year of the college, all students are placed in a company which are under a registration with a college. These companies come to the college and take the students directly. The students are going to work for the company, and it is so nice and talk to you, in the recruiting company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good. We have cricket, hockey, etc. There is food available of all varieties. Departments have required photos. The college campus is also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very qualified and knowledgeable. They have a lot of knowledge. All the students score good percentage in the college.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am particularly interested in Hindi. I also took part in the 4 CM Micro Festival and campus reflection. The college provides scholarships like SSP and supports students' skills development.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and good placements are provided here.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students get placed in my course. The highest package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 5 LPA.  Top recruiting companies like L&T, UltraTech Cement, etc., visit the college to hire students from our course.  90% of students got internships in companies like L&T and UltraTech Cement. Roles like site engineer, executive engineer, etc., are offered here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has excellent facilities like 100 Mbps Wi-Fi, neat classrooms, and a neat library. The infrastructure is very nice. Excellent quality and hygiene of food is provided in hostels. It has a canteen. It has good medical facilities. Good sports and games are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has excellent teachers. They are highly qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable in teaching quality. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not difficult. If we study well, we can easily clear exams.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in my course, so I chose this course. The best thing is they provide good jobs in big companies. Nothing should be improved here. Excellent events are organised in our college, like an auto expo, etc. Fests are very nice. The campus crowd is minimal. The connectivity is nice, and surroundings are very nice. It has excellent scholarships and excellent activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure only.

detailed_review.Placements: Maybe around 100 people. Juniper Networks, AWS, and a few other big companies offer good placement. My GPA is already 7.2 due to the teaching, so there’s no exception.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is awesome here, that's what I fell for. The mechanical building is the main highlight of the infrastructure. It looks just amazing, just like a triangle. The butterfly garden in front of the clinic is also awesome, especially with lights at night. There are mainly no games or sports activities here, but that is enough for some people.
detailed_review.Faculty: I hate exams, mainly because there are 2 ISAs and 1 ESA. Sometimes all 3 are there, sometimes nothing, and sometimes only 2 ISAs, and the semester is over. It creates a lot of confusion. This confusion has a bad impact on the mind, and we can't concentrate.
detailed_review.Other: Neophytes 5.0 is our fresher's day. There's an official Technological University account on Instagram where you can get more details.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering ( Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: I love the campus, infrastructure, and also labs. I like the way they divide classes by CGPA.

detailed_review.Placements: For placements, about 10 to 15 companies come for recruitment, but it has been very difficult due to the recession. The highest package is 45 LPA, with an average package of 6 LPA. Initially, we need to maintain a CGPA to be eligible for placements. About 70 to 80% may get placed, but only a few get high packages, which depend on their skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for learning the course and extra activities is incredibly good. The hostel is decent, and the food is also kind of decent neither too good nor too bad. The gym, college, sports arena, and parking are quickly accessible from the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our university has changed the syllabus for my batch, and of course, the syllabus is better than that of my seniors. A few faculty members always make us think about real-world applications, and exams of those faculty members are tough. They provide mock papers for the exam, whereas their easy mock papers look difficult.
detailed_review.Other: Overall, the campus experience in our college is decent. Our college organizes multiple technical festivals, and there are many clubs that students can join to learn things beyond academics, which can help with their placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering ( Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: The overall review of KLE Technological University, Hubli.

detailed_review.Placements: Frankly, 70-90% of students get placed depending upon the market of that particular year. The highest salary is 14 LPA and minimum salary is 5 LPA. Mass recruiters are TCS and Bosch. This course has both the academic structures of CSE and AI learnings, but the students must learn AI-ML course on his/her own.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure for learning the course and extra activities is incredibly good. The hostel is decent, and the food is kind of decent, not too good nor too bad. Gym, college, sports arena, and parking are quickly accessible from the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are extraordinarily good, supportive, and helpful. The college itself is student-friendly. They support the academic and overall development of the student. The course curriculum is relevant to the industry standards for sure. It makes students ready to face the interviews confidently.
detailed_review.Other: Events are less. Wish there are even more events. But as an alternative we have clubs for each department, for example, code club, music club, drama club, world's worth for language proficiency, media club, etc. These clubs actually help in improving hands-on skills and team spirit.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Solid curriculum with a focus on self-study and networking.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has an impressive placement record. Around 70-80% of students are successfully placed in top companies. The highest salary package offered is still competitive, at approximately 30 LPA - 35 LPA. The average salary package has seen a decline, hovering around 12 LPA - 15 LPA. Leading companies like Amazon, Infosys, and Cognizant continue to recruit. There has been a noticeable drop in the number of hiring companies visiting the campus in recent years.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College offers good infrastructure with Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, classrooms, and a vast library. The hostel provides decent accommodation. The food is good and medical facilities are available on campus. The university also offers sports facilities. In sports arena, it has a badminton court and a basketball court.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are qualified, with most teachers being knowledgeable and helpful. They are approachable. The course curriculum is relevant, covering the key areas required for industry readiness. However, there could be more updates to align with the latest industry trends. The semester exams are not so difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for its strong academic foundation and good career opportunities. However, we should do self-study for better placements. I wish the curriculum focused more on real-world projects and internships. The campus offers great events, extracurricular activities, and various clubs to help with networking and valuable industry connections.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A comprehensive review of KLE Tech.

detailed_review.Placements:
Almost 70-80% of students get placed in mechanical engineering; the remaining students often pursue higher studies in reputed colleges.
The highest package is 17-25 LPA from core companies like Bosch or Tata Motors.
The average package is 5-7 LPA.
Top recruiting companies are BOSCH, TATA, JSW, L&T, TCS, Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The entire campus is equipped with high Wi-Fi speed. 
Mechanical labs are fully maintained with the latest machinery tools for hands-on learning. 
Specialized labs, like control systems labs and CAD/CAE labs, are also available.
The library often offers a wide range of book collections and also supplies additional books for competitive exams. Hostel students can opt for rooms with double sharing and triple-sharing rooms are generally clean with basic furniture; however, some students feel that the facilities can be improved.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The faculty members are generally approachable and tend to assist students with academic challenges.
The majority of faculty members hold degrees in master's or Ph.D. Several have industrial experience. The course curriculum is designed to cover majority of foundational topics such as fluid dynamics, Thermodynamics manufacturing processes, etc.
The semester exams are considered to be moderately difficult. 
The pass % is typically around 80-85%.
detailed_review.Other: I have always been fascinated about how machines and systems work. I was always curious about the mechanism behind it. Events in this college take place annually but technical events are something happening frequently.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Excellent infrastructure at KLE Tech, Hubli.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of the students were placed in my course this year. The highest package that was offered was 12 LPA from Bosch. Top recruiting companies are JSW, Mercedes Benz, Bosch, and many more. Majorly, 90% of the students get internship opportunities. The roles that are offered are graduate engineer training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are excellent and are provided by the college. Rooms are generally clean and well-maintained, and hostels provide options for single, double, and triple B.Ed sharing. Wi-Fi is also provided here, although the speed can vary from place to place. Hostels are secured with 24/7 security guards and CCTV surveillance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are doctorate holders and are qualified from well-known universities such as IITs & NIITs, etc. KLE TECH's mechanical engineering curriculum is well-designed to meet industry standards. It focuses on core subjects like Thermodynamics, Fluid Mechanics, and Strength of Materials, coupled with electives like CAD/CAM and Industry 4.0 technologies.
detailed_review.Other: In my opinion, this course is much more logical than any other course. Designing complex components is what I wanted to learn, and that's why I opted for this college/course.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Unfiltered opinion about my college. Satisfied with the placements but not with the social life.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are above average, as there are many students getting core offers from companies like AWS, Applied Materials, Extreme Networks, etc. But mostly there is mass recruitment like any other third-tier college. But placement tries that every student get at least one offer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college is good; they have just renovated all the hostels and hostel rooms. But what is the use of it when you can't enjoy it due to a bad social life? The library is well furnished and they also created a special lab for AI/ML students. Sports and gym facilities are also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum is average and exams are hectic; almost every day there is some exam or lab exam. The difficulty level is moderate. Out of 300 students in our branch, 15 failed to clear the exam. They offer internship opportunities in 3rd year.
detailed_review.Other: Campus life is not good, as this is a city far from Bangalore and there aren't many places to hang out with friends. There also aren't any clubs functioning. College hardly conducts fests. The connectivity of the college is good as it is in the middle of the city.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college with fewer negative remarks, a good college to build a career in the engineering field.

detailed_review.Placements: 50-75% of students get placement offers. The highest was 44 LPA and the lowest was 6 LPA. Infosys, SmartDrive System, and Amazon are the top recruiting companies. 70-80% of students get internship opportunities from Electronic and Electrical Engineering with different companies like Infosys, SmartDrive System, Amazon, and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is amazing. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. Classrooms are clean and hygienic. The library is very good and is available from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm. Only college members are allowed to enter the library. Hostels are also clean and hygienic, but the hostels are quite costly, though comfortable. The food in the mess is of very good quality. Equal priority is given to both education and sports. There is a clinic on campus which is available to all college students, irrespective of the branch.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified and experienced. They are student-friendly and help us clarify our doubts. The teaching helps us connect the concepts with real life. The problems we solve are based on real scenarios. As I am in the 1st semester of 1st year, I haven't faced the semester exams yet. As we discussed with seniors, they said that "the questions raised are very relevant to the problems solved in classes." The passing percentage is 95%. But knowing the passing percentage doesn't mean the college quality; it depends upon you.
detailed_review.Other: As I am passionate about electrical engineering, I chose this college because campus selection is regularly held here.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Empowering Minds and Transforming future: KLE TECHNOLOGICAL UNIVERSITY.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70% of students are placed every year in our college by Infosys, Amazon Web Services, Bosch, Trilogy, Deloitte, Accenture, etc. The highest package offered is about 43 Lacs to the student of the CSE branch and the average salary package is around 3 Lacs. The roles offered by the companies are junior manager, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure here is just awesome and the laboratories are equipped with advanced technologies and machines. The classrooms are large and well-ventilated and have digital boards. The college has a vast collection of books in the library, over 1 Lac books are present in the library. The hostel is hygienic and food quality is also good and the kitchen here is ISO certified. The college also has 2 gyms and sports arena facilities for the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers here are well-qualified and experienced and clarify every doubt of the students and they are very polite towards the students. The curriculum is designed in such a way that the students can build a strong background in engineering science, mathematics, analog and digital electronics, embedded systems, etc. These all things help the student to improve his skills and subject knowledge and build his career in a way more successful.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course as I am interested in electrical since my childhood days and at present, in India, the semiconductor industry is booming and to that industry, the need for electronics engineers is much needed. I wish it would be a bit easier because I feel it is a tough branch in whole engineering. Events are organized occasionally by the college clubs and the connectivity to the college is also good as it is located in the city center. Scholarships are also provided to the students who are meritorious by the government and the college too.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: The honest review about KLE Technological University Hubli.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a good number of placements in KLE Technological University Hubli as the campus is huge and beautiful. About 12,000 students are currently graduating in their own field. There is about 90 percent placement in KLE Technological University Hubli, Karnataka.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are plenty of facilities given by the university such as tremendous infrastructure for each and every department and a huge library that can accommodate 500 people at a time. Wi-Fi is throughout the campus with no problem of slow speed, and sports activities are encouraged by the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful and qualified in every subject. Doubt sessions are arranged every month, and the difficulty level of the exam is moderate. The semester exams are slightly tougher than the internal exams, and the semester exams are tougher. The pass percentage in semester exams is around 95 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my personal interest, and family support was also one of the reasons. Fests and events are multiple and in huge numbers every semester.

college_info.college_name: KLE Technological University Hubli Admission 2025: Courses, Eligibility & Selection, Fee, Seats

faqs.question: What are the entrance exams for KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University considers national or state-level entrance exams for admission to UG and PG courses. Candidates have to qualify any of the accepted exams for admission to the preferred course. The university conducts an entrance test for PhD programmes. Below is course-wise accepted entrance exams for KLE: Course Accepted Entrance Exams BE KCET/ COMEDK/ JEE Main BArch NATA MTech Karnataka PGCET MBA Karnataka PGCET or CAT/ KMAT/ CMAT for admission under Management quota MCA PGCET or KMAT/ Karnataka PGCET  (for Management quota)

faqs.question: How can I get admission at KLE Technological University Hubballi?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University shortlists candidates for admission based on their merit or entrance exam scores.The university considers the merit of the aspirants in the qualifying exam for BBA, BCom and BCA. The university accepts entrance exams such as JEE Main, KCET, Karnataka PGCET, etc. for admission to specific UG and PG courses. Aspirants can also get admission under the Management Quota provided they fulfil the selection requirements.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BE at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University BE tuition fee range between INR 1.2 lakh and INR 10.5 lakh . Apart from this the total course fee shall include more components such as tuition fee, security deposit, and more. Candidates are required to pay some amount of the total fee at the time of admission for seat confirmation. Furthermore, the mentioned fee is as per the Karnataka Examination Authority, KCET.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for admission to BE at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: For admission to a BE course at KLE Technological University , the applicant should have passed Class 12 or equivalent from a recognised board with at least 45% aggregate. Additionally, aspirants should have studied Mathematics, Physic and Chemistry/ Biotechnology/ Biology/ Computer Science as the main subjects. Candidates also have to present the pass certificates at the time of form filling and admission. The documents are required for document verification.

faqs.question: What is the procedure for taking BE admission at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University BE admission is entrance-based. Candidates can apply for the UG programme, if they have a valid score of JEE/COMEDK/KCET. Apart from this, it is also necessary that the aspirants meet the prescribed eligibility criteria for selection. Eligible students can further visit the university official website to complete the application procedure and qualify for selection.

faqs.question: What is KLE Technological University Cutoff COMEDK for BE?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University accepts COMEDK scores for admission to the BE courses followed by COMEDK counselling. Candidates seeking admission can refer to the table given below to check out the previous year's cutoff trends for the General All India category students:

faqs.question: What is the fees for MBA programme at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for an MBA at KLE Technological University is INR 2 lakh . There can be other components as well included in the total fee such as security deposit, library fee, and more. The tuition fee component is charged annually/semesterly. Some of the fee components can be one-time chargeable, such as a security deposit. The mentioned fee is further as per the official website/sanctioning body. It is, however, subject to changes and hence, is indicative.

faqs.question: How can I get a seat in MBA at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University offers seats to candidates in the MBA programme based on their scores in Karnataka PGCET. Aspirants applying for admission under the Management Quota must pass CMAT, CAT, KMAT, or PGCET for admission to the MBA course. Besides, aspirants must also fulfil the eligibility requirements. There are a total of 60 seats in the MBA programme of KLE.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MBA at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: Candidate must have passed graduation in an allied discipline from a recognised institute/ university with a minimum of 50% aggregate to apply for KLE Technogical University MBA programme. Aspirants must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission. Besides, aspirants must pass the accepted entrance exams for admission.

faqs.question: What is KLE Technological University MBA cutoff?
faqs.answer: KLE Technological University MBA cutoff is baed on Karanataka PGCET scores followed by the counselling. As the KLE Technological University MBA cutoff 2023 is yet to be announced, candidates can chech the previous year cutoff trends to get a better idea of cutoff:

faqs.question: Is KMAT accepted for MCA at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: Yes, KLE Technological University accepts KMAT score for admission under the Management Quota for MCA programme. For regular admission, aspirants need to pass Karnataka PGCET. Besides, aspirants must also complete their graduation to apply for MCA at KLE Technological University.

faqs.question: What is the cost of studying MCA at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for KLE Technological University MCA is INR 1.5 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Aspirants need to pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the university. The total fee for MCA is a sum of multiple components such as caution deposit, exam fee, library deposit, etc.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MCA at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass BCA, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field with at least 60% aggregate to apply for KLE Technological University MCA programme. Aspirants also need to qualify Karnataka PGCET for admission to MCA programme. Candidates must hold the documents supporting their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: How much is the total tuition fee for MCA course at KLE Technological University?
faqs.answer: Once the KLE Technological University MCA admission process is completed, students are required to pay the first installment of the tuition fees. As per the fee structure, the total tuition fee to pursue an MCA at KLETU is INR 1.5 lakh . Note: The above-mentioned fee is as per the official sources. However, it is indicative and subject to change.

faqs.answer: KLE Technological University applications are currently open. Aspirants who meet the eligibility requirements can apply for the preferred UG or PG programmes. Candidates need to fill out the enquiry form available on the university website for the application form. Aspirants need to pay an application fee to register for a course at KLE.

college_info.college_name: KLE Technological University Hubli Placement & Salary Insights

data.title: KLE Technological University Hubballi Placement Report 2024
summary: Companies such as Amazon, Texas Instrument and Mercedes–Benz offered highest package of INR 46.38 LPA, INR 28 LPA and INR 10 LPA , respectively in 2024 . Other than this, top recruiters like Deloitte and TCS placed 56 and 62 students during KLE Technological University Hubballi placements 2024. college_info.college_name: KCT Coimbatore: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Ranking, Scholarships

highlights.summary:
The Kumaraguru College of Technology was founded in 1984.The college is affiliated with Anna University and is also recognised by AICTE. In addition to this, the college is also accredited with A++ by NAAC. Kumaraguru College of Technology offers UG, PG and doctoral programmes for Engineering, Management and Computer Applications specialisations.
Further, the institute offers scholarships to the students. KCT Coimbatore admissions are entrance-based. The college offers admission to specific PG courses based on CEETA PG, TANCET or GATE score. The college also organises various activities such as faculty exchange programmes, study abroad programmes and international internship opportunities for better learning of the students.
Candidates can check the Kumaraguru College of Technology highlights in the table provided below:
Check out more on Kumaraguru College of Technology Highlights in the below video:

college_info_program.intro:
The flagship programmes offered at Kumaraguru College of Technology are BTech and MBA. The college offers these courses in affiliation with Anna University. In addition to this, the college also offers other UG, PG and doctoral programmes across streams such as Engineering, Computer Applications and Management. Candidates can check some of the popular programmes offered at Kumaraguru College of Technology in this space:

KCT Coimbatore Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best college I had seen.

detailed_review.Placements: 89 percent of students got placed in my course. Minimum Rs. 10,000 to 2 LPA package offered in my course. L&T and Infosys offer placements to my college. 50 percent of students from my course got internships with Infosys jobs in IT companies and trading companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My classroom has fast Wi-Fi and neat halls with an AC hostel, which has rooms with attached bathrooms and also has common bathrooms. Every night our hostel has a doctor meeting with the medicine. Mess with 100 fans, sports are studied without feeling super college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are well-studied. They interviewed to select well-qualified teachers to teach. Our college provides an industrial visit every week. Semesters are very easy to write with your own words, you won't fail in exams.
detailed_review.Other: My uncle suggested this course because he already worked in IT company in Bangalore. Every month, they conducted the programme to celebrate.

reviews.course: B.E. in Aeronautical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great college with placements, facilities, support, and faculty. KCT made my journey memorable.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the batch 2019–2023. In our class, there were 65 students, and at the time of placement, most students got placed in MNCs and other companies. In our class, 50 students opted for placement, and I think 40 got placed. If you guys are looking for quick placement within your college time, this is one of the best colleges for it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As you can also see, this college has the best infrastructure and hostel throughout India. You guys can also google it, and no wonder you will be shocked. Talking about the area, this college has a massive area of about 150 acres with massive grounds and laboratories overall in the college. This college also has a gym for the students and separate hostel facilities for boys and girls.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers will be helpful throughout your course. Talking about the strictness, if you want to achieve something in life, then this college is best for you guys. So if you guys are looking to change your life within college years or time, here you can do it easily as all the students and teachers are hardworking here.
detailed_review.Other: Talking about my course, I had a dream in my life to achieve good knowledge of aerospace, so I opted for it and liked it. If you guys are keen to know about the events, you will be surprised, as there are more than 65 fests throughout the year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Excellent college inside Coimbatore for students who love a green campus with a lot of opportunities

detailed_review.Placements: I chose the Engineering 4-year Information Technology course in Kumaraguru College of Technology, Coimbatore. I am currently in the second year, and I will be completing the course by 2028. The placements, as informed by the seniors and staff, were awesome. Almost 80% of students get placed in companies with an average package of ₹4 to 5 LPA, and almost 160 students joined Information Technology in the year 2024. The top recruiting companies for my college as of 2024 are Amazon, Wipro, Accenture, TCS, SAP, Cognizant, etc. Software Developer, Full Stack Developer, Cybersecurity Analyst, Data Analyst, and Cloud Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is the best, with all the requirements and facilities starting from the laboratories for all the departments like Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Structure, Embedded Systems, Cloud Computing, Mechanical Labs, and many more. The college also has enough auditoriums and halls, and even two theatres for mass crowd functions and other events. The hostel facilities are good, with enough water and daily cleaning, with three meals and one snack per day. The college has 3 canteen facilities and separate places to sit and eat. It also has a gym and a clinic. The food is vegetarian.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the staff members of the particular department strive to give the students their knowledge and experience. The lab facilities are well used by the staff members, and there are two to three mentors for every department. They will assist you with any queries, and there is a student council called OSA that takes care of the students' mental health and well-being. The semester exams are comparatively easy if the student focuses on the classes. No need to panic. The questions would obviously be easy and well-known to attend.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was interested in coding and computers, and Kumaraguru was my preferred college due to its placements and infrastructure.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechatronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Kumaraguru is a good college for an overall experience. Enjoy college life with good opportunities.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of students got placed every year. Eligible students mostly get placed. But if you have arrears and did not opt for the campus placements, you will not get a chance to be placed in the campus interview. Top companies that recruit our students are Solitone Technologies, Delta Electronics, and more. As my college is located in Coimbatore, many companies from Coimbatore may come for the placements. There are many possibilities to get an internship. Our college faculty members provide more opportunities by giving information about the available internship offers, but it is your responsibility to grab them.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides a vast green environment. There are Wi-fi facilities everywhere. Every classroom has projectors for PPT presentations. Our labs are good, but I would not say the best, i.e., mechatronics engineering. There is a central library with Wi-fi facility and library computers that students can use. There is a medical clinic present on the college campus and a free ambulance facility for transportation. My hostel life is good with well-maintained hostel buildings, Wi-fi facilities, room cleaning, laundry facilities, and gym are available. Mess food is good compared to other colleges, but it is pure vegetarian. Sports are encouraged in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and supportive if approached. There is a feedback system in our college. For every subject, every semester, there is feedback taken at the end. Students can share their thoughts on a specific faculty or a specific subject. Our semester exams are based on the course outcome, which ensures quality education. The pass percentage is 50%. Apart from the basic curriculum, our faculty members encourage us to participate in more co-curricular activities like hackathons and events at other colleges.
detailed_review.Other: Our college conducts many events throughout the academic year. You cannot expect more from a cultural event. There is only one big cultural event called Yugam that happens in February or March. But there will be many technical-related events happening throughout the year. For extracurricular activities, there are clubs and forums in which you can participate and enhance your college experience. Our college provides its scholarship for students who are good in academics and excel in extracurricular activities. It also provides all information about the available scholarships, from which I also benefited.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Don't you want to experience vibrant campus with excellent academics if you want, join Kumaraguru.

detailed_review.Placements: Students are requested to do internships in first year, from second year placement training will commence. There are much more opportunities if you are talented, clubs and forums play a major role. The highest package is 15 LPA. Many founders are formed in this college, and they give space to bring your talent out.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is awesome. This college gets an A+ in NAAC accreditation. Our campus has neat and clean infrastructure. Wi-Fi is available. Hostel is safe and secure, and only veg food is provided. Our campus is pet-friendly. Library is big and books are also available. Classrooms are perfect.
detailed_review.Faculty: They will update within a certain time. Two internal exams, and practical will happen. It has industry oriented syllabus and provides a knowledgeable syllabus. If you study and write it will be easy. They provide AI-generated question papers. They make sure you have more credit, and they will premium version of study-related apps for free.
detailed_review.Other: Scholarships are available. Very much importance for clubs and sports. Our campus is vibrant, not only for studies, and any talents are accepted. Many events will be conducted daily, two fests like Jananam, Yugam, then Pongal and Diwali celebration.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Kumaraguru College of Technology is absolutely the best Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Kumaraguru College of Technology was a more reputed engineering college in Coimbatore. Every year, more than 95% of students were placed in reputed companies. This college's alumni network was very strong. The college's placement training cell arranged more campus interviews every year. Yamaha, TCS, Infosys, Royal Enfield, Accenture, and TVS these companies visited the college for campus interviews. Students' salary packages ranged from 4 LPA to 10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Kumaraguru College of Technology has more than 20 courses. It had more spacious classrooms, more laboratories, and free Wi-Fi network facilities available in the college. This college had the biggest auditorium. The library was also there in the college. The college hostel and canteen food quality were very hygienic and healthy. Multiple sports ground facilities were also available in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Kumaraguru College of Technology's staff were more experienced and helpful person. The college's teachers used innovative teaching methods. They conducted more practical-oriented classes. So 95% of students passed the semester exams. Our department staff are more industry visits programs and workshop events in every year.
detailed_review.Other: Kumaraguru College of Technology was a more reputed placement college. So I chose this college. The college management conducted more sports events in every year. The college management also gave more scholarships to well-studied students. Transportation facilities were also good in this college. Overall, it was an excellent engineering college.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I like the college. It is a very nice college.

detailed_review.Placements: I have liked the infrastructure of the college very much. 80 to 90% of the students were placed in this college. I like the cafeteria in this college. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, TCS, etc. The highest package is 44 LPA and the lowest package is 4 to 5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is very good and pleasant. The rooms in a hostel are very and the wardens are very friendly. Good campus life. The facilities are very good. We have well well-organized library. The hostel is very clean and peaceful. Hostel foods are hygienic and tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members were very friendly and they are well qualified. They help the students with all their efforts. They teach us very practically. They do not ignore the student's doubts. They used to update the syllabus according to the trend. This helps the students to improve their skills.
detailed_review.Other: I have got this course in counseling. Our college conducts cultural events.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great academics and vibrant campus.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate of the college is about 85-90%. The highest salary package offered ranges from 15-20 LPA. The lowest salary package offered ranges from 2.5-3 LPA. The average salary package offered ranges from 4 -5 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Infosys, Qualcomm, Bosch, and Amazon visit the college to hire students from our course. About 60-70% of students got internships in companies like Bosch, TCS, and startups. Top roles like developer, embedded engineer, and system analyst are offered to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities for the ECE department are modern labs like VLSI, IoT, embedded systems, well-equipped classrooms,  24x7 Wi-Fi, and a vast library with updated resources. Hostel have comfortable rooms, good hygiene, and a study-friendly ambiance. Mess and canteen serves decent food quality with varieties. The canteen offers snacks and beverages. There is an on-campus clinic with basic medical services. There are excellent facilities for indoor and outdoor games, a gym, and regular sports events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified, knowledgeable, and supportive, ensuring quality teaching. The course curriculum is industry-relevant, blending theory and practical skills to prepare students for careers. Exams are moderately challenging, with a high pass percentage due to strong academic support.
detailed_review.Other: I chose ECE for its versatility and opportunities in IoT, AI, and telecom. The best aspects are practical labs, industry exposure, and knowledgeable faculty members. Improvements could include more electives and hands-on training. KCT offers vibrant fests, a diverse crowd, great connectivity, scholarships, and extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Textile Technology
reviews.review_title: KCT - Insight by middle bencher.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 90% of the eligible students are placed. The average salary package offered for my courses is around 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies for my course are Decathlon, Jockey, Renault Nissan, etc. Internships start from the second year. Entrepreneurship is also provided by the management.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has well-equipped infrastructure with library and labs. It is a Wi-Fi enabled campus covering all areas. Hostel food is good compared to other colleges. Other than hostel and mess, the campus has cafes like Kore, Namma Cafe, East Kore, and KS Cafe. Medical facilities are available 24X7.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are highly experienced, and update their knowledge to current trends. The course is relevant to current industry standards. This college provides several internship offers. The end-semester examinations are easy to moderate. The question paper is prepared by AI.
detailed_review.Other: The college contains several actively involved clubs started and run by seniors which gives industrial experience to students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Fashion Technology
reviews.review_title: Good choice. Nice faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage of our college is high. The minimum salary package offered is 4 LPA, and the maximum salary package is 30 LPA. Many companies visit our college to recruit students, such as Accenture, Wipro, TCS, and Soliton.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Awesome Ambiance: The hostel block is surrounded by a lot of trees, and it gives a good feeling of being around nature. So, any nature lovers, you are sure to be pleased.
Food: It is usual to say bad things about hostel food, but KCT hostels provide quality food with good taste.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers were very helpful to us, and the teaching quality was excellent. The semesters are difficult depending on your knowledge; 50% is the pass mark. KCT's faculty are praised for their dedication, approachability, and expertise, contributing significantly to the institution's positive academic environment.
detailed_review.Other: I chose my course through counseling. We can learn the technical aspects of fashion, and they teach from scratch.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Textile Technology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of faculty members and good placement, good infrastructure, facilities, etc.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 90% of students got placed from this course. Top recruiters include Shahi Export, Voltas, Decathlon, LMW, Ramco, and Himatsingha. The average salary package offered is around 5 LPA. More than 90% of students secured internships from this course. From second year onwards we have industrial visits.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All labs are well-equipped with good working machines. Classrooms are fitted with smart boards and are well-spaced. Many places have Wi-Fi facilities including hostel. Food and snacks at hostel are good and medical facilities are available 24/7. Regarding sports and games, we have good tutors and teamwork and achieved many prizes.
detailed_review.Faculty:
All teachers are very helpful and friendly. All teachers have more experience in teaching field and the quality of teaching is very good.
Difficulty in semester exams is a little less. Mostly everyone who studies at least 60% of the subject can pass exams easily. All exams are conducted based on Artificial Intelligence question paper. So it makes students more knowledgeable.
detailed_review.Other: Placement and quality of education for B.Tech Textile Technology in and around Tamilnadu is better in Kumaraguru College compared to other colleges. We have yearly 2 cultural programs. Many scholarships are available in our college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechatronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very satisfied, very low fee collected compared to other colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: I am studying in my first year in Mechatronics Engineering. As my seniors said, internships are provided to almost every student. The average package is about 6LPA. Almost 80% of students are getting placed in the past years. Many multinational companies do visit our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As I am a day scholar, I don't know much about hostels. But my friends said that food is very good and they don’t provide non-veg in our campus except eggs. There is a separate lab for every subject. Food in the canteen is good and the price is also normal.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and dedicated to their teaching. Teachers are easy to approach and friendly with students. Two interns per semester. Two semesters per year. Exams in the college are quite difficult. The pass percentage is 50%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechatronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a wonderful college with a good crowd, infrastructure, and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Core placements are decent but IT placements are good. The highest salary package offered is 25 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. Around 75-80% of students get placed in the mechatronics engineering department.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are top-notch. The quality of the food is very good. The library is a very nice place to be. Labs of the mechatronics engineering department have all facilities that are needed to study the course knowing every corner of it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very qualified. The curriculum is very industry-oriented. There are two internal exams. The first internal exam is a bit tough but it will be easy once students get a hold of it. Semester exams will be very easy if students listen in class. Students cannot pass by studying on the last day.
detailed_review.Other: The Yugam is the best event in the surroundings of Coimbatore.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering
reviews.review_title: A look into Kumaraguru Campus.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements provided by the college were very good and satisfied. The placements training program began from the third year onwards. Students can opt for both the IT services or core placements. Top recruiting companies are HP, Zoho, Schneider Electric, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The course was well framed and designed to meet industry expectations. The class rooms are well spacious. Many Wi-Fi spots are available in the college. The infrastructure of the hostels is worth the money. Only vegetarian foods are provided by the college and canteens inside the college campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Mostly all the faculties in the college are doctorates. They were well knowledgeable with practical ways of teaching. 50% of your total marks are considered to be a pass percentage in the college. For every semester exam, there were two internal exams along with practicals.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Kumaraguru College of Technology is absolutely best engineering college.

detailed_review.Placements: Kumaraguru College of Technology is one of the best engineering colleges in Coimbatore. This college conducts more than 15 campus interviews every year. This college placement training team brought Teach Mahindra, Tata Motors, Reliance, TVS, Royal Enfield, Hyundai, and Texmo companies for these college campus interviews. 95 percent of students placed in 2021 passed out batch. Salary packages are INR 2-10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Kumaraguru College of Technology has good classroom facilities. This college has more hitech mechanical laboratories, well-equipped library also here this college. This college provides free Wi-Fi network facilities on the college campus. Hostel facilities are also here at this college. Hostel and canteen food quality is good. Sports grounds and coaching staff are also available in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Kumaraguru college of technology professors are very friendly and helpful persons. They are more experienced people. They completed more master degrees and Ph.D. They conduct more model exams in every month. So more than 95 percent of students passed in all exams. Our department staffs arranges more industry visits programs and workshop events in every semester.
detailed_review.Other: Kumaraguru College of Technology campus environment was very nice. I am choosing a mechanical engineering course in this college because the college infrastructure and placement were excellent. So I select this college. This college conducts more sports events every month. This college management gives more scholarships and certificates to all students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Kumaraguru college of technology is really best college .

detailed_review.Placements: Kumaraguru college of technology placement is good. Many companies visited the college for campus interviews. Recruiting companies include Infosys, IBM, Zoho, Accenture, Decathlon, Tech Mahindra, TCS etc. 94 percentage students were placed in 2021. The highest salary package is 6 LPA, the lowest salary package is 2 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Kumaraguru college of technology infrastructure facilities are very good. Good classrooms facilities are available. Many computer laboratories facilities are also available with free internet. The college has good hostel facilities, hostel food's taste is average. Canteen food's taste is good. Many sports grounds facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college staffs are very experienced and knowledgeable. They motivate all students. They teach both English  and local languages. So all students easily understand the lessons. 95 percentage students passed in semester exams. Our college professors arrange many industry visits programs in every semester.
detailed_review.Other: The college conducts many sports events. Many coaching staffs works in this college. So our college students win medals for many games. Winning students get more scholarships and certificates. The college has more than 16 courses. The college fees structure is very low.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good environment and peaceful campus with number of trees.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 90 percent of people get placed in 2023; the highest package is about 15 lacs per annum. Many of the top companies, like TCS, Wipro, Audit, ZOGO, Bosch and many MNC companies, are recruiting our students for roles like management head, manager, and project intern.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel contains Wi-Fi facilities in the M gateway and also in the study halls. The quality of the food is good and our mess only contains vegetarian meals whenever we require non-vegetarian meals, which we ordered through Zomato and Swiggy. The sports are well-known in our college, and the college gives preference to the sports .
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are basically very friendly in manners and also well-wishers in their professions. The staff is teaching the constant very effectively. 
Our curriculum is industry-related and our curriculum is flexible; we can choose nearly 10 courses by elective method. 
Pass percentage of KCT is above 90 percent.
detailed_review.Other: As electrical and electronics engineering is the core course you can survive in any decade, EEE is very important. Our college has fests like Jananam in January and Yugam in March.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Kumaraguru College of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Really superb placements are available at our college. After completing graduation, students who have been placed in companies are immediately called for work. Nearly 89% of students got placed in the 2023 placement records. Companies like TCS and Zoho hire students from our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They deliver a variety of foods of high quality, and they are very hygienic too. Students are advised to play their interested sports. Our faculty members give on-duty (OD) to students who need it to practice sports and to participate in cultural events. Medical facilities are available within the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are highly helpful and motivating. Their teaching is worth every single penny, and they deliver high-quality content. They actively participate in camping and other social activities with the students. It's a little bit tougher to crack exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Kumaraguru College of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement in KCT is good. MNCs like Robert Bosch, etc. visit regularly. The minimum package is around 12 LPA, the maximum package is around 16 LPA, and the average package is around 4 LPA. The placement training is very good and the college also provides an internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel catering service is under Madhampatty Catering Service, which is one of the best catering services in Tamil Nadu. The hostel was very clean. The food quality is very good. Veggies are provided. Non-vegetarian foods are not allowed in hostels. We can only eat in the dining hall.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and all are well-educated, qualified teachers with helpful minds. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready for innovative projects that allow them to survey topics beyond the course. One main exam and two internal exams are written in one semester.
detailed_review.Other: The course provided very much help to the students to get placed. The exams were not that hard, as the faculty members were good and it was very easy to pass the exams. The curriculum enables the students to get ready to solve real-world problems.

reviews.course: B.E. in Automobile Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good for those who think of becoming an engineer.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college, around 1500 people are in my batch. Around 1000 students have chosen placements. The highest package is 24 LPA. In my department, Renault Nissan gave the highest package. 90 percent of students got their placements with more than two companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The infrastructure is excellent. Each and every department have very good lab facility to gain practical knowledge. The hostel also has excellent and healthy food.
In the college, more than 20 clubs are available. 
Sports and extracurriculars are very useful.
detailed_review.Faculty: The best part is that each and every faculty member has very good knowledge of their respective field. So, each and every student gets very good knowledge to explore in the industries. Exams are a great way to expand their knowledge and recall it. After completing their final semester, each and every student is ready to explore their knowledge in their respective companies.
detailed_review.Other: Very good for those who choose an engineering career.

college_info.college_name: KCT Coimbatore Admission 2025: Dates, Fee, Eligibility, Application Process

admission.title: KCT Coimbatore Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: KCT Coimbatore admissions are entrance-based. The college offers admission to specific PG courses based on CEETA PG, TANCET or GATE score. For its flagship programme BTech, the admission is based on merit followed by TNEA Counselling. Kumaraguru College of Technology offers 14 UG and 14 PG courses in Engineering, Management and Computer Application streams. The courses are offered in affiliation to Anna University . Interested candidates can apply online for KCT Coimbatore admissions .

faqs.question: How can I get seat in Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking admission in BE/ BTech programme need pass Class 12 and participate in TNEA Counselling for admission. Kumaraguru College of Technology considers TANCET scores for admission MBA and MCA programmes. The selection for M.Tech programme is based on CEETA PG or GATE scores. The seats are allotted to aspirants in PG programmes via the counselling conducted by the college.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted by Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: KCT Coimbatore accepts national or state-level entrance exams for admission to PG courses. The college accepts GATE or CEETA-PG score for M.Tech admission. For MBA and MCA, the college selects candidates based on TANCET score. Besides, candidates also need to fulfil the eligibility requirement for the applied course.

faqs.question: Are admissions open at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology admissions are open for 2025 session. Aspirants have to fill out the application form online on the college's website for the preferred course. The college offers admission to UG programme based on merit of the candidates. For PG courses, aspirants must have a valid score in any of the accepted entrance exams.

faqs.question: Is TANCET required at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology considers TANCET scores for admission to MBA and MCA programmes. Besides TANCET, aspirants must also have completed their graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate. Candidates who are allotted seat in the college based on their TANCET score have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat.

faqs.question: Is GATE compulsory for M.Tech at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology accepts GATE scores for admission to M.Tech programme. However, it is not compulsory. Aspirants can also get admission through CEETA PG scores. Besides, candidates must also have passed BE/ BTech with at least 50% aggregate to get admission in the M.Tech programme.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MCA at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed their graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MCA programme at Kumaraguru College of Technology. Besides, aspirants must also have a valid score in TANCET for admission. Candidates must have documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: What is the cut off marks for KCT Coimbatore?
faqs.answer: KCT Coimbatore considers the entrance exam score for admission to PG courses. Aspirants are required to score equal or above KCT cutoff for admission. In 2024, TNEA cutoff for BE/ BTech course was the highest for Computer Science Engineering. The cuoff for CSE was 3524 in 2024. Besides, TANCET score was 1551 in 2024 for MBA course for General Category candidates.

faqs.question: Does Kumaraguru College of Technology accept TNEA score?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology offers admission to BTech based on merit in the last qualifying exam. Applicants also need to participate in TNEA Counselling and select KCT as the preferred college for admission. TNEA counselling is conducted online in 4 rounds as per the Schedule. Candidates need to participate in corresponding rounds based on their rank.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for Kumaraguru College of Technology BTech is INR 2 lakh . KCT fee is cumulative of multiple components, such as tuition fee, hostel fee, etc. Candidates must pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in Kumaraguru College of Technology for BTech with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: Candidates are required to fulfil the eligibility criteria to apply for BTech at Kumaraguru College of Technology. Aspirants need to complete Class 12 with at least 45% aggregate to apply for BTech programme. Hence, candidates with 60% aggregate in Class 12 can get admission to BTech programme.

faqs.question: What is the TNEA score for BTech at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: There were different TNEA cutoffs for B.Tech according to specific fields at Kumaraguru College of Technology for 2023.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at Kumaraguru College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology offers two-year MBA programme divided into four semesters. Aspirants also need to complete graduation with at least 50% aggregate to apply for MBA. The college offers MBA in:

faqs.question: What is the MAT 2026 date for Kumaraguru College of Technology MBA admissions?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology accepts various national-level entrance tests, including MAT, for admission to its MBA programme. Thus, candidates seeking admission to the KCT Coimbatore MBA can apply via a valid MAT score. As per official sources, MAT PBT will be held on March 1, 2026 and MAT CBT will be held on March 8, 2026.

faqs.question: Is pursuing MBA at Kumaraguru College of Technology expensive?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for Kumaraguru College of Technology MBA is INR 35,000 . KCT fee is a sum of multiple components, such as tuition fee, hostel fee, etc. Selected candidates must pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: When are Kumaraguru College of Technology application forms out?
faqs.answer: Kumaraguru College of Technology application forms are currently available on the official website of the college. Candidates meeting the eligibility criteria can apply online. Aspirants will need to pay an application fee to register for any of the UG or PG courses.

text: Check out details for Kumaraguru College of Technology here:
Check out details for Kumaraguru College of Technology infrastructure in the below videos::

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The library is extensive owning 67598 titles and 107534 volumes and has a subscription to 186 print journals, 8829 online international journals and 59 magazines for scholarly communication. The central library also provides access to printing and e-resources. Open access system is being followed to access the books and journals.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: There are three other smaller cafes and refreshment outlets inside the campus. The spacious, airy & trendy cafeteria offers ample scope for students to break free from their arduous schedules and enjoy appetizing food in an extremely casual yet pleasant ambiance.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The gents’ hostel comprises of four blocks with a capacity to accommodate 1335 students. The Ladies hostel has a capacity to accommodate 987 students. All men and women residents of the hostel are provided rooms on a triple sharing basis. All common areas like dining, washrooms, lobby, terrace, etc. are provided separately for men and women’s hostels.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: The College has a fleet of buses, vans and cars to transport students and staff from different places in and around Coimbatore to college and back. These buses operate along different routes starting from different locations approximately between 6.30 and 6.45 a.m. At present 8 buses and 6 mini busses are used.

facilities.name: Labs
available_facilities: Bio Organic and Chemical Engineering Lab
Engine Performance And Emission Testing Laboratory
Two Wheeler And Three Wheeler Laboratory

college_info.college_name: MAKAUT: Courses, Admissions 2025, Placements, Fees, Eligibility, Rankings

highlights.summary:
Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, formerly known as West Bengal University of Technology (WBUT Kolkata), is a public state university. It is located in West Bengal and is also known as MAKAUT. The University is approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). Additionally, it is accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). Various UG courses offered by MAKAUT are also accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology Kolkata offers UG, PG, Diploma, Doctoral and Certificate courses via its 200 affiliated colleges. These courses are offered across multiple streams such as Food Science and Agro Technology, Humanities and Social Sciences, Computer Science and Engineering, IT and Technology, Media Science and Entertainment, among others.
Admissions to these courses are offered through various entrance exams such as WBJEE, PGET, UGC NET (including JRF) / CSIR NET, and more. Talking about the placements, the highest package offered during MAKAUT placements 2022 was INR 44 LPA. Some of the top recruiters that have visited the MAKAUT campus for placements include Cognizant, Wipro and Infosys. Candidates can check below the major highlights of WBUT kolkata:
Number / Types of Scholarships Offered
9; Merit-cum-means, Post-Matric, Minority Category, etc
