MAKAUT Fees 2026
MAKAUT Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: The college is moderate, but it is still good.

detailed_review.Placements: According to college data, 70% of students got on-campus placement. The highest package from my course was around 6 LPA, and the lowest was around 1.5 LPA. Many companies came to recruit from our college, but the top ones were Amazon, TCS, Infosys, etc. Around 6–7 students get placed at Amazon from our department every year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my course/department was very good. What I liked about my college was a lot. We had dedicated 2 labs only for our department students. A seminar room was also present where students could discuss events and spend their time. There were also dedicated Wi-Fi and a single but well-maintained library. Although hostel students said the rooms were not that good. The food sometimes came out to be bad. The canteen food was definitely bad, and the medical facilities were not very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers/faculty members were very helpful for my course. Most of them had multiple degrees. Their teaching was good. The course curriculum was not completely relevant, but it definitely made students industry-ready. Semester exams were moderate and were conducted depending on the university (MAKAUT). The passing percentage was around 60%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it was one of the best courses from this college, but I think the studies could have been better. There were many (6–7) events that happened throughout the entire college year. The campus stayed crowded, and scholarships were available.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Lateral)
reviews.review_title: Good placement in 2026 with companies like TCS, Capgemini, Pinnacle, and HCL.

detailed_review.Placements: I entered the college through B. Tech lateral entry in the Computer Science and Engineering department. Companies like TCS, Capgemini, Pinnacle, and HCL visit our college for placements. The lowest package is 1.8 LPA. The highest package is 10 LPA. The college also offers internship opportunities like Yatri Sathi.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has good infrastructure. It is eco-friendly. It has well-structured labs and classrooms. Along with a library and Wi-Fi across the campus. College provides canteen food and medical facilities. It encourages sports and games, which are regularly conducted by the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good, supportive, and helpful. Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They provide good teaching quality. The college offers courses like B.Tech, Diploma, BCA, and BBA. Industrial visits and skill development programs are conducted. Semester exams are moderate, and the passing percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: The fee structure is affordable. The college offers SVM scholarships, and student credit card facilities are also available.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is good, and also profitable if we get placement, but the fee is too high.

detailed_review.Placements: Up to 20 companies came to students for placements, but with low packages. It's okay for freshers with the best coming packages. Small roles are given to students. Up to 40 percent of students in a class will get the placements. Top recruiting companies will get our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms are not bad, but the college hostel is too good with neat infrastructure. The cost of the hostel is high.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful to us during class time and also in other ways. They are knowledgeable and also qualified teachers. The teaching is slow but understandable, and they are trying their best to tell us everything. The course curriculum is relevant. This makes the students industry-ready. About the faculty, they are good in their place, but they take our freedom in the case of girls, this is good, but we are not kids as they think.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it's my passion. I have dreams about my own construction house. We work hard and learn more things.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Good environment and opportunities for enthusiastic students.

detailed_review.Placements:
In AIML, around 40 percent was placed last year. The highest package was around 9 LPA from our branch. And the lowest went near about 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are tcs, tcs ninja, wipro, accenture, deloitte, etc.
Very few got the internship last year like around 30 percent I can say. Top roles include SDE, finance, product manager, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is free Wi-Fi all over the campus with good speed. We get various facilities like library access, canteen with good price, beautiful amphitheatre, lifts, lush green campus, etc. Hostel is also good although the quality of food could be better. Various sports like cricket, badminton, volleyball, kho, and certain indoor games are also played by the sports lovers players of our campus. A medical room is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good and experienced. They are very supportive for our academic stuff. Teaching quality is interactive and not boring. Curriculum is relevant we get to learn basics in our first year and then more aiml oriented stuff in subsequent year. Although it could be more industry oriented. Semester exams are not tough at all, exams are scorable for a average candidate. The college is autonomous from this year. To pass you have to score 31 marks.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is more relevant according to the present scenarios as we know our future is all AI releted stuff so that's why I choose it. Best things about this course is that it trains u how to tackle real life problems within second using ai, this is the beauty. Various fests like kasar and events keeps organizing. There are various clubs u can join to increase your potential and enhance your skills and deploy the work u are Passionate about. Seniors are very supportive, u can easily connect and they will help u out.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good, but some changes are needed.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college is a government engineering college. Our college placement cell is not very active. In our college, a minimum 20% and a maximum 30% students are placed in different startup companies and startup firms. But our college provides an internship for only final year students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides Wi-Fi facility to all students, our classroom are not so big average 60 students can sit on a classroom. But our library is so big and well stocked. In our college 2 hostel is available one for boy and another for girls. But hostel food is not so good.
detailed_review.Faculty: In oOur college the faculty is very good and helpful in nature. Our faculty are highly qualified and knowledgeable. They studied in different universities abroad. They helped us at the time of examination. In our college 2 semester exams are held in a year. Semester exams are not very tough.
detailed_review.Other: In our college not very events are performed. Campus crowd is average. In our college 2 fest held in one year

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Chemical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A balanced college with good academic and campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, chemical engineering, almost 80 to 85 percent get placed every year. The highest package is around 12 LPA-14 LPA, and the lowest is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Himadri and HPL. Around 40 percent of students got internships in HPL or local companies in Haldia. Top roles offered in production engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has decent classrooms, labs, and Wi-Fi. The library is good for studying. Our library is open every single day and open from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM. Mess food is manageable, to be honest. Our campus has good medical support and sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the teachers are helpful and very good at behavior, and all the teachers are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant and gives basic industry exposure. Here, students pass easily if they study regularly in class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose chemical engineering because the placement is very good in our department. Better thing, I wish for connectivity.

reviews.course: BBA in Digital Marketing
reviews.review_title: It is the perfect college for you if you want to excel in management.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of the students get guaranteed internships with a guaranteed stipend. Some of the companies are lets get you placed, Oberoi Hotels, etc. We also get a lot of real life projects, which help us get real world experiences, and we are provided with a lot of certification programs. The minimum we can expect is 10k here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The smart boards are pretty good, the projectors are good, and the AC classrooms are great, plus the gym, cafe, and library are really great places to chill. The fans are all placed in good ways so we get ample amount of cooling, and the classrooms are bright as there are a lot of windows present everywhere.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are great here and provide 24/7 assistance and guidance. The course also focuses on building basics and helps us learn a lot of things which are out of the syllabus, and theres also a soft skills training programme. The best part is that the faculty members are real life experts on the things they are teaching us.
detailed_review.Other: A lot of events are being held, which are held by students themselves, and the administration willingly provides us with funds to host the events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Good placement this year, but infrastructure and facilities should be upgraded.

detailed_review.Placements: 60 percent of students are placed. The highest package offered is 22 LPA, and the minimum package offered is 3LPA. Wipro, DMG solution, Tutopia, and Cognizant are the top companies. Marketing, Technical, Sales, and Construction are the types of job roles offered here.  ECE branch is best here.  CSE IT, and AIML are not that good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi and a network jammer are both on the campus. Food quality is decent. Cantene is there, but the price is high. Hostel is on the college campus. Not so much space for parking. Good focus on sports and events organisation. Still in 2025, chalk and blackboards are used here. There is no smart classroom
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are decent. Not up to the point. Teaching quality is average. Not really industry ready curriculum. Mainly focused on core subjects. Semester exams are tough enough, performed under 360 ° CCTV surveillance and a strict invigilator.
detailed_review.Other: I got through the WBJEE counselling TFW seat, so I think its a good opportunity for me. It is a core tech stream so I took admission. Fests are held every year. Scholarship opportunities are available. GYM and sports are there.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: If you want to enjoy college life, please don't come here.

detailed_review.Placements: If you have potential, you can get a decent package. Many companies visited this year, but you should have a good skill set to crack those companies. Currently, placements are not very good in comparison to other colleges. An average package of 4 LPA is offered for all branches. In CSE-related, you can expect 5 to 6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Only girls' hostels are available on the campus, but there is no boys' hostel on campus. Hostel infrastructure is also not very good and well maintained. You will get Wi-Fi connection inside the hostel and on the entire campus. There is a library on campus that has so many books with good infrastructure management and seating arrangements.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are Bengali, there will be some issues for non-Bengali speakers, but if you ask them, they will explain in Hindi or English also. Teachers are well-qualified and educated. There are frequent examinations like surprise tests, mid-semester, and end-of-semester.
detailed_review.Other: The good thing about the college is that there is no such attendance policy, but in 1st year, you should maintain 70 percent at least. The campus is not that big. Fests are organised frequently, but no freshers' party is organised.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with it.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of students get placements in our college. The highest package offered is 12 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Wipro, Deloitte, Capgemini, etc., hire students. In my course, students can get SDE roles in different companies as junior and senior, and also with specialisation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good. The infrastructure is totally nice in our course. There are facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and a library. There are two libraries, one is small, and the other is a central library. Printing or Xerox shops are also there. The quality of facilities in the hostel is perfect. The food quality is also good. There is no dirty mess. On our campus, medical facilities are also provided. There are two grounds and a basketball court.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is perfect. This course makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are average, and we can easily get the passing percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest. It will give more knowledge about computers, and we will code in different languages as it improves our skills. In college, every year, events and fests are organised.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of the infrastructure, faculty and events.

detailed_review.Placements: 65% of students are placed in this course. The highest package is 6 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies for this course are TCS, Amazon, Flipkart, etc. 85% of students got internships from this course in various companies like TCS, Infosys and also in-campus internship. Roles like HR, marketing executive, data analyst, etc., are offered in this course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a huge library with thousands of books and free Wi-Fi. We have labs for all B.Tech courses. The building is air-conditioned. Food quality in the canteen and hostel is above average, with good, affordable prices. Medical facilities are good. The college is very much involved in events, sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very knowledgeable and helpful. They are quite interactive. The course curriculum is relevant. Semester exams in this college are not that difficult to pass, as the teachers provide proper materials before the exams, and the evaluation is done based on both practical and theoretical aspects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Honest Review AOT: Difficult exam, 75% attendance, infrastructure is beautiful.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students got into industry trading from Wipro. The top roles offered in my course are system engineer and GET. The top recruiting companies in our college are TCS and Cognizant. The highest package offered in our college is 9 LPA. The average and the lowest package offered in our college AOT are 4 LPA and 6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Mess is available in our college areas. Good quality food is available in the college canteen. Medical facilities and insurance are provided by the college. The gym and football ground are available in the college. The college library is good, and all books are available in our college library. Labs are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are very helpful. All teachers are qualified and experienced. They are helping with our project. Teaching quality was very advanced, and a digital blackboard was available in our college classroom. This course curriculum makes all students industry-ready. The semester examination is difficult.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good institution. I am satisfied with it.

detailed_review.Placements: 20 percent of students get placed. The average package offered in our course ranges from 2-3 LPA. Companies like iB Arts, TTEC, etc., visit the college for placements. 20 percent of students got internships from our course in some companies. The maximum roles offered in our department are in sales executive positions, and some of them are for the IT sector.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and the library are available in our college for our department. There is no hostel facility in our college. The canteen is available in our college. Many types of food are available in the canteen at an efficient price, and the food quality is good. Sports and games facilities are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not difficult in this college. 98 percent of students pass exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Pros and cons of enrolling in the college

detailed_review.Placements: About 60% of students receive placements. IBM and Genpact are the most well-known companies. Most students get placed in companies like IBM and SAP. Most of the time, the roles are Software Engineer, but sometimes game development as well.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are decent, not too bad, and not too good, but acceptable for a college. The library has all the content needed for study. The quality of the food is moderate. There are many sports and games available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors go through every module in depth, so there are no complaints. They prepare students for the upcoming semester exams and help them do so. Semester exams are difficult, but the passing percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I take this course for coding purposes. Some computers do not work properly and need repair. The events here are nice.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: An honest and well-defined review of Haldia Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement at the college is quite good compared to others in West Bengal. The maximum package is above 7 LPA, and the lowest is 2–3 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, and Comnigent visit the college and offer packages in a range. The top roles in my college are software and developer positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at my college is well-maintained. Classrooms and the library are fully air-conditioned. The campus covers almost 52 hectares, and two sports grounds are available. All types of sports are played, and the college provides a gym. Hostels are good and only for first-year students. Canteen food is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most faculty graduated from local colleges in West Bengal, and all faculty teach well. They are helpful and make studying easier. The curriculum is sufficient for this course. Exams and tests happen every semester, with more than three tests conducted per semester.
detailed_review.Other: Overall, the college is good, but students improve their skills on their own.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business System
reviews.review_title: Our college campus and placements are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are average as most students get placed, with packages around 5–6 LPA. Many companies like TCS and Wipro hire students, but placements are declining as the college does not focus on development skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel infrastructure is good with 24-hour water, electricity, and Wi-Fi. Power outages are rare and managed by the government, so there are no major issues.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are mostly friendly, but some are strict and call parents if students miss classes. They are helpful in other situations. The curriculum is updated regularly, and the college organizes some fests. Students pay extra fees before the end-of-semester exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business System
reviews.review_title: This is a very good college with infrastructure, campus life, and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: This year, on average, 78% of students get placed, and placements are still ongoing. The highest salary is 45 LPA, the lowest is 3.5 LPA, and the average salary is 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Cognizant, PWS, and Deloitte. About 50% of students get internships in TCS, Wipro, and Infosys. Most students crack interviews for software development roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are very good. Co-curricular activities are also good and help students effectively. Infrastructure, including the library, labs, classrooms, and Wi-Fi, are very good. It is a very good college with infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is very good. The course curriculum is relevant and prepares students for the industry. Semester exams are not very difficult, the standard is good, and the pass percentage is 95%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the opportunities and good quality of placements. Not much improvement is needed for this course as it is already very good. Events, campus crowd, and security are also very good and helpful. Many events are held in the college, such as techfests.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business System
reviews.review_title: Overall, college is good, but the student has to improve their skills on their own.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 60% student are placed every year, and the highest placement is 10-11 LPA and the lowest is 3-4 LPA. Mainly, TCS and Cognizant come to the college or other companies to recruit their students. The percentage of students who got internships is not fixed. The top roles are business acumen and development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Almost all facilities are included in this course, such as the top classes and library with air conditioning labs. And there will be two canteens and some sports facilities (tt, badminton, cricket, volleyball, basketball, everything) and some good clubs and events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Almost all teachers graduate from local Kolkata colleges, but the quality of education is good. The curriculum does not exactly make one job-ready, but the teacher guides very well to make one job-ready. The semester exam is moderate, the teacher can explain everything and help before the exam.
detailed_review.Other: In this course, there are attendance criteria that have to be fulfilled. The course is fine, nothing to make better. The course gives you the best curriculum possible.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: If students are preparing for competitive exams, then I suggest taking admission to this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 60-70 percent of students got placed last year with a package of 4 LPA. The highest package offered is around 6 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 1.8 LPA, last year in the information technology branch. Top recruiting companies for our course are Accenture, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, Bitwise, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite good, and labs are quite equipped. Hostel wardens are too bad. They are not giving the food to other state students. They are misbehaving with students. The canteen food is too good and at a low price. Canteen members are behaving very well with everyone.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. But the lab assistants only speak the Bengali language. Semester exams are too difficult, and the pass percentage is good.
detailed_review.Other: I am from the information technology branch. It is one of the oldest branches on this campus, so I chose it. Cultural fests are organised. There are no scholarships for students from other states. Different cultural events are always organised on the college campus. Different hackathons are organised too.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The knowledge provided by the faculty members is very helpful.

detailed_review.Placements: I do not know the actual number of students who got placed, but there are many students who have been placed in a reputed company. Some students got internships in ISRO and many more reputed places. The average package is 4 LPA. Companies like TCS, Deloitte, Wipro, IBM, etc., hire students for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi for students, but the speed of it is below average. Both digital and traditional classrooms are there to improve the quality of technical and non-technical knowledge. There are no hostels in my college. There is a library with many books from India and outside India, which are essential for technical studies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers from my department and any other departments are so helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. I am in an autonomous college, so exams are not too difficult or too easy. In semester exams, we get a moderate type of questions. I don't know the pass percentage.

college_info.college_name: MAKAUT Course Admissions 2025: Registration, Eligibility, Fee & Dates

admission.title: MAKAUT Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: MAKAUT, also known as Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology , offers UG, PG, and doctoral programmes. The courses cover the domains of Engineering, Science, Arts and Social Sciences etc. Admission process at MAKAUT is entrance based. MAKAUT accepts a few more state/ national-level exams for admission, such as WBJEE, PGET , UGC NET (including JRF)/ CSIR NET for admission to other UG, PG and doctoral-level programmes. The university also conducts its own entrance exam, JEMAT, for admission into MBA and MHA courses. Applications for all the offered courses are accepted strictly in the online mdoe. Offline applications are not entertained at all. The duration of most UG courses is three to four years, with PG programmes extending up to two years. Read on to know more aboiut eligibility, admission and application process, fees etc. at MAKAUT.

faqs.question: Can I join MAKAUT University without JEE?
faqs.answer: No, admission to MAKAUT is based on entrance exams for courses such as BTech. Candidates wanting to get admission to MAKAUT for BTech must qualify West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations (WBJEE) exam and WBJEE Counselling. Those willing to get admission in the second year must appear for JELET (for Lateral Entry). MAKAUT also accepts JEE Main exam for BTech admission.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in MAKAUT?
faqs.answer: MAKAUT University accepts both merit and entrance based exam scores. The university conducts CET exam in June for admission to courses such as BSc, MSc, BBA and BCA courses. MAKAUT conducts JEMAT for admission to MBA and MHA courses. It also accepts a few other state/ national-level entrance exams such as WBJEE, PGET,  UGC NET  (including JRF)/ CSIR NET for admission to UG, PG and doctoral-level programmes. Candidates can visit the official website and fill out the application form. Appear for the entrance exam mentioned above and wait for the merit list to get released. Lastly, shortlisted candidates will be eligible for counselling.

faqs.question: What should be my CAT percentile to get calls from MAKAUT if one has 86% in Class 10,  82% in Class 12 and BTech DGPA is 8.1?
faqs.answer: MAKAUT offers admission MBA course based on CAT scores through the affiliated colleges. The top affiliated colleges for MBA are Camellia School of Business Management, AIM, Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institutions, Budge Institute of Technology and GIMT. As per the last year's cutoff MAKAUT CAT cutoff 2022, the overall CAT Percentile required for Camellia School of Business Management was 80, whereas for AIM, Supreme Knowledge Foundation Group of Institutions, Budge Institute of Technology and GIMT, the required CAT percentile was 25. To know more about the previous year CAT of affiliated colleges through which MAKAUT offers MBA admission, click here .

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for admission into BPharm at MAKAUT?
faqs.answer: The selection criteria for BPharm at MAKAUT is entrance based with the university accepting WBJEE scores for the same. The minimum eligibility is passing Class 12 with atleast 45% aggregate in any stream. Make sure that the minimum eligibility requirement for the preferred course is met before applying for admission to the same.

faqs.question: Can I change my college under MAKAUT?
faqs.answer: No, candidates do not have the option to change their college under Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology. If they wish to change, they are required to appear for the necessary entrance test again. However, a few articles on the internet mention that students can change their college after the first year but they are required to clear all the exams of the first year for the same. For better clarity on the subject, candidates are advised to reach out to the admission office of MAKAUT or the affiliated institute under the university.

faqs.question: Does MAKAUT grant direct admission to BTech programme?
faqs.answer: No, admission to BTech programme at MAKAUT is entrance based with the university accepting JEE MAIN scores for the same. Direct admissions are not granted to any student category. The minimum eligibility for BTech mut be met before applying for admission to the same.

faqs.question: What is the duration of BTech programme offered at MAKAUT?
faqs.answer: BTech at MAKAUT fhas a duration of four years. The university follows a semester based system and hence, BTech is divided into 8 semesters. Students must pass each semester exam conducted at the end of each semester to proceed to the next.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, West Bengal (MAKAUT)  provides modern amenities with state-of-the-art infrastructure to its students. The university is spread over an area of 40 acres of land at Haringhata, District Nadia, provided by the Government of West Bengal. The facilities include sports, a library, MAKAUT WB centers, etc. The university also has hostel facilities both for boys and girls.
Check out more on MAKAUT Infrastructur e in the below videos:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The Library of the Institute has a collection of 25965 books among which 10131 are e-books, 6000 (approx.) e-journals 20 print journals including 4 foreign journals .The Library also has purchased the e-collection of annual reviews back volume. The Library also has a good collection of CDs, audio Cassette and DVD. The library is focusing on e-resources due to shortage of space. The University library is now the member of E-Sodh - Sindhu (UGC Infonet) Digital Library consortia. University is getting e-journals like IEEE, Cambridge University Press, Economic and Political Weekly, ISID, JCCC, Oxford University Press, Springerlink, Taylor and Francis from the consortia. and University itself is subscribing e-journals like IEE, Elsevier, Springer Nature, ACM Digital Library, JAmerican Society for Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Taylor and Francis, etc.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 18753 published reviews , 16496 reviews are verified.

college_info.college_name: Mepco Schlenk Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Established in 1984, Mepco Schlenk Engineering College is a private institute in Tamil Nadu. The institute is approved by the AICTE and CoA. At the UG and PG levels, the institute offers 21 courses across 13 specialisations in Full Time mode. The popular Mepco Schlenk Engineering College programs include B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, MCA and B.Arch. Mepco Schlenk Engineering College courses are provided in several streams including Engineering, Business & Management Studies, IT & Software and Architecture & Planning, etc. The institute has a total seat intake of 1492 students. The fees at Mepco Schlenk Engineering College ranges between INR 35,000 to 4,02,000 for the different courses. Mepco Schlenk Engineering College placements are vibrant, with the average median salary standing at around INR 4,77,500. The institute has a well-laid infrastructure with multiple facilities.

Mepco Schlenk Engineering College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: M.E. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Mepco Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 75- 80% of students were hired by structural design, contracting, and consulting firms, which was a fairly good placement outcome. The average package remained close to 5.5 LPA, while the highest package reached roughly 10 LPA. Infrastructure and metro projects offered internships, though some were merely site assistants.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Department labs had dependable testing equipment and easy access to industry-standard software. With pertinent code and references to civil engineering, the library provided strong support. The mess food occasionally felt monotonous, but the hostel rooms were cosy. There was some, but not much, medical and athletic support.
detailed_review.Faculty: Particularly during design and analysis sessions, the faculty provided clear and encouraging explanations of concepts. The majority of the curriculum was updated to reflect current structural trends and was practical. The majority of students passed the moderately challenging, understanding-focused exams without any significant problems.
detailed_review.Other: Mepco Schlenk Engineering College, in the ME Structural Engineering Course, has Taken Admission information.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: An environment that teaches to survive anywhere in the world and the campus life is strict.

detailed_review.Placements: In our department, around 85% of students got placed in core companies. Placement performance at Mepco is fairly good, especially when compared to many other privileged engineering colleges. The median salary is 4.5 LPA. Top offers up to 9 LPA. Generally positive with a raise for training and facilities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus and hostels are fully Wi-Fi enabled with high-speed connectivity that encourages laptop use and online learning. Some of the entertainment website and apps are restricted. Only educational contents are allowed to browse and download. Internet in hostels is provided in time slots. Hostel is so good and comfortable. It has very hygienic environment, neat, and clean. Food is also good. Medical facilities are good. In college and hostel, we need to follow some rules and regulations.
detailed_review.Faculty: The syllabus is well-organized. Exams are well-planned. They give all the resources needed. Extreme ownership of ourselves is needed to study and complete the projects and labs, while managing stress. Actually, we need to de-code the syllabus and study according to semesters. They are very strict in exams. So discipline is the main.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure to learn the course.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement percentage is generally above 85 for eligible students in these courses CSE, IT, ECE, and EEE. Basically, 4 LPA to 8 LPA salaries are provided for jobs at Elite, Amazon, Smartdv, TCS, and Accenture. Most of the students must learn all computer courses. They are all must learn in NPTEL, take their own course study they provide points.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: More well-fared infrastructure like Wi-Fi with unique passwords and labs, library are well like peaceful than indoor stadium. In gym, all facilities are available. Canteen only has some specific items. Hostel food is well-hygiene. Medical is available, and 24X7 ambulance is also available. Very safe to learn and that's kind of future gives Mepco.
detailed_review.Faculty: Ph.D. professors only take classes. Each professor must update day to day course. Semester exams are very easy. They teach well. Pass percentage is 70 to 80%. It is easy to study. The study hours are strict and students strictly follow the rules. They are peaceful if they misuse immediately suspended.
detailed_review.Other: My wish I like ECE so I chose easy to learn. It provides best infrastructure to help and learn peacefully.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Power Electronics and Drives
reviews.review_title: Mepco Schlenk Engineering College for M.Tech PED course admission in 25-26.

detailed_review.Placements: This course has total 4 batches enrolled and one batch has 90 to 80 students available. In this course, every year total 50 to 60% of students are placed in companies. They provide the best package like 4 LPA to 8 LPA salary, and companies do not offer any roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this course, best facilities and infrastructure are available. This college provides fast Wi-Fi connection, classroom, labs, library, etc. Facilities are provided. College hostel also provide same facilities. This college sports team organizes sports and games tournaments.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, faculty members are good but this college staff is very strict. In this college, faculty members organised many rules and regulations for students and teachers to follow completely the restrictions. This course is very difficult and hard to pass the exam because there is 40 percent required for passing the exam.

reviews.course: M.E. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title: ME Course Information at MEPCO Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, placement facilities are provided by the placement committee. Every year, 50 percent of students are placed in companies. These companies provide salaries from 2 LPA to 6 LPA. These companies do not offer any roles to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, the best infrastructure facilities are available. The best quality materials are used, like classrooms, bathrooms, labs, lifts, elevators, canteens, etc. Facilities are available. The college provides hostel facilities for a few students because the room size is very small.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, faculty, and staff have very good behavior toward students. They are very knowledgeable and very helpful. The passing score for this course is difficult because 40 percent is required to pass the exam, and the questions are very difficult.

reviews.course: M.E. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title: Mepco Schlenk Engineering College admission process for the course.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college are providing for every student to placement facilities and every year, 70% of students were placed in company. In this college are  many companies internships like Accenture, Wipro, Reliance Digital, etc. Companies were interested in this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, the best infrastructure facilities were provided like neat and clean classrooms, bathrooms, labs, library, garden, Gymkhana, fast internet connection, etc. These facilities were available. This college does not provide hostel facility, and canteen facilities were available by the college department.
detailed_review.Faculty: This college faculty members was very good and very helpful to the students because there are high degree education teacher are available. The course teachers have master's degrees qualified to provide teaching. The course was very difficult and hard to clear the exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements:
This college has placements for this college have placements far better (85%) than any other colleges. They bring Zoho, Amazon, ShopUp, and many other software companies and also provide placements from core companies like Schneider Electric, Texas Instruments, Smardv, TCS, Cisco, Hexaware, and many others. The highest package is 15 LPA, and the lowest is 4 LPA. 
70% of students have got internships. The top roles offered are Design Engineer, Network Engineer and Telecom Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are also good. The hostel facilities for boys are too good, as they provide good food and sports facilities along with gym facilities. For girls, the hostel is a bit strict but well disciplined. Even they have sports facilities and healthy foods. The classrooms and libraries are also good with proper infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are too good, enriched with knowledge. They have a good motto to give placements to the students. They provide both theoretical and practical knowledge in an appropriate way. The course curriculum is currently updated to match the current industrial working. The pass percentage is above 86%, and the teachers train the students very well to be fit enough to attend a difficult question paper.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Mepco Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 10 percent of the students in my department got placed. The highest package offered is 10 Lacs and the lowest package is 3 Lacs. The top recruiting companies for my course are Accentuate, TCS and others. Only 10 percent of the students got internships from my course in Sabre, Mr. Copper etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and the infrastructures are quite good. The classrooms and the labs are well maintained. There is a central library in our college having a good environment. The food in mess and canteen wasn't good. I am not satisfied with medical facilities, also they behave very rude.
detailed_review.Faculty: We should only learn things to get passing marks in the semester exams. The teachers will teach only by sharing power point presentations and claim that the portion is over. This course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry ready. The passing percentage is 45 percent only. The semester exams are also quite easy.
detailed_review.Other: The college is near my hometown so that's why I have chosen this college. The best thing about my course is that I have learned a lot besides just learning the course. The events, fest and extracurricular activities are too boring.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Had some reputation when I joined but not now.

detailed_review.Placements: 50% of students have been placed till now. The highest package is 10 lpa, the lowest package is 3 lpa, and the average package is 6 lpa. The top recruiting companies are Zoho, Accenture, Sabre, etc. 25% of students got internships at companies like Zoho. The top roles offered are software developer, software engineer, Associate Software engineer, quality tester, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Buildings and Infrastructure facilities for both college and hostel are above average. But for Wi-Fi most of website are blocked. Wi-Fi is not always available it will available only on certain time slots. We can't use internet always. Labs are good provided with Wi-Fi all the time. Library is good with some of the important books. Classrooms are good with enabled projectors, etc. Hostel is good. But using phones is not allowed in hostel and college. Food is Good. But same menu every week. Some of the food is not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: We can see all kind of teachers here. Some of them are friendly and most of them are strict especially in Mech. Some teach very good and some won't they even know want they are teaching. But there still some gem teacher who try to teach their best. Curriculum is relevant. Passing the exams is easy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with faculty members and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 90% of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2.8 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Capgemini, CTS, Amazon, etc. Top roles offered in our course are software trainee, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All departments have Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and a library. All hostels have limited Wi-Fi. The quality of the food in the mess is good compared to other college messes. Our college provides 24X7 medical facilities for hostelers.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is excellent. The course curriculum is a bit relevant. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not much difficult. The pass percentage is above 45%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Mepco Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 50-70% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered was 8 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 2.5 LPA. Infosys and CTS were the top recruiting companies. Around 10% of students got internships in this course. Our college provided good machine shops and they were very useful for hands-on experience.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel facilities were available for both girls and boys. Our campus was Wi-Fi enabled. The food quality was not good. Sports and games were not good in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were highly knowledgeable, and they teach students very well. The teaching quality was good. There were many training programs for students. Our course curriculum makes students ready for the industry. Semester exams were tough. The pass percentage was 90%, and very few students got failed.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course to know about the various manufacturing processes and also designing automation. Many events were conducted in our college. Extracurricular activities were also held.

reviews.course: M.E. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title:
Is good college but rules will be like schools
.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are less compared to other departments. 30 students got internship as structural designer. Average package was 20-30 thousand. Top recruiters were, Don and lmc. Many top roles are offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Food is okayish. Wifi was available for 2-3 hours only. There is no outing for pg, phone is not allowed in hostel and we cant cook. UG and PG are same, and monday dinner can’t be eaten by anyone. Biryani is worst. Hostel rooms are single rooms.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The faculty are good and helping. Faculty has good knowledge. There will be an industry visit once in PG course. If you study you will get score good. Little bit difficult are the semester exams in this college. Pass percentage was 100 percentage 
.
detailed_review.Other:
More fine
More notice board of very violation of rule
There will be event, fest campus crowd, connectivity only a same gender 
There will be scholarship extracurricular activity .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Our college is a heaven for students.

detailed_review.Placements: There will be more than 92% of students who have gotten placed. However, there is a slight lag this year. I strongly suggest that this college be solely for the benefit of the parents. Here, no more enjoyment or anything. I suggest joining the Computer Science group. These are all the top recruiters in our college, like Amazon, Zoho, TCS, CTS, and Wipro. Around 80% of students have gotten their internships during the 8th semester. The lowest salary package is 3 LPA and the highest salary package is 14 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are more facilities available at our college. But we have to establish more. Some of the labs should be improved and the equipment is not good. In our hostel, they provide 6 days of non-veg. Once a month, a moon feast will be held for hostel students. It must be unavoidable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty member is unique in their teaching. Some department staff may misbehave, but not more than other students. Overall, it's good. The course curriculum will be relevant to the recruiters. The pass percentage is 85% above. The semester exams will be average.
detailed_review.Other: I already mentioned that this is for the parent's sake. No phones are allowed inside the campus and hostel. There is no conversation between girls and boys. Every single thing will be monitored through a CCTV camera. No photos or entertainment inside the camp.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's a perfect college for the engineering stream in Tamil Nadu.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 96% of students got placed during the academic years. The highest package is more than 15 LPA. Infosys, HCL, TCS, CTS, Capgemini, and many other IT companies have come to our college. Many core companies also came to our college. Our college has a 100% placement rate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. Wi-Fi is available 24 hours a day in the hostel and college, as well as labs and medical facilities. Pure mineral water is available on this campus, and there are more trees. Healthy and hygienic foods are provided on the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The syllabus of the college is good and comfortable for students. All departments have trained in C, Java, and OOPS languages. Aptitude and UPSC coaching are also conducted on this campus. The college gives good practical and theoretical knowledge to the students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It had good placements in 2020, and it is an amazing place to showcase your talents.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students who were willing to attend interviews got placed. We faced this corona condition during our final semester, which didn't affect us since many of our batch students got places during 7th semester. Many of my batchmates were placed in several companies like Zoho, Mr Cooper, Justdial, Comcast, CTS, Verint, Infosys, and many more. The packages offered are between 3 to 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are well-equipped with cloud services. Technicians will solve whatever the existing issue is. Wi-Fi speed and connectivity are too good to work on projects and studies. The library is well-equipped with books on each category and magazines are available too. There are separate hostels for students of each year, and the food facility is amazing, with almost 3 times non-veg per week. Students can choose what they need. Both indoor and outdoor facilities are available, especially an equipped gym.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful in every aspect. Anyone can feel free to reach out to them in case of any queries. Hands-on teaching is done for several courses. Semester exams are made easy by conducting internal exams each month, so there is no difficulty preparing at the last minute. The pass percentage is 80%, and there are less chances of failure.
detailed_review.Other: Several fests are held in the college. Some cultural activities and several club activities are conducted for each category like Maths club, fine arts club etc. Any student can participate and enrich their speaking skills. A tech fest is conducted each year, and students organise and participate. Management scholarships are provided to students who secure more than some specified CGPA by management. Students are encouraged by this feature. Mobile phones are not allowed here.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has good infrastructure, placements, and experienced faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements in our college are good and there are many companies recruiting mechanical engineers as well. They are also providing good salary packages. Companies like TCS and WIPRO recruit mechanical engineers as well. More than 60% of mechanical engineers will get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a good mess and the canteen. Our classrooms are equipped with projectors and screen capture systems, which can be accessed by students at any time through Imparts software. The labs are well-equipped with advanced devices, and Wi-Fi connections are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality in our college is very good, and the teachers will help you get good marks. The curriculum designed by our college will make you learn more and more useful things related to the industry. Continuous assessment tests are conducted every month. The teachers are knowledgeable and will guide us to the correct path to get placed.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college with more focus on discipline academics and career growth.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements were good in this college. The average salary package offered was 3.5 LPA. Students without arrears can easily be placed on the campus. Almost 85% of students got placed. The top MNCs were HCL, CTS, and TCS. The highest salary package offered was 12 LPA from a startup company Shopup, and students will get frequent placements visits from companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college was good. Wi-Fi was accessible but restricted to the particular website only. The hostel was good and provides spacious rooms with a good mess. The food quality was good, but the canteen provides very minimal food and no variety food was available but they were very hygienic. The hospital was available but the staff behavior was rude.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were qualified but not helpful. The curriculum suits well. The semester seems to be difficult and a minimum of 50% was needed to pass the exams. Internal exams were hard that students can pass but cannot score high marks, and it also provides special class if they score below 60 marks.
detailed_review.Other: Our college was strict and students cannot enjoy this college life. But course and placements offers were the best. It provides many scholarships and campus events were held.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Not good but suitable for mugup learners.

detailed_review.Placements: Bad placement and no companies are coming in our batch. Only 20% of mechanical students got selected in placement but not in a core company. They placed in a software company and some of the students opt for higher studies because of no placement and the top recruitment company is Infosys only.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good building and drinking water facilities are always available but what is the use. No one is allowed to feel the good exposure of the college because there are a lot of rules and regulations which feel uncomfortable in our college life. A good library with lots of books but the library is allowed only after college hours.
detailed_review.Faculty: The syllabus is not updated. They only thought basic level and not let to know the advanced level and the syllabus is only for mark scoring with that you cannot glory in industrial work. Teachers are not well qualified. They only know the basics and the pass percentage is good because of the mentioned reason.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Mepco Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: The worst placements are provided for mechanical engineering students. College can't afford to bring the core companies, but they pressure us to learn programming to get a place in software companies. Placements will be from the worst recruiters like Garment companies, and the salary packages offered for mechanical students is poor, and it's around 2 LPA much low than total college fees. Only 30% of the students got placed including the software field.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Buildings are well constructed but what is the use, it's just like a show case you cannot expose the college feeling from it. It is like a well-developed jail or juvenile for the students, and the staff behaves as warden in that education building. Quality of food is good and hygiene. Medical facilities are available for 24 hours.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course and the curriculum are updated, but the staff is not well updated. They are dependent on textbooks. Most of the college staff are former alumni of this college, so they take revenge on the students, what they suffer in their college life.
detailed_review.Other: Good question that why you chose this college, because of my fate .

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Mepco Schlenk Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Only IT and CSE students got placed, but mechanical and civil students are not placed. They got placed in some software companies. Infosys and CTS are the top recruitment companies. Internships are offered in only IT and CSE departments, and 80% of the students of CSE and IT got placed. Only 40% of the students of mechanical and civil departments got placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Canteen and hostel food is good and at hygiene condition, and different food items are provided on each day. Still, it gets bored for repeating the same food for a week. Medical facilities are available for 24 hours, but there is a lady doctor who is stubborn and always blame us for our medical problems.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of our college are the worst, and no one is well updated in knowledge. All of them depend on books. Most of the professors failed in the GATE exam, but they say that they are not well-updated. The course curriculum is not relevant to industrial exposure. It is an autonomous college, so the pass percentage is high. It is because question papers are prepared by them, and whatever they taught in the class would come in exams.
detailed_review.Other: Staff members are rude, but if they change their behaviour, then there can be an improvement. Our college staff members, HOD and principal, don't behave properly, so they need to change it.

college_info.college_name: NIT Manipur (NITMN): Cutoff, Placement, Fees, Courses, Admission 2025, Ranking

highlights.summary:
NIT Manipur was founded in 2010. It is under the Ministry of Education, Government of India. The institute offers UG and PG courses to students across the Engineering, Physics, Chemistry, and other streams. It is ranked 151-200 by NIRF 2025 under the Engineering category.
Aapproved by AICTE - the institute offers BTech and MSc as its flagship courses. The National Institute of Technology Manipur offers placement assistance to students. The highest package offered by the college in 2023 was INR 47 LPA. Located in Imphal, this reputed college offers various facilities to students such as a centralised library, workshops, and others.
NIT Manipur provides a platform for young technocrats and entrepreneurs to experiment with their aspirations and dreams. The college encourages students and the faculty to conduct research of international standards. The major highlights of the National Institute of Technology Manipur are tabulated below:
National Institute of Technology, Manipur
Ranked in the band 101-150 under the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF Ranking
Check out more on NIT Manipur Highlights in the below videos:

table.details: Ranked in the band 101-150 under the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF Ranking

college_info_program.intro:
BTech and MSc are the flagship courses offered at NIT Manipur. BTech students are taught Basic Electrical and Electronics Sciences, Algorithms, Formal Languages and Automata Theory and various other subjects that are relevant to the new age jobs. BTech students can work as Software Engineers, Data Analyst, or can take up various other job roles relevant to their field. For students who wish to take up non-technical jobs, there are a plethora of options available. During the NIT Manipur placement drive, popular recruiters, include Amazon, Discovery, EDFORA, Infoedge, Veritas, etc.
Students seeking admission after BTech or MTech, NIT Manipur overall is a great option for a secured career option. The college is one of the best-ranked NITs present in India. Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by NIT Manipur and their respective eligibility and NIT Manipur fee structure:
