faqs.question: What was the median package offered during NERIST placements?
faqs.answer: The 2022 salary details are not released as of now. The median package offered to BTech and M.Tech students in 2021 was INR 4 LPA and INR 4.20 LPA, respectively. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Is studying at NERIST expensive?
faqs.answer: Candidates looking for NERIST admissions can visit the official website and search out the complete fees structure for all the courses at the university. Generally, NERIST provides quality courses at a significantly lower cost as compared to the prominent privately-owned universities. For example, the BTech course would cost a general student about INR 21,990 (INR 15,250 for Vertical Mobility) for the first semester. Furthermore, the second semester fees, which is the same for all categories, would be INR 7,750 . Students are encouraged to check out the various scholarship schemes that are operated by North East Regional Institute of Science and Technology. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the fee for UG courses at NERIST?
faqs.answer: North Eastern Regional Institute of Science and Technology (NERIST) is a deemed to be a university in Nirjuli place located in Itanagar, Arunachal Pradesh. It has been ranked 186 among the top NIRF-rated Engineering colleges in 2021. The institute currently has 11 departments of education in Science & engineering and 1 center for management studies to offer degree courses across the disciplines of engineering, technology, sciences, and management. It offers 10+2 level certificate courses, post-10+2 Diploma courses, and degree programs. The degree programs offered at NERIST include BTech, BSc (Forestry Stream), MTech, MBA, MSc, and PhD programs. placement_faqs.question: Who all are the top recruiters at NERIST?
placement_faqs.answer: The Placement Cell at North East Regional Institute of Science and Technology provides students with a world of exposure and trainings. This is done in order to prepare them for a bright and industry-ready career. Some of the top recruiters at NERIST include prominent names like Godrej, OIL, Tech Mahindra, TATA, HCL, PwC, IBM, Infosys, Taazaa, Ashok Leyland, Reliance, Jindal Steel, Wipro, NHPC , and others.

placement_faqs.question: Which branch of B.Tech has more placements at NERIST?
placement_faqs.answer: The branch of B.Tech that has shown more placements at North Eastern Regional Institute of Science and Technology (NERIST) is Electrical Engineering. According to the NIRF report 2023,  70 B.Tech students were placed during NERIST placements in 2022, with the median package offered to B.Tech students standing at INR 4.5 LPA. The highest salary package offered during recent NERIST placements reached INR 16 LPA.

college_info.college_name: R.M.K. Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Founded in 1995, R.M.K. Engineering College is a private institute. It is located in Tamil Nadu. The institute is accredited with AICTE. R.M.K. Engineering College provides UG, PG and Doctorate courses in Full Time mode. It provides 23 courses across specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering and Electronics Engineering. Some of the courses offered at this institute include B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, MCA and Ph.D. R.M.K. Engineering College fees ranges between INR 35,000 to 2,00,000. The student intake for these courses is 1146. R.M.K. Engineering College offers these course across fields such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. The median salary offered to students is INR 5,00,000. R.M.K. Engineering College offers all the campus facilities to students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Perfect experience of my college life.

detailed_review.Placements: There are 80% of students who were placed in my course. The highest package is 24 LPA, average package is 7 to 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 to 4 LPA. Top recruiters: Amazon, Cognizant, TCS, Infosys, etc. 20 to 30 percent of students go for internships in the respective companies also. Roles offered are Software Developer, Data Analyst, Web Developer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a big infrastructure with a clean and tidy environment, enriched with Wi-Fi access, labs, developed classrooms, and plenty of books in the library. They provide quality facilities such as good food, clean restrooms, quality games and events, and a fantastic atmosphere, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well educated and friendly. They provide quality education to students. All courses and subjects are perfectly relevant to the course curriculum; all aspects make students industry-ready. Semester exams are very tough, which critically examine the students' abilities and skills. The approximate pass percentage is 80-90%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Feeling proud to be a part of my college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college offers a variety of courses for students to study. I opted for Computer Science Department, which is a Flagship department in our college. Approximately 80 percent of Students are well placed in campus interviews with a decent salary package. Every year, 3 students are selected for Big companies like Amazon, TCS, and Infosys etc, with Internships also. The highest package in our campus is 25LPA, the average package offered is 7 to 10 LPA and the lowest package offered is 2 to 3 LPA. Students are selected for top roles like Developer, Data Analyst, AIML Engineer, etc in many companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has one of the most beautiful campus layouts in our city. Our college has 5 star rating in Food preparation and serving! A very hygienic and clean environment is maintained all over the campus. 24 hour power supply and Water without any disturbance. Well mannered staff and Workers. Quality of Labs with the costliest equipment and a huge library with more than 10000 books. Hostellers are well raised with college food, and they feel their hostel rooms are like their home. Everyone is taken care of by well experienced wardens.
detailed_review.Faculty: Perfect teaching with one on one doubt clearance and guidance. Well, understandable communication and pure quality of education. The curriculum is perfectly adapted for our course outcome. Everything is set with the right vision and mission. All the students are industry ready on the campus for the corporate world. Even though Semester exams are tough enough, the students managed to get stunning results overall. The average pass percentage is approximately 94 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of their curriculum and good facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: In this course, 80-90 percent of students are placed by the companies, with the highest package ranging from 18 to 35 LPA, the average from 4 to 9 LPA, and the lowest from 2 to 4 LPA, top companies include TCS, Cognizant, Infosys, Zoho, IBM, etc., and around 80 percent of 3rd and final year students get placed, with roles such as full stack, cloud, and data analytics provided.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Generally, Wi-Fi is good at speed in classrooms and library, and labs have very fast Ethernet, the quality of food and hostel is very good, and the food can be rated 4.8/5 stars, while sports periods and medical facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching is good and the syllabus is properly covered, the curriculum is updated regularly if needed, with the last update from 2022 to 2024, and semester exams are sometimes easy but tricky, with a pass percentage of 80 to 90.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: R.M.K. Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: I have completed my engineering in the CSE course. In my time, the maximum students joined the CSE course only. Because it is a very demanded course in our generation. The highest package is 35 Lacs per annum, and the lowest is about 4 Lacs per annum. So many top companies in Tamil Nadu are offering jobs to students in my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good in my college. We have the best classrooms and well-equipped labs with all the requirements. We have Wi-Fi available at any place. We have one library with a well-stocked book collection. The hostel facility is available, and hostel nights are very memorable moments. They have a medical clinic.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are so helpful to students in my college. Their teaching quality and skills are absolutely amazing. Their teaching skills are very professional. They have so many years of experience in teaching professions. This course is so relevant to software companies. The pass percentage is a maximum of 95%. The question papers are very moderate and convenient for students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: R.M.K Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: In Tamil Nadu, RMK College is one of the best engineering colleges that I have studied. I got a campus placement at my college. So we have the best placements offered, and in my course, there are fewer students. So that the top companies are giving job opportunities. Some of the students are going to internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is beautiful infrastructure in my college. There are nice classrooms, ventilation and washrooms, all of which are very good. We have free classrooms for students to sit and a library available. We have so many canteens and hostels available for long-distance students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful at my college. They have so many years of experience, and they are very skilled professors. Their teaching quality is very good and very understandable. This course is relevant only to industries. Mechanical engineering is a good course for industrial management purposes. Finally, exam question papers are very tough, even the faculty can't write those papers. So the students are just passing.

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good college for growth and development of skills.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package till now is 8 LPA, and the average is 6 LPA. Companies are Cognizant, Zoho, TCS, Kaar Technology, LTI, and Mindtree. 75 % of students got placed. The companies offer software development training as a job role for many students. Overall placement here is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are too good and well maintained. Actually, our college is famous for its food. The hostel is well maintained and clean every day by the service staff, and very hygienic in everything. They provide a separate menu each day, both veg and non veg.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are very helpful and clear every doubt. 98% is the pass percentage. The course has a very significant impact on the industry level, and also the college takes its students to different companies to see and learn how it actually works in the industry.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good campus and one of the best choices of my life that I will not regret.

detailed_review.Placements: A good placement cell. My college focuses more on placements. They provide the best curriculum and training for it. This is very good. Google and Microsoft visit and take a large number of students for placement. The college is well-reputed for its well-known and good rules.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure and much more. I feel very good, especially about their food, which is on point. The hostel is very neat and clean. The food is very good. Biryani on Tuesday with potato chips is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Good faculty and good curriculum. Our curriculum is partly decided by top MNCs. It is pleasing that the pass percentage is 40, and it helps us build the core of CSE. So, I recommend everyone to join here because of the staff working here. The staff are always ready to clarify doubts.
detailed_review.Other: It is very good that I took admission at this college, and now I am enjoying it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure and placements with supportive faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: I pursued B.Tech in electronics and communication engineering. Around 80% of students got placed during the campus placement drive. The highest package offered was 18 LPA by Amazon, and the lowest package was 3.2 LPA. Top roles offered to students included software developer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities were available in our department. Our college provided high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity, well-equipped computer labs with updated systems, and each class had one projector. Mess and canteen provided a variety of food options, and it was very hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful to my department. They were well qualified and they had good knowledge of subjects. Their teaching was very clear and easy to understand. Most of the students were able to pass, and the pass percentage was around 80 to 90%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: If you are ready to work hard then it's for you.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently studying B.Tech in information technology. I am a second-year student. Some students are placed in third year itself. It's purely due to their hard work and consistency. The placements are still getting slow but if you try and put your full focus on the right skills, the placement is yours.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: At RMK Engineering College, you can get many opportunities like CAT lab, mech lab, computer lab, etc. The main thing is how you use the facilities that college provides. Be aware of technologies, and the facilities are always available to clear doubts.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good and kind. They will not say no. They are always ready to help students. The lab assistant is also available here so it's good to improve yourself. They will guide you but you need to travel on that path. So, can ask any doubts to faculty members that are relevant to studies or they will not answer them. All the staffs are well-experienced.
detailed_review.Other: As a hostel student, don't worry about food. The food quality is much more than a 3-star hotel. So, don't worry about that, and as a hosteller the gym and ground are free to use. AC gym costs Rs 3,00 per month. The environment is still good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is eco-friendly with high placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate is 92% and eligible candidates get placed. Top recruiting companies like Google, Amazon, Microsoft, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and Deloitte hire students. Internship rate is 85%. Top role offered in our course is a software development engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities are good in our college. Campus-wide high-speed Wi-Fi is available, including in academic blocks, hostels, and the library. Students can access online journals, video lectures, and project tools. There are dedicated labs for computer science and electronics engineering courses.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly qualified. There are many degree-holding professors. They are highly approachable and supportive. They often encourage students in projects, research, and doubt-clearing sessions beyond the classroom. The teaching quality is generally strong.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: First step to your career.

detailed_review.Placements: 45% of the students are placed in our college. The remaining 55% of students are not placed in our college. 13 Lakhs per annum is the highest, 3 Lakhs per annum is the lowest, and 4.5 Lakhs per annum is the average package offered in our college. TCS and TATA ELXSI are the top recruiting companies in our college. 20% of the students got internships in our college. Graduate trainee and trainee are the roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our classrooms, we have projectors, and the infrastructure is good. The classrooms are good, and the labs are not okay. The library is very good. In our hostels, the quality of food is excellent. The hostels are good and very hygienic. It is a good environment in hostels, and the mess quality is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, our teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. The teaching is okay. Yes, the curriculum is relevant. The difficulty is moderate, and the pass percentage is 50%. The faculty teaching increases students' percentage, so it is good. The teaching is okay.
detailed_review.Other: I am very much interested in this course. Practical knowledge and some extra cultural activities have to be improved. Yes, there are very few activities, and very few fests are conducted.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Students who find happiness in little things can join this college.

detailed_review.Placements: In civil engineering, we got various companies related to IT. Packages start from 4.5 LPA to 8 LPA. We got Accenture, Mindtree, TCS, HCL, L&T, and Zoro companies. Most of the students went for training as interns at these companies. A few are getting stipends of 20 to 30k.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is so clean and fresh. There are many staff members assigned to the cleaning department; especially, washrooms are maintained well. The water facility is good in the hostel. Wi-Fi is available 24/7; we get disturbances only when the weather conditions are not good. The library is the most peaceful spot in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our Civil Engineering department teachers are so friendly with us. They are well-qualified; a few have doctorates, and a few are going to obtain them. They help us with projects and guide us and encourage us to participate in competitions. The course curriculum is relevant. Semester exams are quite tough, as the papers come from Anna University, but if we know the concepts, we can pass, as the pass percentage is 50.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as I am interested in the construction and designing field. We wish our course would get more exposure related to practical knowledge and work. There are no fests as students expect, but we have a symposium every year in which we can invite students from other colleges to participate, and we can conduct various events in it, which are decent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: In terms of placements, it is okay, but not for the more skilled people, & the faculty is also mode.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% take my course, and the remaining will take mechanical, IT, civil, and other departments. The highest package is 10 lakhs, the average is 6 lakhs, and the lowest is 3 lakhs, which is a very low salary for the people who are more skilled. Only 10 to 20% get the Associate Software Engineer role.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are okay, and the infrastructure is also similar. Every department is different, and resources vary for each of them. The food is nice, but the sports and games facilities are lacking, with very few sports events held yearly, and they don't provide time for practice.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are okay, but they don't know much. We need to study all for the semester exams, and they only tell us which questions to study, so we focus on that alone. It's worse than expected. The semester exams are easy, and the pass percentage is 90%, which is increasing year by year.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE because many companies recruit CSE domain students. The staff in our college do not organize any fests or events.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: R. M. K. Engineering College is really the best infrastructure college.

detailed_review.Placements: R. M. K. Engineering College's placement was excellent in 2021, with 100% of all students placed in the civil engineering department. Our batch students were placed in well-reputed companies like Reliance Construction, Birla Groups, Tata Groups, Infosys, IBM, etc. The highest salary package was 8.5 LPA, and the lowest salary package was 2 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: R. M. K. Engineering College provides good classrooms with air conditioning facilities. There are more civil-related laboratories in this college. The college offers a free Wi-Fi network, and library facilities are also available. The canteen food tastes very good, with a variety of options available, while the hostel food tastes very average. Basketball ground facilities are also present in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college teachers conduct more lectures every week; they motivate all students and are very friendly. They clear students' doubts at any time. The teachers arrange industry visits and tour programs every semester. In 2021, 98% of students passed all exams.
detailed_review.Other: R. M. K. Engineering College is one of the best engineering colleges in Tamil Nadu. My brother is also an alumnus of this college, and he recommended it to me, which is why I joined. The fee structure is very low. The college management conducts many sports events and provides transportation facilities. Some improvements are needed in the hostel mess food.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Take a look at the life in RMK ENGINEERING COLLEGE.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered is 31 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2 LPA. Coindx, Zoho, TCS, etc. , visit our college. Almost 70% of students got internship offers at Thazhal Geospatial. The top role offered is software development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure: We have a library period every week. Each classroom has many windows, benches, and fans. The food served at the hostel is good. Our college has a canteen. Medical facilities are available at our college. The accommodation facilities in our hostel are really good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful. They help us in all aspects. They are very well-known in their fields. We can learn a lot from them. They teach us relevant courses. They organize industrial visits. The semester exams are not that tough and the pass percentage is 50%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Faculty is good and friendly.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has average placements and the highest package offered in our course is 7 LPA per year, and the lowest package offered in our course is 2 LPA per year. Companies like TCS, Tata, and Tesla are offering more jobs at the college for the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is above average; some facilities are good for the students by the college and college management; a library, canteen, classrooms, boards, labs and computers are available for the students; and hostels are provided for both girls and boys on the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is okay; they will support the students in the college and they will also be friendly with them. Teaching quality is good in the college and to my knowledge, I think the curriculum is regularly updated on campus and semester exams are held.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: This college has a good placement rate.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 70% of students got placements and 50% of internships from the 2nd year only with some salary. The highest package is around 23 LPA, the lowest package is 2.5 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA. Infosys, Amazon, Deloitte, Wipro, Cognizant, NXL, and many other MNCs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The quality of the infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi is available on college premises. Classrooms had dedicated projectors and boards. The library is good; students can take books by using library cards. For every festival, an event is conducted, and we enjoy it a lot.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and supportive and have excellent knowledge about the respective subjects. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. For every semester, credit will be counted and checked for every semester entry.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements and infrastructure are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70% of students got placements, with the highest package at around 37 LPA, the lowest package at 3 LPA, and the average package at 7 LPA. Top companies for recruiting are Amazon, IBM, Infosys, Cognizant, TCS, Wipro, Deloitte, Capgemini, etc. Only a few students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure and well-maintained college and surrounding. The college is good, and good equipment is provided in the lab. Dedicated computers for each student and Wi-Fi are also available in the lab only. Projector-based classes are done, and good food is provided in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, the teachers are helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable about the subject. They have good scope in their particular subject and give the best teaching to the students. Giving good career guidance. Course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: This is a good college for studying.

detailed_review.Placements: We have a good placement rate in the college, and most of the students get a good package in the campus placements only. The highest package till now recorded was 40 LPA, the lowest package was 3 LPA, and the average package is between 5 and 10 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Amazon, TCS, Wipro, etc.

Good facilities are provided by the college management, and they maintain the college in a positive way. No chance to bunk the college and class. Attendance is mandatory.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are helpful, and they are conducting extra classes for placement purposes like problem-solving, coding, reasoning, verbal, etc. They are enhancing our skills and giving the best teaching. Every classwork is there; we have to complete it. There is no problem with faculty members.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Placements are good in our college.

Top recruiting companies are HCL, INFOSYS, TCS, WIPRO, and some other companies. The highest package in our college is 40 LPA.

There are many facilities provided by college management for our department such as good labs, best classrooms, and a good library. There is a college hostel facility for the students.

faqs.question: Is it easy to get admission in RMK Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Admission to RMK Engineering College is not much easy, especially because it happens purely on merit. While applying for undergraduate courses including B.E. and B.Tech, candidates would have passed 10+2 with at least a 60% aggregate marking in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. There aren't any entrance exams with admissions happening through TNEA counseling. Although the college has a good reputation and competitive placements, the students coming from other states have to apply under management quota, which requires additional fees. So the admission process is not so complicated and inaccessible for eligible candidates.

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for RMK Engineering College admission?
faqs.answer: The admission process for the undergraduate programs of RMK Engineering College is conducted through the Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions, commonly known as TNEA. For the academic year 2024, registration commenced on 4th May 2024 and ended on June 4th,  2024. Important dates involved were that of issuing of random number on 7th June 2024 and announcement of rank list on July 12th,  2024. Since it is December 21st,  2024, now the admissions for this academic year have come to a close. Prospective students aiming to apply for the academic year 2025 should expect the timeline to be similar; therefore, applications will likely be up in May 2025. It is also recommended to check the official website of RMK Engineering College and the TNEA portal for any further updates on admission schedules and deadlines.

college_info.college_name: Ramdeobaba University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary: Ramdeobaba University, also known as Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management, was established in 1984 in Nagpur, Maharashtra. It is approved by AICTE. The institute offers Degree programme in Full Time mode. It offers a total of 105 courses in 33 specializations including Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Construction Engineering, Cyber Security, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering and Electronics Engineering. Some of the courses offered at Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management include B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, B.Sc. and M.Sc. The fee for these courses ranges between INR 65,217 and 10,86,955. The total seat intake for the available courses is 1452. Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management offers courses across multiple streams such as Engineering, Science, IT & Software, Business & Management Studies, Humanities & Social Sciences and Banking, Finance & Insurance. The average median salary offered at Ramdeobaba University is around INR 4,30,000. The institute offers all the necessary facilities to the students.

college_info_program.intro: Ramdeobaba University offers over 50 programmes across 9 different schools. The flagship programmes offered at Ramdeobaba University include BTech, BSc and MBA. The course duration varies from 2-year to 5 years, depending on the course chosen by the candidate. To be eligible for admission to UG courses, the candidates are required to pass Class 12 from a recognised board and for PG courses, candidates must have an undergraduate degree. Below mentioned are some of the popular programmes offered by Ramdeobaba University & their respective eligibility and RBU fee structure:

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Analytics)
reviews.review_title: Is VNIT better than Ramdeobaba University?

detailed_review.Placements: My course is Data science, near about 60-65% of the students get placed in this course. The average package offered to a candidate from my batch is around 6 LPA. The highest package is around 12 LPA, and the lowest package is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Accenture, Wipro, and Infosys come here for recruitment purposes. Top 15-20% of the students get internships in this course. Top roles include data analyst, data scientist, business analyst, and so on.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities for this course here are great. Students get well-furnished classrooms. AC rooms along with new and upgraded computer systems. Labs are very good here with facilities like smart board and so on. Library is good here students get almost all the books required. Hostel price is a little high as per the facilities. The rooms are also very short and not clean properly. But the food in canteen and mess is very hygienic and affordable and also tastes good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-educated and very helpful as well. Teaching quality is good, teachers start any topic from scratch so that everyone can understand it pretty well. The course curriculum is relevant but some subjects in this course are not relevant. But it makes the student's industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate here but you could easily pass them by studying a week before exams. Pass percentage is 80-85%.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course as it has various opportunities and roles to get a job. All the things in my course are great but some subjects need more practical exposure, so the labs should conducted more. Lots of events occur here in a whole year, but the major one is Pratishrutu which is the annual festival that occurs here, it is 1 week and it is very refreshing. Scholarships are given to students who have taken the admission through CAP round.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Analytics)
reviews.review_title: Review of Shri Ramdeobaba University.

detailed_review.Placements: I am doing data science course here, and almost 70%-80% of the students in this course get placed every year. The highest package offered in this course is around 19 LPA, with an average package of 5 LPA-6 LPA, with a minimum of 3.5 LPA. Top companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Accenture, and so on come here for recruitment purposes. Top 15%-20% of the students get internships here. detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of classrooms and labs is quite well-maintained here, you get all the facilities like air-conditioned rooms, Wi-Fi, proper computer systems, and a good library with all the books and facilities like tables and chairs available. The hostel facilities according to the cost are very bad here, rooms are very dirty and small, whereas the food quality at the mess and canteen concerning price is very good and it's very hygienic as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are very educated and helpful, although some teachers are rude and strict but other than them all are good. Most of the subjects are relevant although some subjects are irrelevant but overall it makes us industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate here not that difficult could easily pass them by studying 2 days before exams. Almost 90% of the students get pass in the exams.
detailed_review.Other: In this college, this course has a great placement record and that is the reason why I have chosen this course. The best thing about this course is there are many roles and opportunities where students can work, more practical exposure through labs should be made in this course. Lots of events occur throughout a year but the annual fest known as Pratishruti is the main one, it is 1 week with almost every event and everything happens here. Scholarships are given if the admission is taken through the cap round.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Analytics)
reviews.review_title: The truth behind Ramdeobaba University, Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: My course is data science, almost 80% of the students studying in this course get placed. The highest package offered till now in this course is 17 LPA with an average package of 5 LPA - 6 LPA. The minimum package goes up to 3 LPA - 3.5 LPA. Companies like TCS, Wipro, Accenture along with Amazon and many other big companies come here for recruitment. Top 10-15% of the students get internships in small startups. Roles offered in this course are data analyst, data scientist, business analyst, and so on.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of classrooms and all things for this course are excellent, facilities like Wi-Fi, proper computer systems with air-conditioned classrooms, and all are available here. Library is good, almost all the books required by the students are available here. Hostel prices are very high as per the room so hostel is not recommended here. You can go for PGs and all for living, whereas food quality brands' price is excellent in both canteen and mess.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are very educated. They have a really good teaching style. Almost all teachers are helpful here but few of them are very strict and rude. The course curriculum is 70-80% relevant as there are few subjects in every semester that are irrelevant to the students. The level of difficulty in exams is moderate. But almost 90% of students get pass in it.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course as data science has been booming up with the increase in the use of AI. Some subjects that are irrelevant to us should be removed from the syllabus, along with more practical exposure in labs. Many events occur here throughout the year but the annual fest known as Pratishruti is very vast for 1 week in this event. Many things happen like cultural night, EDM night, and so on. Scholarships are available for students who have taken their admission through cap round on merit basis.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Analytics)
reviews.review_title: The truth of Shri Ramdeobaba University, Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: I have opted for the data science course as it is a quite demanding field nowadays, almost 80% of students in my course have been placed. The highest package offered is around 12 LPA and the lowest package is 3.5 LPA along with an average package of 6.5 LPA. Top companies like Accenture, Wipro, TCS, and Deloitte came here during the placement season. Almost the top 10% of students get internships in startups. Top roles offered are data analyst and data scientist.

There is good availability of Wi-Fi, proper monitor in the lab, and good classrooms, the library is a lot good with all the books available along with a good seating area. Hostel quality is not as good as the prices, the rooms are very short, and not cleaned properly as well, but the food quality of the mess as per the price is good, mess is very hygienic as well.

Their teaching style is also very good, some of the subjects in the course are irrelevant but other than this all subjects are relevant and make the students industry-ready. Semester exams here are moderate not that tough to get pass. Pass percentage is almost 85%.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course as there are various opportunities in data science, lots of roles where we could work, high high-paying jobs are some of the best things I found about this course. Some irrelevant subjects should be removed from this course and more exposure to the practical aspects like labs should be given, many small events occur here throughout the season but the major event Pratishruti occurs once a year it, and the annual fest, campus is good, scholarships are available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Preferred college among tier 3 colleges in Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 80% of students were placed with an average package of 4-5 LPA; the highest package was 23LPA and the lowest was 3.6 LPA. The top recruiting companies include D.E. Shaw, Nvidia, Porter, ZS, and CnR. Additionally, around 55% of students received internship plus PPO offers, with roles including SDE, SDET, and Platform as a Service Consultant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college offers excellent facilities and infrastructure, including air-conditioned labs, Wi-Fi, and digital classrooms around the campus. The teaching staff is well-qualified. The boys' hostel can be rated as average, with rooms being quite small. The mess can be considered average to good, and other facilities, such as washrooms and water supply, adequately meet student needs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified in technical knowledge and are very supportive. The course content can be considered average compared to industry requirements. Semester exams are generally excellent in comparison to other tier 3 colleges in Nagpur, with medium to hard difficulty levels. Some papers are more practical, focusing on case studies to assess students' knowledge of the subjects.
detailed_review.Other: I am from the IT branch and chose this course because I am eager to learn technical knowledge and practical skills. Additional practical knowledge and industry-related activities should be integrated into the course. Events and fests are well organized.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Amazing placements and vibrant campus.

detailed_review.Placements: Ramdeobaba University B.Tech in computer science has more than 90 percent placements with top companies like IBM, Cisco, and Accenture hiring. Salaries range from 7 LPA - 50 LPA. Students land roles in software, AI, and cloud, and secure internships at Google, AWS, and Microsoft.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: RBU provides Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, a huge library, and comfortable classrooms for CSE students. The hostels are clean and well-furnished, with a hygienic mess and food variety. There is also a medical center. We have sports facilities and a gym for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: RBU CSE faculty members are experienced and helpful. They make learning smooth. The curriculum is industry-focused, with hands-on projects and expert sessions. Exams test both theory and practical skills, but with the right effort, students do well and feel job-ready.
detailed_review.Other: CSE program stands out for its great placements (50 LPA maximum) experienced faculty members and industry focused curriculum. The campus is lively with fests, sports and clubs. While labs could use upgrades students get solid industry exposure. With good connectivity and scholarships it's a great place to grow.

reviews.course: B.E. in Industrial Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Ramdeobaba University.

Many companies visit the college for placements. Students also get internships in various companies. Roles offered are supply chain associate, project manager, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Ramdeobaba University.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: RCOEM'S review. I think this is one of the best colleges in Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: 90-95% of students were placed in our course as campus placements took place. The average package offered was around 10 LPA. Top recruiting companies included PhonePe, PayPal, and Razorpay. 80-85% of students got internships from the course in companies like Cognizant and TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure were available for every department and classroom. Wi-Fi, labs, and libraries were well-maintained. Canteen facilities were available, with the best canteen service provided. The best mess food was available for students living in the hostel premises.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and faculty members were very helpful and qualified. They also provided placement guidance and other knowledge. The teaching quality was very good. The semester exams were not very difficult. If we studied thoroughly through the given notes, it was easy to clear the semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: We learned many things in this course. Events and fests happened regularly. We could available of scholarships by filling out scholarship forms. Campus life was good, and extracurricular activities were also conducted by faculty members and departments.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Pros and cons of Ramdeobaba University.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75-80% of students get placed with an average package of 6 LPA. The highest package is 50 LPA. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA. Nutanix is the top recruiting company for our course. We have to do internships on our own. Choosing B.Tech in computer science is a good choosing core and it is a future-proof decision in any aspect. The only thing that matters here is our skills and how we are different from the crowd.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are top-notch. Wi-Fi system is safe and secure. Classrooms are well-maintained with smart boards. The library is maintained and top engineering books are available for students to issue. The college has a new lavish building for all computer-related courses which is fitted with the best labs, classrooms, high-speed lifts, and integrated basement parking.
detailed_review.Faculty: Subjects are chosen by the board according to the latest market requirements like data analysis requires power BI so there is a course for that. It also provides students with Coursera with their free certification. Maintaining CGPA becomes hard as we have to move higher because of tough subjects. Overall, it is the best college for education.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd is supportive. Seniors are friendly. The campus is a little small but every facility is provided in the college. It has a strict attendance policy.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for an MBA in Nagpur city.

detailed_review.Placements: This course has 4 batches. In these courses, every year 90% of students pass in every batch. Many companies are interested in the college and provide a package of around 5 LPA - 12 LPA for average students only.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, there are the best facilities. A hostel facility is available. In this course, there are facilities like a department, auditorium, canteen, garden, gym, library, labs, classrooms, etc. This college organises sports and many games and tournaments.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very intelligent. They are highly qualified. In this college, the faculty organises industrial visits for 3 companies every year after the course completion. This course is not difficult because it is an autonomous university.

reviews.course: B.E. in Industrial Engineering
reviews.review_title: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: 70% of students got placed. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA. The highest is 12 LPA. Companies like Eco Matrix, LNT, Tata, TCS, Mahindra, and more Above 6 CGPA students get placed. Top roles like automation engineer, supply chain analyst, etc., are offered. Small startup companies like Car Dekho, JSW, Steel, etc. Big companies also visit.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The overall infrastructure of the college is very good, except for the hostel. It is not too much good enough. Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and a library are very good compared to other colleges. There are 2 libraries on the campus. Wi-Fi is available for students and faculty members of the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. Sometimes, it is difficult to reach out but overall it is good. Everyone is qualified with Ph.D. The teaching qualities are also good. The course curriculum is very excellent for students. It is very helpful for students. Semester exams' pass percentage is very easy. Exams passing depends on the overall cut-off of the particular subject.
detailed_review.Other: This course is very easy. Industrial engineering is a rare branch. It is easy to grasp the knowledge and easy to clear. They should improve the teaching types like professors always play the presentations for the course which are already available on YouTube. Events like Pratishruti and others are held. There are many different fests. There is an average campus crowd. Scholarships are provided. We have extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Good college. Improvement is going on day by day and placements in 2024 were good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are overall good. Mostly people get placed but the average is between 4-7 LPA. I am not sure about the highest package. It is above 22 LPA. The placement cell is a little strict. Companies like Nutanix, Nvidia, Accenture, TCS, and many others. More than 80% got jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good. All resources like a lab, computers, a library, and Wi-Fi are available. The canteen food is also good. Hostels are good and hygiene is maintained. Sports activities are also available. Competitions are there to participate. Events are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: There is a good pattern of exams. It is a little tough. Teachers have knowledge. The teaching varies teacher by teacher. They are providing training to students to make them industry-ready. They are putting too much effort so that students get placed. Overall all things are good.
detailed_review.Other: Good if you can afford and want to be an engineer or any course that college provides go for it. Don't break your parents, if you can't afford it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college was very good until it became a university.

detailed_review.Placements: A decent number of students were placed this year. The lowest package was about 3 lacs and the average was 7-8 lacs. As I'm in DSA from my branch, okay, a number of students were placed. Many companies already visited the college, while the interview and all are still going on. All the companies are good and give good packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus is a bit small but is good. It has a library, labs, grounds, a canteen, and a hostel; it has good taste in food and has a small gym. Guards are good; building is good. Also has Wi-Fi, a basketball court, etc. The canteen is good and the food is also okay. And again they have lifts and many more facilities for students .
detailed_review.Faculty: All the subject teachers are helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. They teach in a very friendly manner and are very helpful. The course is good and informative. By studying this, we have a good future scope. Exams are a bit hard. But overall everything is good.
detailed_review.Other: The college conducts a fest known as Pratishruti, which is indeed a big 4-5 day fest. And as I myself am a new student, I don't have much idea about everything.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college journey: My college life and experiences.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students were placed in my course. The highest package was of approximately 50 lakhs, and the average package is 4-5 Lacs. 45-55 percent students get internships according to the CGPA and SGPA. Roles like software development and website management, etc., are offered. This course helps in learning various new languages such as C++, Java, Python, DSA, etc., which are helpful in the future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is personal Wi-Fi with the name of the student in every class and lab, and it can be used by every student. There are new classrooms which have new benches, and we also have one big library where we can find all the books of our course. The quantity of food is very good, and hostels are very clean and good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very good and helpful. They help us in every situation and are ready anytime to solve our doubts in their free time. The subject management is very good. The exams which are conducted are quite strict but managed very well and efficiently. The pass percent depends on the overall students' performance.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the best job opportunities in the future as it is the best course of this time. There are various events such as Pratishruti, etc., and many more every year in college, so you never feel bored. Also, there are various clubs in which you can learn various new things.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Computer Science
reviews.review_title: Ramdeobaba University Review.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 80 students are placed in my course. The highest package achieved was 24 Lacs per annum, and the lowest package was 8 Lacs per annum. Students got internships from semester one itself. This course offers both software and hardware knowledge, which further provides high-value income potential.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and libraries are very spacious. Libraries have a very peaceful environment for students and have good internet connection. The canteen serves nice food with good hygiene. They provide a wide range of sports like football, badminton, basketball, volleyball, and many more to keep students active.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were always very good to students; they were always ready to solve our doubts and were very friendly. The semester exams were quite moderate, not too hard and not too easy. The overall passing criteria is based on percentile, which is the median divided by two.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course due to the knowledge it provides for both the hardware and software industry. The campus is good, and they provide events and fests for students. They provide scholarships for students who are financially weaker, checking their background.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Better Colleges Are There in Nagpur, Go for It!

detailed_review.Placements: Ramdeobaba University, in terms of statistics, is quite declining, but if you do hard work, you can do better in any college. I suggest you try other colleges, but then also, Ramdeobaba would be better, as big companies come here, like Fivetran, which offers 50 LPA, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is quite good, especially the new DT tower, which is quite good, having 10 floors and good infrastructure inside the classroom. Hostel, I don't have much idea about, but they are also quite good, as told by my friends who are hostelites. Mess is quite good too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified; some are, and some are not, as there are some new faculty members. The old faculty's teaching style is quite good, but the new ones are quite responsible and can't finish their syllabus on time. Yes, but one thing to say is that it is a college made for the industry.
detailed_review.Other: Many events like Pratishruti, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A College with good placements, well-experienced faculty, and well-established infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: The RBU offers good placements with a nice average salary. The placement cell is good. Placement Statistics: The highest Salary = 50 LPA, Average Salary = 6.9 LPA, Total Offers = 1105, Total recruiters = 98, The highest Stipend = 2 LPM. Companies Visited: Accenture, Amazon, Bosch, Ceat.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The total campus of the college is 17 acres, providing each branch with a separate building. All buildings are well-furnished with modern digital classrooms, good-speed Wi-Fi, and well-equipped laboratories. Computer labs are also well maintained with new computers with high-end configurations. The library is very good and well maintained with an ample amount of books available for each stream. The hostel building is a little old but fully functional with facilities like 24x7 electricity, CCTVs, clean bathrooms, filtered water, hot water, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is well-experienced and very supportive, and they are well-qualified. The teaching technique is too good. The course curriculum is well designed, and they try their best to match the industry-ready student-making. Subjects like Professional Communication Lab, Linux, and Computer Workshop help students get ready for the industry. The level of the semester exam is moderate, and the pass percentage is not defined because it comes from relative grading.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the college due to its placements. The best thing about the college is the placements and alumni. There are no such big things to improve in the college, just some more grounds for sports should be available. Many events are conducted in the college, such as the Annual fest, religious festivals, technical events, etc. The campus crowd is good because everyone has qualified for exams in the 12th standard. The alumni network is also good. The campus surrounding is mostly residential with the police headquarters nearby.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of RBU, Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: This college has placement records of more than 90%. Because of the recession, last year's placements were less compared to the past year. The highest salary package offered is 50 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2.5 LPA. The average salary package offered in CSE is 6.1 LPA. The average salary package offered in other circuit branches is 7.1 LPA. Companies like Amazon, Flipkart, Nvidia, and Darwin Box visit the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a digital lab and classrooms provided by the college. Wi-Fi is available anytime on the college campus and classrooms. The library is also there in the college which has plenty of books. There are other than college curriculum also. Hostel facilities are provided by the hostel for both girls and boys. The hostel fees include facilities of a mess, a gym, a television room, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and friendly to students. The teaching quality is the best. The course curriculum is according to NEP 2020 and relevant to job opportunities. The course is modified according to the needs of the industry to provide placement opportunities. Exams are quite difficult. There is a relative grading system in the college.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because of placements and popularity of this college. The best thing about this course is that in the 1st semester itself, they are teaching subjects like HTML, CSS, C, and OS systems. I think the teaching style for some subjects to be improved. Events like Pratishruti, etc., are held. It is Asia's biggest event gathered by the college. Our college conducts Garba night. Kojagiri celebration is held by the hostel. There is a premier league for hostelite.

faqs.question: Are admissions open at Ramdeobaba University?
faqs.answer: Yes, admissions are currently open at Ramdeobaba University. Interested candidates can apply for both UG and PG courses in the stream of Management, Engineering, Humanities, Science, etc., by visiting the official website of Ramdeobaba University.

faqs.question: How does Ramdeobaba University select students for admission?
faqs.answer: Ramdeobaba University admission is merit and entrance-based . To proceed with filling out the application form, candidates must visit the official website of Ramdeobaba University and apply for the desired course. Additionally, applicants must apply and appear for the entrance exam such as JEE Main , MHT CET, CUET, GATE, CAT, etc.. faqs.question: Is there an entrance for admission to Ramdeobaba University?

After filling out the eligibility criteria candidates must apply on the official website of the university. After all the procedures the university releases its merit list. If the candidates are shortlisted on merit they are required to pay the admission fee to lock their final seats.

ranking_section.description: Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Engineering' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highli Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Engineering' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standards established by the NIRF. It has been seen that in the 'Engineering' category, the institute's ranks have shown a fluctuating trend when evaluated against the ranking of the prior year. In 2025, Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management climbed 50 ranks to #151 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. Throughout the preceding two years, the rank has oscillated but is currently stable. Explore the most recent rankings from other ranking bodies and their respective categories below. As per the NIRF 2025, Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management achieved #151-200 rank under the 'Engineering' category. It stands on par with well-known institutions such as Crescent College and BMS College of Engineering under the NIRF 'Engineering' category. facilities.name: Library
facilities.description:
The Library of Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management contains resources in print and e-resources. The Library is open to all students and staff members from 8.00 am to 8.00 pm on all working days. There is a rich collection of volumes of textbooks, reference books, National and International Journals in all branches of Engineering, Science, Technology, Management and General Studies. These Books are classified according to UDC classification scheme and open access system is followed in the Library. Library is also a member of National Library Network – DELNET.
Information from National Program on Technology Enhanced Learning (NPTEL) and other Electronic Resources are also available for the user community. On line e-journals can be accessed such as IEEE,ASCE,ASME & EBSCO, ASCE Library members are allowed to access all materials (such as Books, Journals, Magazines, Digital materials and E-Journals etc.) available in the library . Library functions such as Acquisition, Circulation, and Cataloging have been automated using integrated software ERP such as GEMS with Web OPAC.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Ramdeobaba University

likes.text: Many companies like Infosys, Wipro, Cerium Systems, VMware, Reliance Jio, SoftLink, Accenture, Informatica, InfoCept, and L&T visit the campus to hire students.
The training and placement cell of the college takes care of placements, and companies like VMware, Infosys, and other MNCs offer campus placements to students.

college_info.college_name: SMVDU: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Cutoff

highlights.summary:
SMVDU was established in 1999. The university was established under the Act of the J&K Legislature. This is a residential university.It is approved by UGC under Section 2(F) & Section 12(B) of UGC Act of 1956.
SMVDU has over 20 collaborations and houses one college of Nursing (SMVD College of Nursing), four faculties, consisting of 15 Schools. It offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Integrated and PhD programmes in the field of Engineering, Science, Management, Philosophy and other subjects of contemporary importance, with all technical courses recognised by AICTE, CIC and COA. Admissions to the University is granted on both entrance and merit-basis followed by SMVDU Direct Counselling respective to the course.
SMVDUEE / JEE Main / NATA / GATE / CAT / MAT / CMAT/ JAM / UGC-NET / JRF / SLET
