summary.college_name: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Vignan the great college, which is on 650 acres of land.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently studying in 1 year of CSM totally 29% of students have been selected for our course. 19 LPA is the highest in our college till now. I heard there are companies like Infosys, TCS, and Amazon that are coming for the hiring, and mostly all of the members got the internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is good, it was built on 650 acres. We don't get a signal since it is in the forest. We had a library whose infrastructure is awesome, and it has lots of book which helps to improve our knowledge. The food available in the hostel is quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is somewhat good, and some teachers are very helpful in supporting students in projects and helping them solve their doubts. Labs are very interesting. The course curriculum would make the students ready for the industry somewhat, but the majority should be from the students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Absolutely dissatisfied because of faculty. Good placements in 2024, not good.

detailed_review.Placements: 6 percent of students were placed. The highest is 22 LPA (off-campus), the lowest is 2.5 LPA, and the average is 3.5 LPA. Infosys, Cognizant, Accenture, 1 percent. A very basic level of teaching, I prefer not to join. The packages are just given to the top. They would get from multiple companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: No proper number of classrooms. No proper Wi-Fi. Hostels are good with a good menu and good food. No sports or any activities. The canteen is okay, not the best taste. The quality of food is not much better. The cost of food is more expensive than at other colleges.
detailed_review.Faculty: No proper teaching, dependent on PDFs. The curriculum is irrelevant to industry. The semester situation is tough. The pass percentage would be about 80, as it's autonomous. Each teacher teaches several subjects without any knowledge. There are no proper labs or a proper faculty.
detailed_review.Other: No industrial exposure nor internships. Better should not join this one. No events, only once or twice a year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology and Research, Hyderabad.

detailed_review.Placements: We have the best placements in Vignan Foundation College. Forty percent of the students are in the EEE course. The highest package is about 20 lakhs per annum, and the minimum is 5 lakhs per annum. Many top companies come to our college to offer high-paying jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Vignan Foundation has the best infrastructure. We have all subject labs, digital classrooms, and a well-stocked library with central AC and Wi-Fi available here. We have nice facilities in the hostel. We have canteens for both hostelers and day boarders.
detailed_review.Faculty: The best faculty is available in our college. They are very well-qualified and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is amazing. They are friendly to students while teaching. This course is relevant to electricity and also to industries. The semester exams are very relevant to what the faculty taught in the classrooms.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Best college for the students who only focus on studies.

detailed_review.Placements: In our Vignan College, 80% of students are placed in different companies. The highest package is 21 LPA and the lowest package is 2.6 LPA. Many big companies have recruited, such as Infosys, Global Logic, HSBC, Wipro, Cognizant, HCL, etc. Over 40% of students got selected for internships at Cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department offers well-equipped classrooms, Wi-Fi, advanced labs for practical sessions, and access to a digital and physical library for vast academic resources. The infrastructure supports interactive learning and research-based activities. We have the best medical room also.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified, supportive, and well-versed in their subject, ensuring good teaching quality. The curriculum is industry relevant, with practical exposure. Semester exams are moderate in difficult, and the pass percentage is generally above 75%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of the placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good at Vignan. Many students of this college have secured placements in Infosys, HCL, Global Logic, and many more companies. They are placed in product-based companies. The maximum package is about 12 LPA which is offered by HSBC.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is top-notch. We cannot name it. They are very well designed. Classrooms are very good and have digital boards. Wi-Fi is top notch. Labs are very well-equipped with the latest software. The quality of food in hostel is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members at my college are very qualified. Every lecture is equipped with Ph.D. from top universities in India. They provide excellent knowledge to the students regarding subjects covered in academics. The semester exams are moderate to high. Since college conducts unit exams, it is easy to pass the semester exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied with the fests and events.

detailed_review.Placements: About 88% of students got placements in the academic year 2023-2024. The highest salary package offered is 24 LPA. The lowest salary package offered ranges between about 2.5 LPA - 3 LPA. The average salary package offered varies from about 4 LPA - 6 LPA. Our college offers more than 12 courses. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Wipro, Microsoft, Capgemini, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides hostel facilities. But the quality of service is not upto the mark. Food taste is average and the fee is high compared to the outside hostels. Hostel has a Wi-Fi facility. Medical facilities are good. Sports and games are available for the hostel students.
detailed_review.Faculty: College faculty members are highly qualified and helpful (except 1-2 members). Teaching quality is average. Course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. As the institution is autonomous, semester exam question paper is prepared by the other college senior faculty members. Pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I was interested in computer science engineering, so I got into this college in EAMCET counseling. College is very strict. Events and fests are not conducted as compared to other colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Excellent infrastructure here.

detailed_review.Placements: Here in Vignan University, there are number of companies that offer placements. The highest package is 36 LPA by Google, and the lowest is 3.6 LPA, and average package is around 4 LPA - 6 LPA. Over 90% of students got placed. Most of the top recruiting companies like Soti, Infosys, Cognizant, and Accenture visited during 3rd year of B.Tech.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very excellent. It has good facilities, a huge auditorium, and library. The hostel is quite amazing with good food. College has different labs for individual courses offered. It also separates auditorium and venue halls for events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members try to share maximum knowledge that is industry oriented, and the exams are semester-wise. The pass percentage is almost 95%. The curriculum which is given here is the latest one, where the syllabus is updated wisely based on industry-oriented emerging technologies.
detailed_review.Other: It is the best college for all life improvement and to show a path for our future scope.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: This college is best if you just want to study and I say that the placement is not guaranteed.

detailed_review.Placements: The average package is 4-6 lakhs at our college, with the highest is 21 lakhs. The top recruiting companies include Amazon, Infosys, Microsoft, etc. Regarding internships, they don’t provide opportunities for students from our college unless you manage to crack an interview with the company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I don’t live in the college hostel, but my friends say it’s neither too good nor too bad. The food is set for every day. The bus for girls goes outside the campus for a distance of some kilometers. I believe they are currently building a new hostel within the campus, but overall, I think it’s decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is excellent, and you can learn a lot. For exams, you will be writing continuously: unit tests, midterms, internals, and externals. However, the faculty is very helpful with semesters since the exams are not held at our college; we take them for JNTUH. Otherwise, it’s quite strict for outsiders, I think.
detailed_review.Other: Yes, we have recently started fests in 2023, and the campus crowd is great. However, I wish the management would improve the infrastructure and provide more activities, as well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is one of the top colleges in Telangana.

detailed_review.Placements: Companies like Microsoft, Google, TCS, Infosys, and Wipro often hire interns for software development, data analysis, or machine learning roles. Internship opportunities offered through colleges vary by institution, field of study, and partnerships with companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels usually have an in-house mess providing daily meals (breakfast, lunch, snacks, and dinner). Vegetarian and non-vegetarian options may be available. Single, double, and triple sharing rooms are most common. AC and non-AC rooms may be available based on preference and budget. Furniture: A Bed, table, chair, cupboard, and often shelves are provided in each room. Common Rooms: TV rooms, study rooms, or lounges for recreation. Internet Access: Many hostels offer Wi-Fi or LAN connectivity.
detailed_review.Faculty: A faculty's knowledge base, teaching style, and accessibility profoundly influence students' education. A strong curriculum should be well-structured, regularly updated to match industry trends, and offer a mix of theoretical and practical knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: Campus life often fosters a strong sense of community. Meeting new people from diverse backgrounds in classes, dorms, and events helps students form lasting friendships. The college often organizes social events like festivals, cultural days, sports meets, and workshops that allow students to connect with others. Campuses have clubs catering to diverse interests — academic, cultural, artistic, or recreational. For example, there could be robotics clubs, debate societies, dance troupes, or hiking groups.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for education and communication skills.

detailed_review.Placements: 80-85 percent of the students will be placed in EEE. The highest package will be 8 LPA and the lowest will be 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro Accenture Amazon etc. Visit the official university/hostel website or check your admission portals for the hostel application link.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels usually have an in-house mess providing daily meals (breakfast, lunch, snacks, and dinner). Vegetarian and non-vegetarian options may be available, though this depends on the institution. Single, double, and triple-sharing rooms are most common. AC and non-AC rooms may be available based on preference and budget. Furniture: A bed, table, chair, cupboard, and often shelves are provided in each room. Common Rooms: TV rooms, study rooms, or lounges for recreation. Internet Access: Many hostels offer Wi-Fi or LAN connectivity. Well-maintained hostels, libraries, and classrooms are essential. Internet facilities and dedicated space for studying or group work boost productivity.
detailed_review.Faculty: A faculty's knowledge base, teaching style, and accessibility profoundly influence students' education. A strong curriculum should be well-structured, regularly updated to match industry trends and offer a mix of theoretical and practical knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I have an interest in electronics, and the best part is that we have opportunities in both the software and core sides. There will be events like Freshers, Farewell, Traditional Day, Department Day, etc. Sports will be held every second and fourth Saturday.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: "Rigorous academics at Vignan's Institute: A student's perspective."

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, most of our seniors were eligible for placements and for writing the entrance exam. 85% of students are eligible for companies, and the top recruiting companies in our college are Accenture, Infosys, Genpact, and Amazon. The average package in our college is 3.5 LPA per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is excellent. We have 6 floors, and each floor consists of 3 to 5 labs. Mainly, our course or branch faculty members are very well trained, and they have great knowledge of the particular subjects. They are very cooperative with students and support and guide us very well regarding our academics. We also have a very large sports area, and specifically, we have a cricket ground, football ground, and volleyball court.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our branch faculty members are very friendly with students, and each and everyone has a good degree. They teach us very well and are very helpful to us. Every semester, we have 2 mid examinations, 2 unit exams, and 1 pre-final exam. These exams help us very well while writing the final semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: The main benefit of our course is that we have both chances of getting placed in government jobs as well as private jobs. We also have a chance to get software jobs. Compared to other colleges, our college arranges fewer events, and every year we have one event.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A best institute to succeed in life.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college, placements are good. In terms of percentage, 65 percent of students get placed. The highest package is 21 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, Dell, TCS, Wipro, Savanthis, Hytech Solutions, and Tech Mahindra.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms have sufficient space to sit and free space to move around. Everyone will get Wi-Fi, and the labs are very hygienic. The library is also available, and there are many books in the library, all of which are good books that will help everyone gain knowledge.
detailed_review.Faculty: In my college, all the teachers are helpful, and all the faculty have higher knowledge. The quality of teaching is very good. All the teachers are professional, and well-educated. Yes, the curriculum is relevant, and every student is industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Super and best college.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% placement is provided, and the highest package is 21 LPA, and the minimum package is 4.5 LPA. Each branch's students are getting jobs; they are trying so hard to give placements to the students, and all the facilities are good. CRT is the main one.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good classrooms and Wi-Fi signal and smart teaching, and all are good. The library is good; we can get a lot of books in the library with good qualities, and all are the best. This is the place with good hostel facilities, and all no private hostels come under this best interior and food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Super faculty. The curriculum is good. The exams which they are keeping for students are good; they are keeping for our knowledge only, best for students by keeping exams, and revising is also good. Thanks to this college. The faculty is teaching twice and twice for students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: A College with money minded.

detailed_review.Placements: Somewhat, there are placements only for CSE students, not for all other branch students. Other branch students don't have any chance to attend the interviews. Core branch placements are not held in these colleges. I don't have any good experience with it, and I wouldn't suggest anyone join this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college is good and well-maintained, with good facilities. The college is located in the mountains, with a good environment, and is well-maintained. However, students face some problems. All campuses are located on one hill, where all the colleges are built together.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers have less knowledge about the subjects. All are money-minded and do not work for students' knowledge. They care only about money. They never try to send students to exams without paying the fee. I sincerely advise you not to join this college if you want to study well with a free mind.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is okay with the placements, and most of the people will get placed in a good company.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of the people will get placement with 75% marks and above, and they will get into a good company, with a minimum package. The maximum number of people are placed in the company, and most of the faculty will help students to get placed and they are well maintained by the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Libraries and classes are well maintained, and hostel food is very good. Hostels are well maintained by the hostel staff, and there is no ragging inside or outside the hostel. Most of the faculty members are living in hostels because of the good maintenance.
detailed_review.Faculty: As per my personal opinion, the faculty is well qualified, and they are friendly with students. They will help in many things like education and other things also. They will help in placements and etc. They will solve all the personal problems also.
detailed_review.Other: We have 3 playgrounds, but we don't play in them.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Vignan Institute of Technology and Science.

detailed_review.Placements:
- 75% percentage
- The highest package is 21 LPA, the lowest is 2 LPA, and 4 LPA.
- Raam Group, Adani, VPG, Aliens Group, Keeline, Future Group, JKM, YSI.
- Around 10% of people are placed in our branch as there are very few internship opportunities provided for civil surveying.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
- Decent-sized classrooms with a seating capacity of around 64. Classrooms are equipped with projectors, and we have all kinds of labs with necessary equipment. We have a good library with a variety of books.
- The hostels are very nice, and depending on our interest and comfort, we can get into AC and non-AC hostels. The mess food is very good. We do have medical facilities with medical practitioners. We have a good number of sports facilities like kabaddi, volleyball, badminton, and chess.
detailed_review.Faculty:
- The teachers are young, yet they are well-qualified and teach quite well.
- As it is an autonomous college, the college is making its own syllabus, and all the courses are industry-ready.
- The exams are at a moderate level. If we study one week before the exams, it's enough to pass them.
detailed_review.Other:
- For my rank, I am getting this course only. That's why I chose this course. The course is designed well, and the staff is good and qualified.
- It would be better if the faculty were experienced, and the sports facilities need to be improved.
- Navtara, Vista. Scholarships from national and state levels are provided.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides better infrastructure and more opportunities in industry.

detailed_review.Placements:
80% of students get placed.
The highest package is 12 LPA.
The lowest package is 3 LPAs.
The top recruiting companies in our college are Infosys, TCS, Amazon, etc.
About 45 percent of students are pursuing internships at our college. 
The top roles offered in our college are web development, data analysis, and a few more companies in non-technical fields.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a spacious library, and it is equipped with Wi-Fi. It contains both digital and text book support. Our classes are equipped with Wi-Fi and with a digital class room, the quality of the food was not to good but it was okay and we have a have a canteen and medical facilities available in our college.

detailed_review.Other:
I chose this course to evolve into a technical and interesting computer.
We have good number of events and a better environment.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

The ground is very big, and each game has its specified court where it is played. Parking for bikes and cars is also available.

detailed_review.Other: Computer Science has been my interest from the very beginning, and with the academic outcomes of this particular department, I feel that I can pursue my dreams. To be honest, the events and fests conducted are twice a year, which is unique from other colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Come to VITS for studies.

detailed_review.Placements: Out of 150 (approximately) students, around 50-60 ppl were placed if we take into consideration. Top recruiters were TCS etc. Top salary is 8LPA. Internship also available based on your Skills the lowest salary 3.2 LPA. As it is recession companies are kind rare. But good companies come here .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Library is good and faculty are good too. Library is big enough and books are mostly available for all students. Faculty is good too (if you decide to be on their good side) Faculty are mostly supportive if given respect that they deserve. Little favoritism is present .
detailed_review.Faculty: If you want to study hard is one of the best colleges for you. Teachers are qualified. Semester exams (now autonomous) so mostly known questions. The curriculum is and pass percentage is around 75. Teaching quality is also good and they prepare you enough for sem end exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of the VIGNAN college. It is good to study and many students were placed here.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of the students were placed in our course. The highest package offered in our course is 8 LPA, the lowest is 4 LPA and the medium package offered in our course is 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies of our course are TCS, Amazon, Flipkart, Microsoft, Google, etc. 75% of students got internships in our course at the above-mentioned companies. The top roles offered are sales manager, product manager and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our course department, we have Wi-Fi facilities and we also have labs for the purpose of doing practices. In classrooms, we have digital classrooms to help students understand the subject easily and we have a library to study in. And coming to the facilities of the hostel, we also have Wi-Fi in our hostel, we have a play ground to play games, and the quality of food in our hostel mess is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are so helpful to teach us; they are knowledgeable and qualified; the teaching quality is superb; the course curriculum is relevant; it makes the students industry-ready; the semester exams are not very tough in our college; we can pass easily if we start the preparation 2 weeks before the exams; and the pass percentage is 75.

college_info.college_name: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

admission.title: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research offers admissions to UG, PG and PhD courses in various streams.These include- BBA, BTech, MTech, BSc, BA, MBA, etc. Some of the popular exams accepted by the institution for admission are GATE, TS EAMCET, and TS PGECET, etc.Vignan Institute of Technology and Science admissions are primarily entrance-based . Moreover, application forms are filled out in an online mode on the official website of Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research .

faqs.question: What are the documents required for admission at Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research?
faqs.answer: Vignan Institute of Technology and Science admissions are entirely entrance-based. Application forms are filled out in an online mode on the official website of VFSTR. List of Important Documents:

faqs.question: How can I get admission in Vignan Foundation for Science, Technology & Research?
faqs.answer: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research offers a wide range of programmes at UG, PG and PhD levels. VFSTR admissions are entrance based for courses offered at UG and PG levels. The college offers BTech, BSc, BBA, and BCA programmes to students at the UG levels across several specialisations such as Information Technology & Computer Applications, Psychology, Commerce, Computer Applications, etc.

faqs.question: How can I apply for Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research?
faqs.answer: Vignan Institute of Technology and Science offers admissions to UG & PG courses in the stream of Engineering and Technology. Admission is only open to those who qualify in the TS EAMCET and complete the counselling process. So, before starting your application, make sure you meet all the eligibility criteria. Step 1: Go to the official TS EAMCET site (eamcet.tsche.ac.in) Step 2: Sign up with phone, email ID, and personal details Step 3: Complete the TS EAMCET application form and attach photocopies of the documents Step 4: Pay the application cost covered by the offered online payment options Step 5: Save and take a print copy as a reference in future Step 6: Attend the TS EAMCET examination at the allotted date Step 7: Post results, take part in TS EAMCET counselling and make VITS your college of choice

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology and Research?
faqs.answer: VFSTR Hyderabad courses are offered to students at UG and PG levels, mainly in the field of Engineering. The college offers various programmes such as BTech, BBA, BSc, MBA, MCA, MSc, etc. across several specialisations. The college offers a BTech programme to students at the UG level for a duration of 4 years in full-time mode. Further, the fees of the BTech programme at VFSTR ranges between INR 4 Lacs and INR 14.4 lakh.

faqs.question: Does Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research offer BTech in Data Science?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research offers a BTech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) with an intake capacity of 180 seats. This course is designed to prepare students for data-centric roles in industries using real-time tools and analytics.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in BTech at Vignan Institute of Technology and Science?
faqs.answer: Candidates will have to appear in TS EAMCET to get admission in BTech course at Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research. Seats are allocated under counselling according to ranks and eligibility. The candidate should also possess minimum academic requirements at Class 12. Selection is done by verifying of documents and payment of fee.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for BTech admission at Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research?
faqs.answer: Candidates must have passed Class 12 with a minimum of 60% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. They must also qualify for the TS EAMCET entrance exam conducted in Telangana. Final selection at Vignan Institute of Technology and Science is based on the EAMCET rank and counselling performance.

faqs.question: What is the fees of MBA at Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fees of the MBA course at Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology & Research is INR 6 lakh. Overall fee may include certain other components such as hostel and mess fees (if available), exam fees, security deposists, etc.

faqs.question: How can I apply for M.Tech at Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research?
faqs.answer: Admission into M.Tech can be done using TS PGECET/GATE scores. After the declaration of results, apply to counselling and make Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research as a preference. The applicants are admitted in light of their scores, seats and eligibility. Verification of documents and submission of fees is necessary in order to give a final selection.

faqs.question: What all specialisations are offered under the M.Tech course at Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research?
faqs.answer: The M.Tech course at Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology and Research is offered in the following specialisations:-

faqs.question: Is GATE score compulsory for M.Tech at Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research?
faqs.answer: No a GATE score is optional. TS PGECET can be also used to secure admission to M.Tech at Vignans Foundation for Science, Technology and Research. The candidates should have requirements of graduation. Both the two entrance tests are enough to apply.

faqs.question: What is the duration of BBA at Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research?
faqs.answer: The duration of the BBA course at Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology & Research is of three years. Admissions to the course are merit/entrance-based. Eligible candidates are those who have passed Class 12 with a minimum if 50% aggregate.

faqs.answer:
Vignan Institute of Technology and Science has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have completed B.E./B.Tech./AMIE in Mechanical Engg./Automobile Engg., /Metallurgy/ Industrial Engg./Mechanical Engg. Preference will be given to GATE qualified candidates over TS PGECET qualified candidates.
Candidate must have secured 50% marks in group subjects taken together in the qualifying examination (45% for reserved category). B.E. / B.Tech Candidates who have passed or appeared at the final year of the Diploma examination in Engineering conducted by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh or any other examination recognised as equivalent thereto by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh.
Candidates should have completed 16 years of age, as on 31st December of the year of admission. There is no upper age limit. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research campus offers a safe environment to students. The college provides all the essential facilities, including academic blocks, a library, collaboration spaces, a café, a convenience store, etc. VFSTR Hyderabad campus has state-of-the-art infrastructure, which includes designed classrooms, 24/7 computer labs, a modern library, a huge auditorium, etc. The college offers all the modern amenities and caters to all the needs of students.

Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research offers separate on-campus hostels for boys and girls that can accommodate 1300 boys and 1200 girls. Each hostel’s safety is taken care of by a team of guards. The hostel dispensary is managed by a doctor and a nurse, with facilities for first-aid and treatment of minor ailments. Also, a 24/7 ambulance facility is available for emergencies.

Further, the institute also provides a vibrant and engaging environment to students. The college encourages students to participate in extra-curricular activities, including sports, cultural events, etc. About 44 buses plying along different routes connect the university to Guntur, Tenali, Vijayawada, Repalle, Bapatla, Chirala, Chilakaluripet, etc. Students are ensured comfortable and affordable transportation in a time-bound manner.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 222 published reviews , 179 reviews are verified.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of MCE - Malnad College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently in the 2nd year, and I am sharing my experience.  Regarding placements, the minimum package for internships or placements are around 7 to 10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides Wi-Fi connections for students. Wi-Fi is high-speed and available 24/7. The library is inside the college campus and has a lot of books, which are divided by branch. Watchmen do not allow entry to the college without showing an ID card. The college has three main gates.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly qualified and well educated. They help students become industry-ready and learn extra skills through extra classes. Exams are difficult, and semester examinations are also difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I am in the second year of Information Science and Engineering. I apply for scholarships. The college conducts events and fests yearly and month-wise.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of MCE - Malnad College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: We are the last batch in our branch, as placements go down, especially for CS-related fields, due to recession and AI automation. Placements are now at their lowest. This year, only 3-4 students get offers, with an average of 4-5 LPA. Companies like TCS, Wipro, and Infosys are top recruiters, and all are service-based companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library is decent, but full of old books. Wi-Fi is available, and you have to register to get student Wi-Fi. Classrooms are decent with projectors. Mess is not large, so it gets overcrowded at break time. The sports and games facilities are average. The ground is not good and not well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. They clarify doubts, but the teaching method is not good as they just continuously run the PPT. They do not use the board frequently, especially for subjects like Java and OS. The old curriculum is not relevant in this AI era. Semester exams are difficult. They make 2 papers, one from the branch and the other from another college. Usually, the external papers are hard, and the college papers are medium.
detailed_review.Other: I come here because I do not get CS. I am interested in CS because I love programming. The course focuses on old theory, not relevant to industry-standard skills. They must improve that. They do fests like Jamboree and all, it is well organised, and there are many activities to participate in.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nothing is good here, faculty, placements, college life, and campus.

detailed_review.Placements: The average package is 2.5 LPA, and only services and sales-based companies visit the campus. Most seniors blame the college for not getting placed. Neither TCS nor Accenture will visit the campus from 2025. Some sales companies hire students for BPO jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is under construction. It is small, and the canteen is horrible. There is no space to bunk classes and sit with friends. The campus is fully crowded. The student's behavior is often rude. Illiterate people are the majority on this campus. Even to date, they teach nothing for life or placements. The classes are old, with no innovation in infrastructure. Only the admission department looks cozy.
detailed_review.Faculty: Even the lecturers who graduated from the same college teach us here. It has MCA, MBA, BCA, and BE programs, but nothing feels worth it here. Faculty behavior is the worst. If you can accommodate in Tamil, then there is free space for you. Teachers of CSE belong to the Tamil community. Most of them show concern only for students who speak in Tamil.
detailed_review.Other: The management fee for CSE is 1.5 LPA. Just don’t join here if the cost is higher. It is not worth the money.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A satisfactory college experience for engineering students.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement in our college is quite good, especially for CSE students. This year, 50 students from our campus got placements in companies through on-campus recruitment. With the right training and preparation, students have a bright chance to get placed. That is why I give 4 out of 5 ratings to the placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructural support for my course is good. It has properly equipped classrooms and labs. Along with conducive learning atmosphere. Hostel facilities are also adequate with basic facilities and a comfortable living atmosphere. In essence, infrastructural support is very good for academics and living.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching faculty in my course is very cooperative and well-versed in the subject matter. They can clarify concepts well. The coursework is well-organized and includes both theoretical and applied knowledge. Exams are held regularly. They are moderate intensity.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Any student who wants to join the college when other options are not available can be considered.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest placement package varies year to year. The previous cycle is 10 LPA - 15 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. Core branch placement, especially EEE, civil, and mech are frequently less than non-core branches like CSE. Dr AIT recruitment companies are TCS, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, etc. Internship is quite less, and students have to search internships themselves, colleges will not help us with internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is quite decent with a good environment and culture that brings most of the students to enjoy and study at the college. Regarding the lab, classroom, and library are old infrastructure with old lab equipment. Hostel/canteen food and sports facilities are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. Qualified and experienced professors are available on the subject who can explain the core concepts with slides and a board. EEE branch is the most difficult branch with 2nd and 3rd year subjects that include network analysis, power system, power electronics, and electrical machines.
detailed_review.Other: It is a decent college with less fee compared to other private colleges, with good connectivity. Fests are good, and events are not much attractive. Overall, it's good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is too old for this generation.

detailed_review.Placements: My batch was 2023, and my course is Computer Science and Engineering. In our batch, 10 members got internships, and up to 75 percent of students are placed. The highest package is 35+ LPA, the average is above 10 LPA, and the minimum is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Visa, AMD, and Amazon. As mentioned, 10 members get internships, and the roles offered are Software Engineer and Web Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite good. The greenery is the best part of this college. Wi-Fi is quite good, and classrooms are okay. The library is old and looks medium-sized. The hostel facilities are poor. The food is the worst I have seen, the rooms are not good, and the water quality is bad. The canteen seating is okay. Sports programs are conducted well, and there is a big ground, but it has been reduced in size recently.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are not very helpful. Their teaching skills are not good, but some teachers are well-qualified. The teaching quality is overall poor, and the curriculum is not very relevant. Semester exams are easy, not difficult. The pass percentage is 90 percent, so students can easily pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my COMEDK rank. The best part of my course is that it involves practical work in all subjects. There are two major events, Spandana and Halcyon. The student crowd is medium, and the campus is covered with trees and greenery. Many clubs conduct various activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good placements and a nice infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 75-80 percent of students get placed. The highest package is 60 LPA. The average package ranges from 10-12 LPA. In my cybersecurity branch, the average package offered is 14 LPA, as it has less intake. The major companies are JP Morgan, Morgan Stanley, Hewlett Packard, and Oracle.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available here. The speed is not good across the campus, but good in labs. There are a lot of labs and libraries with a lot of systems and proper internet in that area. There are at least 60-70 systems in labs. Digital libraries are also there. Sports ground and facilities are also there.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. Semester exams are at a good level. The college does everything to make us industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it's unique and always relevant to CSE cybersecurity. It is the best option I have in Bangalore city. It has numerous coding and AI-related clubs. It also has a lot of personality development clubs.

reviews.course: B.E. in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: For other state students, it is not value for money.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has bad placement opportunities. I have not gotten placements till now. A low number of companies come to our college. The top role offered in the college is a software developer. Clarivate company recruits more students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus infrastructure is not good. There is no playground in the whole big college. Wi-Fi facility is not available in hostels, and it is only available in labs. The mess food is not so good, and it tastes average. The campus hygiene is well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are well-qualified and well-dignified. They teach and explain very well. Semester exams are very difficult, and it's very hard to pass. The pass percentage is around 60 percent. The course curriculum is well-structured and relevant.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It has decent academics with average placements and a good campus environment.

detailed_review.Placements: In CS, CS allied branches, and ECE students usually get better placements than others. Basically, it is the same as other Tier 2 colleges. As RN Shetty has a name, we get better treatment than other colleges in tier 2. The top recruiting Companies for our course are Mind Hives, Infosys, Cognizant, Oracle, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel amenities are considered to be average, as only the bare minimum of facilities are available. The food served in the mess is eatable. However, it is not of a very good standard. The canteen provides a few choices that are moderately priced. Health care services are minimal since only first aid and a hospital in the area are provided in case of emergencies. There are some sports facilities for both indoor and outdoor games. However, the extent to which these will be used depends on the level of enthusiasm of students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members at RNSIT Bengaluru are, in most cases, well-educated, seasoned, and experts in their respective fields of study. Generally, staff members are helpful and friendly, especially when internal assessments are going on and during doubt and clearing sessions. However, the quality of teaching may differ from one faculty to another. The program is based on the VTU syllabus and aims to equip students with a sound theoretical base. Still, learners have to take the initiative for self-study, doing projects, and joining internships if they want to be competent in the industry.
detailed_review.Other: Events organised are good for freshers. Teachers are good and kind.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you have any other option, just go rather than this.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is low to average as the placement of this college has been decreasing since 2023. The average package is 6 LPA, and the highest is not yet decided as the placement is still going on. The highest package was around 44 LPA - 45 LPA in 2022 - 2023, I think.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is pretty decent and cannot be considered as low. The college campus is not that much huge but it can be considered as average. The course is pretty good. The hostel is also decent. Hostel infrastructure and all are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They are helping in nature. They also teaches good. As in college, you should know that you cannot be fully dependent on the faculty, and we have to do it on our own. The exams are also good. There are 2 internals and 1 external.
detailed_review.Other: College really does not value our money, they do not spend much on infrastructure. The fees for non Karnataka student is like 2 times as of Karnataka student.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good academic institution with an awesome campus.

detailed_review.Placements: As I am studying in BMSCE college under the Computer Science Engineering course in our 2025 batch, more than 1000 students are studying in other courses. The highest package is nearly 50 LPA, the average is 8 LPA-10 LPA, and the lowest is 5 LPA. There are many top companies like PayPal, and many others. Here, a minimum of 70 percent of students get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As our college has excellent infrastructure, which gives a good Wi-Fi, and our course is CSE, which has many projects and other activities like coding and hackathons. Coming to the library, it is a heavenly place that I have experienced. Classrooms are also good. Here, sports are given more preference as our college sports trophies are displayed in the sports room, at the state, national, and international levels.
detailed_review.Faculty: I experienced the best faculty ever with good teaching skills for our course. As they conduct 3 internals before semesters and consider the best of two for CGP and papers, also understanding that semester exams are good but a little difficult, as we can manage them.
detailed_review.Other: I am a CSE student. Actually, I got admission to this college through the KCET exam, and as I asked my seniors who are working in high-paying companies, they are from this BMS college itself, and they suggested this college. The things to improve our college are a little bit involved in activities like fests and others.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If your rank is low, you can join this college, learn on your own, and get placed on your own.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are below average since there is no placement of our seniors, I heard. Every student who got an internship has taken an external internship. No percentage of people are placed, so we don't have any of the highest packages or the lowest packages. If you can find outside, you would find a full-stack web development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Even though there is no placement, the college infrastructure is good and has many labs and Wi-Fi throughout the college for different branches. We got a new building this year. The hostel is more than expected, the mess food is very good since it is a government hostel, the mess is run by students only.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the faculty don't teach well, but they have earned a Ph.D., so they give important questions as an assignment and make them read for exams, as only the questions return in the exam. It doesn't make industry-ready since no faculty teach well. The average pass percentage is about 75 percent, and below since sometimes the university gives the questions hard.
detailed_review.Other: Since the government college fee is low, I have chosen this college, the CSE branch. I wish to improve the placements in the college. Events and fests are rarely done. We get an SSP scholarship from the Karnataka government.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement and has a green campus.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college 75 percent of students got placed. The highest package is around 26 LPA, the lowest package offered is 3 LPA and the average package offered is around 9 LPA. The top Recruiting companies for our college are Amazon, Flipkart, Cognizant, Phonepay, IBM etc. 75 to 80 percent of students got internships from your college in Google, Samsung, Deloitte etc. Top roles that are offered are SDE, web developer, full stack developer etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is spread over 24 acres, and the infrastructure is quite good with a vast library having sources from all departments. Our classrooms are fully spacious with one wall of glass to get proper sunlight. They provide full speed Wi-Fi for hostellers and in college also. The quality of our hostel is sometimes good but sometimes it is not hygienic. Sports facilities provided by the hostel are quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful towards students in their studies and projects but some teachers discriminate based on their state. Teachers are highly qualified & knowledgeable in their respective subjects. The teaching quality offered by them is good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it helps the students to be prepared at the industry level too. Semester exams of BMSIT&M CSE depth are quite easy to moderate level while the checking is sometimes strict. It is easy to score if we study for 2 weeks. Pass percentage is 85 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of BMSIT&M placements, campus, and hostel by a 2nd-year student.

detailed_review.Placements: Students who got placed in CSE are around 75 percent. The highest package offered is 46 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.25 LPA. The average package offered is 9 LPA. Companies that visited the college for recruiting are Oracle, Rapid, Infosys, Microsoft, Junglee Rummy, etc. 70-80 percent of students got internships in companies like IBM, Cisco, Microsoft, Google, Atlassian, etc. Roles offered for students are SDE, full-stack developer, SWE, data engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure offered by department blocks is good. They have spacious classrooms, full-speed Wi-Fi, modern labs with the latest equipment, and a vast library that consists of various books and journals from all departments. The quality of facilities offered by the hostel, be it for boys or girls, is good. Mess food and canteen food quality are good and tasty. Medical facilities are available 24 hours in the hostels. It has a sports facility, a chill area, and vending machines.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are surely very helpful and reachable to students. They have immense knowledge and experience in their fields. They are highly qualified, too. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant to today's industry era. The course curriculum helps us get trained for industry-level skills. The difficulty level of semester-end exams is moderate and can be easily passed by just studying for a week or two prior. The pass percentage is around 80-85 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It provides good placements for the year 2025, good infrastructure, and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: In CSE for the year 2025, 75.37 percent of students got placed. The highest package offered is 46.4 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.25 LPA. The average package offered is 9 LPA. Top companies that visit the college for recruitment include Microsoft, Oracle, Rapid, Siemens, and West Pharmaceuticals. Around 80 percent of students got internships in companies like Google, Microsoft, AWS, Deloitte, Atlassian, IBM, etc. Roles offered to students are SDE, data analyst, full-stack developer, and SWE.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure offered by department blocks is good. It has spacious classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, modern labs with the latest equipment, and a vast central library that contains various books and journals from all departments. The quality of the facilities offered by the hostel, be it for boys or girls, is good. Mess and canteen food quality is good. Medical facilities are available 24x7 in both hostels. It also has indoor sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful towards students. They are qualified and knowledgeable in their respective fields. The teaching quality is also nice. The course curriculum is also quite relevant, and helps students to be prepared for the industry level. Semester exams of the CSE Department are easy to moderate. But it is easy to score if we study 1 to 2 weeks prior. The pass percentage is around 85 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is one of the top 5 colleges in Bangalore and is a nice option to take.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are average, not too good, and not too bad. It is better than other colleges in Bangalore. BMSIT is in the top 5 colleges in Bangalore. It is a nice option to come and study here. The only thing is we need to be serious to prepare, study here, and give our 100 percent.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is nice, clean, and hygienic. The food served is also nice. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food are offered. Breakfast is very nice compared to the nearby PG and other places. Our college hostel is way better than other places to live. I suggest students join the hostel rather than any other place.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are moderate here, not too tough and not too easy. It is easy to score marks and also to get more than 8.5 CGPA. Overall, everything is nice and helpful. Faculty members are good too. They also support us and give extra questions to practice and improve ourselves.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The Ghousia College of Engineering is a good college.

detailed_review.Placements: Ghousia College of Engineering Ramnagar, is a good college. 70% of students are placed in our Electronics and Communication course. The highest package is 7 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA, and the average package is 3 LPA at Ghousia College of Engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Ghousia College of Engineering has good and medium facilities and infrastructure available for the Electronics and Communication course. It has good Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and a library. The quality of the mess and canteen is medium good on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: At Ghousia College of Engineering, the teachers are very good and helpful to the students. Qualified teachers are present in our college, and all teachers are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is also good, and the curriculum is relevant, making students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the Electronics and Communication course; this course has a good future. My best suggestion is for everyone to choose Electronics and Communication Engineering. I wish our course would improve.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the facilities and their teaching..

detailed_review.Placements: In SIT, we have almost 100% placements. Our training and placement department will bring all the possible companies. While coming to our branch Electronics and Communication, we have above 70% of packages. The highest package is as high as 34 LPA. Our branch ECE package is 20 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have all the infrastructure available, such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and libraries. As I'm a day scholar, I know the facilities in the hostels, such as Wi-Fi facilities, hot water, clothes washing, and so on. The food is absolutely good and tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and clearly explain the topics. They will clarify our doubts. The syllabus they keep is very useful for the company and industries. The semester exams are good. We have to score 40% in both internals and exams for passing.
detailed_review.Other: Firstly, I wanted to join the SIT irrespective of the branch. I got ECE, and the best thing about this is that we can go either for the core or the IT side. Our college conducts events regularly to improve the students' skills. Our college has the biggest fests, Halcyon and Spandana, which will be celebrated grandly.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the facilities, their teaching, and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In SIT, we have almost 100 percent placements. Our training and placement department will bring all the possible companies. While coming to our branch, Electronics and Communication, we have above 70 percent of packages! The highest package is as high as 34 LPA. Our branch ECE package is 20LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have all the infrastructure available, such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and libraries. As I am a day scholar, I know the facilities in the hostels, such as Wi-Fi facilities, hot water, clothes washing, and so on. The food is absolutely good and tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and clearly explain the topics. They will clarify our doubts. The syllabus they keep is very useful for the company and industries. The semester exams are good. We have to score 40 percent in both internals and exams for passing.
detailed_review.Other: Firstly, I wanted to join the SIT irrespective of the branch. I got ECE, and the best thing about this is that we can go either for the core or the IT side. Our college conducts events regularly to improve the students skills. Our college has the biggest fests, Halcyon and Spandana, which will be celebrated grandly.

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: A good college for students to choose in Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: I belong to the 2022–2026 batch of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Most students who are interested in placements get placed. The package is good enough, with an average of 3 LPA to the highest 44 LPA. Many MNCs come to our college for recruitment. It is good overall for anyone to start their career in tech.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I stay in the hostel, so it is average in terms of Wi-Fi and food. But in college, it is quite good in terms of Wi-Fi, classrooms, labs, and the library. Labs are properly set up. So there are not many setup or electricity issues. The library is a gem for anyone who wants to study at their own pace and learn a lot.
detailed_review.Faculty: As I am from the AIML department, our faculty members are helpful, supportive, and allow us to explore and learn. Even though we are given assignments, we are given plenty of time to submit them. We do not get much trouble from teachers. In this era of rapidly growing tech. They give us exposure to learn and explore ourselves.
detailed_review.Other: The college is absolutely fine in terms of value for money. I suggest coming to find your matching peers, learn, grow, build, and move ahead with them across multiple campuses to showcase your projects, ideas, and build a network. That is what matters. You will meet different kinds of groups in college, and it is all up to you to enjoy and find your circle. Tech is not something that is taught once and learned from teachers. It is a path that you have to find in the environment given to you.

college_info.college_name: Visvesvaraya Technological University Belgaum Admission 2025: Eligibility, Fees & Selection Criteria

faqs.question: Does VTU Belgaum accept JEE score?
faqs.answer: The undergraduate admissions at our institute are conducted through a comprehensive evaluation process that considers scores from various entrance exams. Specifically, for engineering programs, the Joint Entrance Examination (JEE Main) plays a pivotal role in assessing the candidates' aptitude and knowledge in the field. Additionally, for courses related to architecture, the Karnataka Common Entrance Test (KCET) is a key determinant in the admission process, emphasizing the importance of subject-specific assessments. On the other hand, postgraduate admissions offer a diverse range of programs including M.Tech, M.Arch, MBA, MCA, and MCA (Lateral). This variety reflects the institute's commitment to providing advanced education across multiple disciplines. The Master of Technology (M.Tech) and Master of Architecture (M.Arch) programs cater to individuals seeking specialisation in engineering and architecture, respectively. For those inclined towards management, the Master of Business Administration (MBA) programme is tailored to hone leadership skills and business acumen. Meanwhile, the Master of Computer Applications (MCA) program, along with its lateral entry option, accommodates the dynamic needs of the evolving IT landscape. The institute's emphasis on a diverse array of postgraduate courses underscores its dedication to nurturing expertise across sectors, thereby contributing to a well-rounded educational environment that prepares students for the challenges of the professional world. Overall, the admissions process reflects a commitment to academic excellence and the holistic development of students.

faqs.question: Does VTU accepts JEE for BTech?
faqs.answer: Yes, VTU accepts Joint Entrance Examination Main (JEE Main) scores for admission to its Bachelor of technology programme (BE/BTech). In addition to Joint Entrance Examination Main, the college also accepts scores of other entrance exams such as COMEDK UGET,  Karnataka Common Entrance Test (KCET),  Karnataka Post Graduate Common Entrance Test (KPGCET), etc. Candidates must also have valid eligibility criteria, i.e., a pass in Class 12 with 45% aggregate in PCM for GM students and above 40% aggregate for SC/ ST students.

faqs.question: What are the cutoff marks required for B.Tech at VTU Belgaum?
faqs.answer: The cutoff marks for each course under B.Tech program at VTU Belgaum varies each year with respect to the specialization opted, seat intake and the total number of applicants. An VTU, KCET Cut off of 36616 to 48454th rank was required for general category students for B.Tech in various specializations and 39023 to 58533rd rank for SC category students for B.Tech in various specializations. This is as per the latest information available at the resources. It is advisable to visit the official website for accurate details.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for the VTU MBA programme?
faqs.answer: Canddiates who have passed a recognised Bachelor’s Degree of a minimum of three years duration or equivalent examination and obtained a minimum of 50 % aggregate is eligible for admission to VTU MBA programme. The candidates appear for the  Entrance Examination conducted by KEA (PGCET)/Karnataka Management Aptitude Test (KMAT) or appeared and qualified under any approved entrance examination conducted by the authority recognised by the Government of Karnataka/VTU /the any other University of Karnataka state. NOTE: 45% of marks in case of SC, ST and Category-I of Karnataka candidates. (Reservation is applicable only for Karnataka Candidates)

faqs.question: What is the latest cutoff information for MBA at VTU Belgaum?
faqs.answer: As per the recent information from the resources, the Visvesvaraya Technological University cut off 2023 for MBA is expected to range from 36610- 48460th rank for the general category. You can refer to the link mentioned below to redirect to past cutoff trends for MBA at VTU Belgaum. Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU): Cutoff, Placements, Courses, Admissions 2024 (shiksha.com)

faqs.question: What are the minimum marks required for MBA at VTU Belgaum 2023?
faqs.answer: There are no specified minimum marks required at VTU Belgaum for MBA as cutoffs are subject to change annually as per the course opted and the seat allocation. However, The general MBA eligibility criteria at VTU is securing a minimum aggregate score of 50% or above or equivalent CGPA in graduation from a recognised university. You can refer to the past cutoff trends for a better insight about the minimum marks required for admission to MBA.

faqs.question: How much does BSc at Visvesvaraya Technological University cost?
faqs.answer: The Visvesvaraya Technological University BSc fee structure includes the tuition fees, registration fees, e-consortium fee, student sports fees, etc. The tuition fee is the most major component of the fee structure. It ranges from INR 1.9 Lacs to INR 3.8 lakh for various specialisations. The fee amount differs for the students from and outside of Karnataka. The fee mentioned information is taken from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to changes and hence indicative.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam scores does VTU Belgaum accept for admission to MBA?
faqs.answer: VTU Belgaum is one of the top colleges of Belgaum. It offers a total of 107 courses under its MBA program. VTU accepts multiple entrance exams like KMAT/CAT/PGCET/MAT/ XAT entrance examination for admission to the MBA program. The final selection of the candidates will be made on the basis of scores obtained in the entrance examination.

faqs.question: What is the BTech fee at VTU Belgaum?
faqs.answer: The course fees for a BTech at VTU Belgaum range from INR 45,000 to INR 30 lakh , depending on the specialisations/affiliated institutes opted for. The course fee is different for students from and outside of Karnataka, providing additional benefits to the students belonging to Karnataka. Besides the tuition fees, the VTU BTech fee structure includes the registration fees, e-consortium fee, student sports fees, etc. The fee mentioned information is taken from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to changes and hence indicative.

data.title: Visvesvaraya Technological University Belgaum Placement Report 2024
summary: According to Visvesvaraya Technological University Management and Engineering NIRF reports 2024, the key highlights of MTech and MBA placements over the past two years are presented below:
MTech students opted for higher studies
MBA students opted for higher studies

faqs.question: Are there any good placements in VTU for MBA students?
faqs.answer: The placements at VTU have shown an increasing trend over the previous years. The median package offered to MBA students at VTU increased from INR 3.5 LPA in 20221 to INR 3.65 LPA in 2022. Many new recruiters are getting on-board for the placement drive at VTU each year. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the average package that a student can expect after doing MBA from VTU?
faqs.answer: The average package offered to MBA students of VTU in the past few years, lies within the range of INR 3-4 LPA. placement_faqs.question: Are there any internships in the curriculum of MBA Courses at VTU?
placement_faqs.answer: Yes, the students pursuing MBA from VTU have to go through an internship during the second year of the course. Internship is a compulsory part of the MBA curriculum. Internship exams are held during the third semester of the programme. However, VTU is not known to provide any internship opportunities through any internship drive.

placement_faqs.question: How are BTech placements at University Visvesvaraya College of Engineering?
placement_faqs.answer: The BTech placements at University Visvesvaraya College of Engineering (UVCE) are quite good. UVCE has a placement rate of 90%, which is one of the highest among engineering colleges in India. More than 98% of students in the ISE and CSE branches get placed in UVCE, and the highest salary package offered in the previous year was 40 LPA. Around 115 companies have visited UVCE so far for the 2023 Batch Students and more than 353 offers have been made to students across various streams.

ranking_section.title: Visvesvaraya Technological University BelgaumNIRF Ranking 2025
ranking_section.description: VTU has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'University' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for VTU indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standards established by the NIRF. I VTU has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'University' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for VTU indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standards established by the NIRF. It has been seen that in the 'University' category, the institute's ranks have shown a decreasing trend when evaluated against the ranking of the prior year. In 2025, VTU fell 26 ranks to #101 rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has slipped in the rankings. It has been seen that within the category of 'Engineering' , the institute's ranking has fallen when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, VTU fell 82 ranks to #151 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has slipped in the rankings. The institute has displayed a decreasing trend in the 'State Public University' category when compared with the ranking of preceding years. In 2025, VTU fell 28 ranks to #50 rank in the 'State Public University' category by the NIRF ranking. Explore the most recent rankings from other ranking bodies and their respective categories below. According to the NIRF ranking 2025, VTU received #101-150 rank in the 'University' category. It holds a comparable status to the most prestigious universities such as Annamalai University Chidambaram, and Ashoka University Sonipat for NIRF rankings under the 'University' category. college_info.college_name: YCCE: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary:
Located in Nagpur, Maharashtra, Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha, commonly known as YCCE, was established in 1984. Founded as a private institute, Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha has received approvals and recognitions from nationally-renowned institution such as AICTE. The Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha provides UG and PG in Full Time mode. YCCE has 35 courses available for students including specialisations in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Communications Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Power Engineering and Structural Engineering.
As per the official website of YCCE, it offers B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM as courses. These programmes are available across various streams such as Engineering and Accounting & Commerce. The YCCE course fee ranges from INR 2,27,826 to 5,56,524. The total annual seat intake is 2234. As per the Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha placement statistics, the average median package offered to students is INR 4,82,353.
