reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In YCCE, around 70–80% of students get placed every year with high packages in renowned companies. The highest package is around 25 LPA, and the average package is around 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies in YCCE include TCS, Infosys, Persistent, ZOHO, and Capgemini. All students get internships in their final year of college. Companies offer entry-level roles to freshers and newly joined trainees.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides all necessary facilities, including Wi-Fi, smart boards, projectors, water filters, and clean washrooms. The hostel facility is very good, but very costly. The food quality is also good. There is a medical team for students. Sports tournaments are held every year in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are helpful and friendly. They are well qualified. The teaching quality is also good. The course curriculum is relevant to make students industry-ready. They train students for placements. The end-of-semester exams are very difficult compared to other exams. Around 40% marks are required to pass the semester.
detailed_review.Other: I like the course because I come from a tech-related family, and I also have an interest in technology, so I chose this course. The college should focus on technical teaching rather than a traditional teaching style. Events are organized every year in the college, including Yash and Techfests. Students get various scholarships from the government and private companies. Various extra-curricular activities are held in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My honest review of YCCE College.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements at YCCE College are overall good for CS/IT branches. Around 70-80% of students get placed every year in campus recruitment in various big companies. The companies that offer placements are Microsoft, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Persistent, etc. The highest package at the college is about 24 LPA, and the average package is around 5 LPA, which is good compared to other colleges in Nagpur. The same companies also offer internships to students. By the 7th semester, students are eligible for the campus recruitment process. The companies offer entry-level roles to freshers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms have smartboards and projectors for teaching purposes. Labs are overall good. Wi-Fi is available across the college. The library is overall good with lots of books and newspapers. The hostel is average with average food. The college has a sports department that holds sports competitions every year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are very helpful and supportive. They solve students’ doubts, give guidance, and give time to students. The teaching quality is overall good but needs improvement. Overall, I rate the course curriculum of the college as moderate. It makes students industry-ready, but not all. The semester exams are much more difficult compared to the internal exams. The passing percentage depends on the student because there is relative grading.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have an interest in the technical field and programming. The best thing about my course and branch is that it gives lots of technology knowledge. It makes students industry-ready and offers jobs. The college focuses on more practical teaching rather than just teaching students for exams. There are two big events every year. One is YASH, a cultural event, and the other is TECHFEST, which is a technical event.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and facilities. Teachers are very nice and qualified in their work.

detailed_review.Placements: Very good placement ratio. The average package for placements is 4.5 LPA. Approximately 70% of students are selected for the internship programme on the campus and outside the campus. Top recruiting companies such as LG, Bosch, Siemens, etc., came for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a very good Wi-Fi facility in the department. Labs are equipped with the latest technology equipment. Classrooms are very clean. Also, very big classrooms. There is also a very nice library environment, nice and silent. Best for studies. Canteen food is also cheap and has great taste.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and knowledgeable, and overall, teaching is excellent. Through the internship programme and curricular activities, students are industry-ready. The semester exams ensure that students will be industry-ready with practical and written exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: All About Ycce and my experience.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements highly depend on skills and CGPA. The percentage of students getting placed in every department is almost 30 to 40%. If you have skills and temperament, you can grab big placement opportunities.  They also show the placement statistics, and as per those, last year the placements were really good. Talking about my department, the placements are always good and the highest in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good, the college provides a hostel for outsiders with good food and rooms. The campus is green and mainly contains water coolers on every floor also, the college canteen is good, the food is good, and the roads are very good in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. Except for some faculty members, others are very good. The exam curriculum is the best in our college. We have the semester pattern like every other college in Nagpur. The exams are conducted in 2 midterms and 1 end sem exam pattern. The mid sem exams are held on the first half and second half of the syllabus, respectively, and the end sem exam is on the complete syllabus. The faculty members are really helpful during exam times, and the college also provides preparation leave for studying for the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Crowd is good. None here feels like a stranger, we are bonded together by the ycce bond. The college organized fests, competitions, and programs that create a bond between the students from different sections.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Teachers are very strict with paper checking.

detailed_review.Placements: I am a student of the batch 2021-2025 and 85 percent of students got placed. It is a popular college in Nagpur for placements compared to other colleges, with an average package of 3.5 LPA, which is good for freshers. If you are skilled, you can get up to 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Great infrastructure and management. The quality of the hostel is good, but it is very expensive, and the canteen is also clean. Overall, everything is good and nice. I recommend that you take admission if you are serious.
detailed_review.Faculty: Supportive staff, but they are strict in paper checking, and the student section is very rude. Overall, it's a good scholarship section, though they can be a bit rude in communication. Still they do provide feedback for each section to make changes and improvements, which is a good thing.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, its a good college if you are living near it and average placements.

detailed_review.Placements: My branch was introduced 4 years before I joined, so the placements of CSE branch will be this year. But according to college information out of 120 students, 109 got placed. Top companies are Infosys, TCS, Adani Group, Mahindra, and many local companies. Internships are provided to all students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is present all over campus. Classrooms are in good condition. Library is well maintained. I don't know about the hostel that much. There is no ground in the college. But many clubs are present in the college. Recruitment is pretty good too. Canteen has good food, and prices are decent too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers have good way of teaching and some we don't understand. I am taking about first year related to my branch the only subjects, and others like physics, chemistry, B. Com that's why I don't understand. I don't know about the 2 years so you need to find it. Semester exams are easy.
detailed_review.Other: Some events are pretty good, and the main event Yash is pretty good too.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best college in Nagpur.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 80% of students are placed during placement campus drives. The highest package is 6 LPA, and the lowest average is 4 LPA. Some top recruiters are Cognizant, Accenture, Capgemini, etc. All the students got internships from college as well as from outside.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many facilities available on campus regarding your branches. Labs are available anytime with experienced lab assistants. Wi-Fi, libraries, etc., are available. Hostel facilities are also excellent with neat and clean campus. The food quality is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful and cooperative. They are highly qualified like PhDs and have deep knowledge of their particular subjects. The academic curriculum is also well-designed which covers all the important topics and makes students industry-ready. The exams are not that difficult if you prepare well for the exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Industrial IoT
reviews.review_title: Great placements for the batch of 2025, facilities can be improved.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 45% of students get placed via the college placement drive. The highest package that the batch of 2025 gets an offer letter for is 9.5 LPA, with the average standing at 3.5 LPA. Most of students even get internships with the help of the college training and placement cell.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are newly built labs at the college, designed specifically for the new branches, with updated systems and software that help provide a better hands-on experience for all the emerging technologies. The quality of food available is good, and there are two canteens present on the YCCE campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful, students can go to them for anything, for academic help or rather that extracurricular activities. Every faculty member has their own method of teaching that is unique and resourceful in its own way. They have years of experience that are reflected in their style of teaching.
detailed_review.Other: IoT is one of the most booming sectors right now, which makes me choose it as my field of work. It would be better if the college takes us to industries that are currently working in this field, to give us a better understanding of how IoT actually works in the industrial sector.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Good in infrastructure and placements, teaching is really good.

detailed_review.Placements: In the IT branch, a total of 70 to 80 students were placed in 2023. The highest package was about 18 LPA and the lowest was about 5 LPA. Recruitment was conducted by big companies like Wipro, Meesho, and others like Microsoft. Internships were average, like 70-80% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college facilities are great. There is a free Wi-Fi throughout the campus. Infrastructure is good. There are 3 canteens, of which 2 serve good food, taste is also good, and prices are moderate. Sports grounds are available and have a medical center, Datta Meghe.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are really helpful and supportive. I'm telling this from my personal experience. The quality of teaching is best, some teachers teach the best ever. The course does not make you industry-ready. You have to take other classes also for that. The semester exams are hard, but mid-semester exams are easy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering(Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: About Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha.

detailed_review.Placements: YCCE offers the best placements among the most other colleges in Nagpur. The average package offered ranges from 4-5 LPA. A lot of students are able to get placements from the campus only. The package is not so high, but it still might be a good start.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are just okay. Labs need improvement. But the college provides a library. Wi-Fi is also provided, but the speed is not so good. There are canteens in the college, though the price is pretty high. Labs are recently equipped with smart boards.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are good while some are not. We cannot understand some teachers and their doubt clearing is also not so good. We are from the teaching field, but our course lacks practical learning and application. Mid-semester exams are of decent level but compared to them end-semester exams are quite harder. The pass marks required are a minimum of 10 marks in end-semester exams and 40 in total.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest. The course should focus more on practical learning and its application. The campus hosts various fests and events. It has a lot of crowd.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagar Yuwak Shikshan Sanstha.

detailed_review.Placements: 75.9% of students secured placements. The average package is 6 LPA and the highest package is 25 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Adani Group, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and JSW Group visit the college for placements. Top roles offered are graduate engineer trainee, software developer, analyst, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are specialised labs to prove hands-on experience in areas like power electronics, power systems, etc. Classroom. Modern classrooms are designed to facilitate effective learning here. It has Wi-Fi connectivity. The campus offers Wi-Fi access. It also has a library.
detailed_review.Faculty: The level of semester exams and the overall pass percentage of YCCE are not readily available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering (Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: A decent college with a good crowd, placements, faculty, and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 90% of students get placed in our college. Many students get selected in many reputed companies like Infosys, Mahindra, Tata, and many other good companies. The good thing about the college is its good placement opportunities which makes this college good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our hostel is very good. It has a good Wi-Fi connection. We have a good water facility. Rooms are good. There is a playground where we can play. There are sports such as basketball and cricket with good facilities. There is a good crowd. This college is decent. It has a lot of opportunities for sports. Tech fests are held in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are conducted in a proper manner. There are strict rules for cheaters. We have MSE 1, MSE 2 and an ESE exam from where they evaluate our marks. Exams here are conducted on a decent level, which makes the exam level moderate. ESE exams are relatively harder than the MSE exam.
detailed_review.Other: My course is mechanical. It is a core branch. The best thing about the course is that it has a wide variety of subjects and good teachers. We have a fest also called Yash. The crowd here is good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is a good experience and many companies visit here for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, around 80% of students got placed in the mechanical department. This year, around 90% of students got placed. The average salary package offered is around 4 LPA - 5 LPA. Recruiting companies are Adani, TCS, Infosys, Mahindra, Deloitte, etc. Many companies visited this year. The number of recruiting companies is also increasing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. We have well-maintained classrooms. There is a projector in every class. We have a big library. There are 2,00,000 books in the library digital library. Our college provides very good hostel facilities. The hostel is named Shivneri. It has a good mess.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are very helpful teachers. All faculty members are with students. They are Ph.D. holders and have a lot of experience in teaching students. They conduct regular assignments and homework. The overall education department is good in our college. Semester exams are moderate and mostly related to our mechanical.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course in this college because they have separate buildings for every task. There is a cap shop and a separate building for the mechanical department. We have good greenery. Campus activities like debate competitions, etc., are held regularly. Around 50% of scholarships are provided to OBC students. Yash fest is held here. There are not many activities. For the overall growth, these are sufficient.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is not much satisfying but it's okay. Good placement in 2024 Delhi.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, around 70% of students got placed in the mechanical department. This year, around 80% of students got placed. The average salary package offered is around 3 LPA - 4 LPA. There are companies like TCS, Infosys, Mahindra, and other companies. There are a lot of companies coming this year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good and new. We get well-maintained classrooms with projectors. There is a big library with Wi-Fi. It has around 2,00,000 books. The Wi-Fi speed is very good. There are two canteens. The food is very good in every canteen. Hostel facilities are also fine.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are very difficult. There are 2 two unit tests. They are quite difficult. Teachers should be nice. All are Ph.D. holders. They have a lot of experience in teaching students. Regular assignments and homework are provided. The cost of the education department is good in our college.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college for the betterment of my future. There is no better thing about mechanical. Events like Yash, etc., are held. The campus and the crowd are also fine. There are extracurricular activities like LLC. Scholarships are given to all on the basis of maritime rank. The government scholarship is also allotted.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good College for Good Students.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is normal, average package is 4.5 LPA, and the highest is above 10 LPA. It all depends on your skill, so study well and gain experience, then you will definitely get a good placement. All types of companies visit this college. You have to maintain your CGPA at approximately 7.5 to be eligible for a job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good, every classroom has good infrastructure, but it can also vary from branch to branch. In classrooms, there are at least 5 fans minimum, long classrooms, and the auditorium is also inside the college. The canteen is also good, with 2 canteens within the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are 3 exams taken in the semester: mid-semester 1, mid-semester 2, and the end-semester exam. There are internal marks also considered here. The checking is strict, and the rules are strict, so be careful about that. Teachers will finish their syllabus as soon as possible.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Mostly all students get their placement, and the highest package is 6-7 LPA. The lowest package is 4 LPA, and the average package is 5-5.50 LPA. Top core and IT companies visit the campus, and most students get internships in renowned companies and organizations.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In the college, the infrastructure provides all the facilities available on campus for the students, with a good Wi-Fi network inside the departments and campus area. A big library is also available for students with most of the books from great authors. Yes, there is a college hostel for students with all facilities and amenities.
detailed_review.Faculty: In all the departments, the faculty are well-educated and qualified with great teaching experience. The curriculum is also the best and new as per the new technology. Easy patterns are there for semester exams. Yes, the curriculum is best suited for industrial technology and includes all good syllabus content.
detailed_review.Other: The college has a Techfest every year with particular departments and an annual cultural fest, YASH.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the Best Colleges in Central India.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good, as many companies visited this year for on-campus placements, and many students got placements in big tech companies and also in core companies. In YCCE, you can see both core companies and software companies, as well as startups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good. YCCE has many labs and a big library in which you can find various books. Wi-Fi facilities are available all over the campus. Classrooms and labs are well-equipped and well-furnished. We have lifts, water coolers, and many other facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are the best and most supportive. They will support you in all situations and with all your difficulties, whether it's related to academics or personal issues. Exams are held every semester; we have one-semester exam and two mid-semester exams. The weightage is 20 marks for Teacher's Assessment (TA), 30 marks for both mid-semesters and 50 marks for the end-semester exam for each subject.
detailed_review.Other: I found this course to be up to my expectations, and the college is also the best in the Nagpur region.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Strong infrastructure and placements, but the curriculum needs to be updated.

detailed_review.Placements: Computer Technology is one of the engineering courses offered by Nagpur's Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering. Placement details for this course are as follows. According to placement statistics, in 2023, around 80% of B.Tech students secured employment. The highest salary package offered was 18 LPA. The average salary package offered was 4.5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: YCCE offers a range of facilities to support students in the Computer Technology department and enhance their overall campus experience. Laboratories include SE and project labs, web tech labs, and PG programming labs. There is good connectivity of Wi-Fi with high-speed internet available 24/7.
detailed_review.Faculty: YCCE is known for its qualified faculty, relevant curriculum, and examinations. Almost all faculty members hold Ph.D. degrees. They are very helpful to students. All faculty at YCCE are experts in their respective fields. Regarding the curriculum design, it covers all the fields related to current industry standards.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am very passionate about technology, and my desire to build a career in IT because it aligns with current industry demands. The best part is the practical exposure, and the faculty are experts in their respective fields.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the college as I placed in a good company.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% approximately students are placed in ME in YCCE. The lowest package is of 2.5 LPA and the highest package is of 9 LPA. Top recruitment companies are JSW, TASL, Mahindra, etc. 100% students got internship opportunities. Top roles include GET position and Associate Engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: YCCE college has a campus area of 70 acres which comprises of various department buildings. The library is big and contains various books from diverse areas. On-campus Wi-Fi is available for students and teachers. The lab has computers, Wi-Fi, scanners, printers, fans, and coolers. The hostel includes facilities like food, gym, sports activities area, Wi-Fi connections, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers of YCCE college are well experienced with past work experience in the industry. It helps students to get theoretical knowledge with practical application. Teachers mentor students personally about career opportunities. Semester exams are based on what professors teach in class, so they are moderately easy.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best college of my life .

detailed_review.Placements: Students become eligible for placement during the last year of their course, but they cannot start working until the last semester. The last semester has a non-technical curriculum meant for research work, which is mandatory for all. Even companies like Google come to Amity. Multiple companies, such as HCL, Trivium, IMARC, etc., came for placements. The average package for the course is INR 240,000. 10% of students got placed in my course with campus placement. My plans are to work now.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everyone gets a good room along with shared washrooms (the room has a bed, mattress, cupboard, table, and bookcase provided for all students) - you get to choose your own wingmates during the 2nd year. The hostel fee is 54K per year, and along with that, you pay a mess fee between 4-5K per month.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum includes all real-life case studies, so it is easy to see the real application of the law. I think they do not require much improvement because they keep improving themselves every year. There is a semester system, and exams are held twice every year. Generally, they teach you for four months, and then there will be an exam. The level of the exam is so good that if you get 70%, you will be the topper of the course.

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

highlights.summary:
Aditya Institute of Technology and Management is ranked 98th by Times 2023 under the Engineering (Private) category, 101 by Times 2023 under the Engineering category, and 240 by India Today 2023 under the Engineering (Private) category. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management is spread across 50 acre of land. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management, through 10 departments, offers UG, PG, and diploma courses to students. These courses are provided across Engineering, Management, and various other streams. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management was established in 2001 and is accredited with A+ Grade by NAAC. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management is affiliated with the JNTU Kakinada. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management offers placement assistance to students. The college is approved by AICTE.
Aditya Institute of Technology and Management is visited by top companies such as Wipro, DXC Technology and HCL Technologies, among many others. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management has 239 faculty members. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management has collaborated with various companies and organisations. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management provides scholarships to students as financial assistance. Aditya Institute of Technology and Management offers BTech and MBA as flagship courses. Located in Andhra Pradesh, this reputed college is known for its state-of-the-art infrastructure. The major highlights of Aditya Institute of Technology and Management are tabulated below:

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: You will definitely be satisfied.

detailed_review.Placements: 95% of students are placed in Infosys and Wipro with minimum package of 4 LPA, and maximum of 10 LPA. Internship is also provided by the college to every student, and certificate is also provided. They always choose practical learning over studies, and also help in placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Overall hostel is good, and food is also good. Wi-Fi is also available in the hostel. Some other facilities like washing machines, medical, etc., are available. A fully equipped library is available on the campus. Girls can access library till 7:00 PM, and for boys upto 9.00 PM.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every teacher is so jovial with us and teaches us in a practical way. All labs have full equipment with lab assistants. Coming to semester exams, it's easy to normal. For internal examination, we have to gain 16 marks out of 30, and for internal we need 24 out of 70. All we have to gain is 40 out of 40.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college is good for studying, with infrastructure, and for maintaining hygiene.

detailed_review.Placements: Currently, 80% of students get placed in my course. The highest package is 28 LPA, the lowest package is 3.5 LPA, and the average package is 23 LPA. Recruiting companies include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and L&T. Around 40% of students get internships from my course. Top roles include Developer and Tester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available for my course. Wi-Fi, classrooms, and the library are very good. Hostel facilities are better, and the quality of food in the mess and canteen is good. Medical facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is superb. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are a bit difficult compared to others. The pass percentage in my college is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I am very interested in technical and software-related subjects, which is why I chose this course. The best aspects of my course are that it improves logical and thinking skills. I aim to further improve my technical skills. Events and fests are conducted occasionally.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering

Internships are taken by students themselves, either online or offline. The top roles are developer and testing.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college is overall really good.

detailed_review.Placements: Not bad placements with maximum 60 percent, recent 7 LPA and the lowest 2.5 LPA, top recruiters like Matrix and Infosys, 70 percent of students got placed, and roles like site engineer are offered with canteen prices not bad and college bus facilities good with 50+ buses and drinks at limited price.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Know about that college AITAM.

detailed_review.Placements: In 2024, the members from ECE selected for the placements are maximum 40%. We get companies like HCL, Tech Mahindra, Infosys, Visual Soft, and Innova Solutions. 90% of members have internships as a VLSI engineer, IoT engineer, telecommunication engineer, and software developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and infrastructure are very good. Wi-Fi is also good but sometimes it doesn't work for mobile. The labs are so good, and the equipments are also good. But in some labs, there is not sufficient equipments that will be upgraded. Canteen facility is also good. We have sports periods three times a week.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good, and all are qualified with Ph.D. and very knowledgeable. Teaching quality is also not bad but we have to pay interest. The curriculum is also not bad for us. Semester exams are very difficult. The pass percentage is 40% for every subject.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it for both hardware and software. The fests and events are conducted very well every year, and festivals are also celebrated.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Some faculty members are not bad. But the placements are average.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 100 students are placed in companies from our branch. The highest package is 10.65 LPA, medium package is 6 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.5 LPA. In my opinion, the placement opportunities are average. Top recruiting company is Infosys. 100 students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi has a low signal. Labs are pretty good, and classrooms are little bad. The library is too good. It has AC rooms, and they provide computers for doubt clarification. Medical facilities, sports, and games are pretty good, but the facilities are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are not bad. But some faculty members are too bad. If we give a negative review of the faculty members, then they decrease our entire section's mid-examination marks. Some faculty members are particularly targeted at the students. Some faculty members are good, and they are friendly with the students.
detailed_review.Other: Best thing about our course is that it covers both software core subjects and hardware core subjects. They provide practical knowledge, and we need to improve our course. For the events, fests, and other activities, I will be more satisfied.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The review from the recent pass-out student in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: On average, every year, 40-50% of students from both B.Tech and MBA courses get placed in top MNCs. Around 20% of students get placed in startups and other companies. The package offered is better, and it ranges from 3.6-12 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Infosys, TCS, Accenture, Tech Mahindra, Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is well-designed, and the college environment is excellent. The college management has a separate department for new idea development to help students and upload the idea to the government website, like MSME, for funding.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching is good. Professors come up with advanced PPTs with the help of AI to reach students with better knowledge and for a better understanding of the subject. The course curriculum changes every 2 to 3 years. Subjects are the same, but the syllabus changes. New subjects are added based on technologies and skills required for students. Professors are so good that we can openly speak about our ideas and thoughts. Professors help if our ideas are good and innovative.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Review of Aditya Institute of Technology and Management.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of college students were given located inside the university. The best bundle is set 5 LPA, and the bottom package is 2.5 LPA in our college. Top recruiting organizations for our course are Volta, Tata automobile, and many others. Approximately 50-60% of students were given internships from our route in agencies like Isuzu, Tata automobile, Teach Mahindra, and many others. Pinnacle roles offered are high-quality checking supervisors, dressmaker, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the university plays a critical function in its development, as students are now focusing on the labs, lecture rooms, etc. It also has health and wellness facilities. It has excellent hostel facilities, offers top-notch food to students, and maintains a good environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has exact instructors. They have a robust knowledge of their students and also of individuals. College contributors are very professional and shrewd. The course curriculum is very much beneficial for our graduation. Tests are also very strict and very useful to students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this direction primarily based on my own interest and because of my siblings' experience. I know I will attain an excellent position in my core sector, which can enhance my competencies in keeping with my profession and also my job future. Events organized are very informative and very enjoyable; we enjoy activities very much.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Joining in the college is good, don't expect big placements.

detailed_review.Placements: This year, there are fewer placements. Only small companies are offering low packages, with the highest package being 4.5 LPA, which was obtained by a single person only. All placements are from startup companies only, and bond agreements are required to join these companies. Overall, there's dissatisfaction with the placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good, with new blocks constructed featuring beautiful infrastructures. The library is excellent, offering an abundance of books perfect for studying. The quality of food in the canteen is poor sometimes, though it is good at other times, but sometimes it's the worst. Hostel facilities and hostel food are okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Good and student-friendly faculty is available. The curriculum is so good, and the courses are better. Students are taught to be industry-ready. The pass percentage is 80 to 90%. Semester exams are good, but it depends on students' hard work and concentration.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are conducted, but they are average. Throughout the year, many events are happening for small entertainment.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Maximum students around 80% were placed in different companies. The highest package offered is around 10 LPA and lowest package is around 2 LPA or 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Accenture, etc. Maximum students got internships in different companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are available in our college. College has good internet and has seminar halls with AC. There is a separate library block in our college and have so many books. Those are very helpful for the students and staff to gain knowledge and have different types of text books. Food is good in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful in studies and they are knowledgeable. Teaching quality is good. College is giving real time projects and giving MNC internships for students who have more than 9 CGPA. Semester exams are somewhat easy and I think the pass percentage is 75%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Aditya Institute of Technology and Management.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of students got placed in the college. The highest package is about 5 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA in our college. Top recruiting companies for our course are Volta, Tata Motors, etc. About 50-60% of students got internships from our course in companies like Isuzu, Tata Motors, Tech Mahindra, etc. Top roles offered are quality checking manager, designer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college plays a vital role in the development of the college, as students are now focusing on the labs, classrooms, etc. It also has health and wellness facilities. It has good hostel facilities. It provides top-notch food to students and also maintains a good environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has good teachers. They have a strong knowledge of their students and also of individuals. Faculty members are very skilled and intelligent at that point. The course curriculum is very much helpful to make our graduation. Exams are also very strict and very helpful to students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course based on my own interest and because of my siblings' experience. I know I can achieve a good position in my core sector, which can improve my skills according to my career and also my job future. Events organsied are very informative and very joyful. We enjoy events very much.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College culture is good and good atmosphere.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students got placed from ECE course. The highest package is about 10 LPA and the lowest is about 2 LPA or 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys and TCS. The maximum percentage of students got internships from CSE course in TCS. Top role offered is software engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good facilities and infrastructure available in our college, and every branch is Wi-Fi enabled and good labs are available. Classrooms are very clean. The quality of food is good and there are different types of sports available in college, like a throwball court, kabbadi, cricket, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in terms of education. Teachers are well-trained. Teaching quality is too good and course curriculum is relevant and giving real time projects and semester exams are somewhat easy and sometimes though. I think passing marks are around 21.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements, decent infrastructure, supportive faculty, and growing opportunities for tech.

detailed_review.Placements: I'm a B.Teach CSE student at AITAM currently in 2nd sem. In the recent batch, 75% of students got placed. The highest package offered is 10 LPA, the lowest is 3 LPA, and the average is 4.5 LPA. Top recruiters are TCS, Infosys, and Wipro. 60% of students got internships in TCS and startups. Roles offered are as a developer, QA, and data analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: AITAM CSE department has good Wi-Fi, modern labs, smart classrooms & a rich library. Hostels are decent, and food in the mess is average but hygienic. Canteen is better. Medical room is available. There are good sports facilities with regular events for games & fitness and good drinking water facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at AITAM are helpful, qualified, and supportive. The curriculum is mostly relevant with some industry exposure. Semester exams are moderately difficult. With regular study, most students pass. The pass percentage is around 85-90%, and it is easy to pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B.Tech CSE at AITAM due to my interest in tech and coding. The best things are practical learning, coding culture, and placement support. The college needs improvement in providing more industry projects, and updated tools. Campus hosts fests, tech events, has a decent crowd, and good scholarships. Connectivity is fair and the surroundings are peaceful. Extracurriculars like clubs and sports are encouraged.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because faculty and placements are increasing every year.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of students get placed in different companies like TCS, Cognizant, Accenture, and Wipro. The highest package is about 10 LPA, and some students also got 10.5 LPA. The lowest package is about 3 LPA, and the average package is about 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies include Infosys, TCS, and Wipro. 60-90% of students get internships at Accenture.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities like the Internet are available in the college, which has different branches. It also has health and wellness and hostels for both boys and girls. Sports like indoor and outdoor games. Indoor games like chess and the gym are available, while outdoor sports like cricket, kho-kho, and volleyball. The food in the hostel has a good taste.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is good, and teachers help with doubts. They are very well-behaved. The course is curriculum-relevant and provides real-time projects from the 3rd year onwards. Hackathons are also conducted at our Aditya Institute of Technology and Management College.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to gain more skills and efficient. Events happen every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure, facilities, and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students are placed. The highest package offered is around 10 LPA, while the lowest package is around 3 LPA. Companies such as Capgemini and Infosys are among the top recruiters. They offer a top roles in Information Technology, which typically include positions like Software Developer/Engineer, Data Analyst/Data Scientist, Web Developer Frontend/Backend/Full Stack, Cloud Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Cybersecurity Analyst, IT Support/Systems Administration, Network Engineer, Database Administrator, and Business Analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The department offers well-equipped computer labs with high-speed internet, modern classrooms with smart boards, and campus-wide Wi-Fi access. The library is well-stocked with technical books, journals, and online resources. Overall, the infrastructure effectively supports learning and research.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are highly qualified and well-researched, and faculty members are friendly. The semester exams are a little bit hard, but the pass percentage is almost 80–90%. The course curriculum covers fundamentals well and includes emerging technologies like cloud computing and data science, which are industry-relevant. However, it could be more hands-on with practical projects and updated tools to fully prepare students for real-world IT roles.
detailed_review.Other: Information Technology offers many best things, so we chose this field. We are improving and learning programming and web development, and events are conducted perfectly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of the good quality of education and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, around 70 to 90% of students are placed in different companies. The highest package is around 8 LPA, and the average package is around 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies such as Accenture, TCS, and HCL Technologies. 70 to 90% of students get internships in Infosys and Wipro in software development and data analytics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure like the academic block, library, laboratories, and hostels. Dining facilities like boys and girls hostels provide internet connections. The food quality in the mess and the canteen provides vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. Separate medical facilities and outdoor and indoor sports are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty have very good knowledge and skills in their courses and explain very well to students. The teaching quality is very good. The relevance of the curriculum is industry-aligned with a practical focus and development of soft skills. The semester exams are a little tough but not too much tough. The pass percentage is 75%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to increase my skills and knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and I'm dissatisfied with placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Our top recruiters are TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Accenture, Deloitte, and some startups. Very few percent of our course students are placed on campus drive. The highest package offered for our college is 9 LPA-10 LPA while the average package is 5 LPA-6 LPA and the lowest is 3 LPA-4 LPA. Most computer science students in this current year are opting to do global certification from Service Now and AWS while the rest are applying for IIT summer internships and some for Accenture and Deloitte.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is providing an open Wi-Fi for everyone. We have air-conditioned labs and good classroom atmosphere. My college have 2 2-floor library with a discussion room, Wi-Fi, and also a lab in library. Food is not upto the mark in college hostels but from canteen we can say it is good. We have sickroom which can accomadate upto 6 to 7 persons. Our college has basketball, football courts, and a very amazing cricket pitch.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful most of the time, and most of them finished M.Tech and Ph.D. Teaching quality is good. Course curriculum is relevant and makes students good at theory but it may not be technically perfect. When it comes to mid-term exams we can attend them but the semester is difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as this field is blooming in the technical world outside. I want my college to give me more time for technical skills. We have the Sankranthi event, technical fest, and cultural fest in January and March every year. Our college has an NCC domain.

faqs.question: What entrance exam scores are accepted by Aditya Institute of Technology and Management for admission?
faqs.answer: Aditya Institute of Technology and Management admissions accepts entrance exams for BTech, MBA and M.Tech courses. The 70% seats are filled through various state-level entrance exams. Check below the list of accepted entrance exams for AITAM UG & PG courses: EAMCET ICET

faqs.question: How to get admission to Aditya Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: To get admission to AITAM UG & PG courses, candidates must go through a multi-level admission process. The college offers admissions based on several state-level entrance exams for respective courses. However, direct admissions are valid through Management quota for 30% seats. Check below the course-wise eligibility and selection criteria for AITAM course admissions: 70% seats- EAMCET 30% seats- Guidelines stipulated by APSCHE, Guntur 70% seats- ICET 30% seats- Through Management quota 70% seats- GATE/PGECET 30% seats- Through Management quota

faqs.question: What is the fee for UG & PG courses at Aditya Institute of Technology and Management?
faqs.answer: Aditya Institute of Technology and Management fees for various UG & PG courses range between INR 1.2 Lacs to INR 8.1 lakh. The lowest fee is given for M.Tech course, whereas the highest fee is for BTech programme. Candidates must pay for various components as part of the AITAM fee structure. It includes Tuition Fee, Hostel Fee, Application Fee and more. Check below the Aditya Institute of Technology and Management tuition fee for top courses:

faqs.question: How can I get admission to BTech at AITAM?
faqs.answer: There are two ways to get admission to BTech at AITAM. Admissions are both merit and entrance-based. Candidates who passed Class 12 in the relevant stream are eligible to apply for the BTech course. As per the admission process,  a total of 70% seats are offered based on EAMCET exam scores. However,  30% seats are granted through Management quota by the guidelines stipulated by APSCHE, Guntur.

faqs.question: Which BTech specialisation does AITAM offer?
faqs.answer: AITAM offers a four-year BTech course across eight specialisations. The total seat intake for these specialisations is 1,200. Listed below are all BTech specialusations offered at AITAM:

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for AITAM BTech in 2025?
faqs.answer: The selection criteria for AITAM BTech is based on the scorecard of JEE Main, Andhra Pradesh EAMCET, Andhra Pradesh ECET. The admission process is completely online. Candidates can apply by visiting the official website of the institute. Foremost, candidates need to fulfill AITAM BTech eligibility criteria to be considered for admissions.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to MBA at AITAM?
faqs.answer: Aditya Institute of Technology and Management admission to MBA is both merit and entrance-based. The college offers direct admission to candidates through Management quota. Whereas, the college also accepts scores of ICET for entrance-based admissions.

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at AITAM?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for MBA at AITAM is INR 1.3 lakh . Apart from the tuition fee, candidates must also pay for components such as Hostel Fee, Application Fee, etc. However, t his information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What are the different stages of AITAM MBA admission process in 2025?
faqs.answer: AITAM MBA selection process is entirely entrance-based. Candidates can register for AITAM MBA programme on the official university website. Then, candidates are shortlisted based on their Andhra Pradesh ICET scores. Once candidates are allotted a seat, they must pay the first-year tuition fee of around INR 83,200. Fee payment is an important step to secure the seat. The admission process concludes with an orientation session before classes begin in August.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for AITAM MBA programme in 2025?
faqs.answer: The selection criteria for AITAM MBA programme in 2025 is based on both merit and management quota.  On the basis of merit, students are admitted through the AP ICET scorecard. Around 70% of the seats are filled through merit and the rest 70% is done through management quota. Students are advised to score high marks in entrance so that they get prefrence in the final merit list.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Check out the below video for more information:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The central library has a wide collection of over 42,495 books, 3149 CD's and cassettes and several national and international periodicals.The library also provides access to a wide range of electronic and print resources.The books are classified and arranged according to the Dewey Decimal Classification (DDC) scheme and “Open Access” system is followed . The Library has a computerized Catalogue. Books are issued to students and staff with bar-coding system.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: AITAM has a Canteen with good facilities. Tiffins, snacks, tea and lunch will available here. Foods provided in our canteen will be tasty as it is the same food prepared for hostels too. Both vegetarian and Non-vegetarian items are available in canteen. All varieties of cool drinks will be available in our canteen.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Separate hostel facility is available for both boys and girls.There are two boys hostels and two girls hostels. Each hostel is having a telephone, T.V., internet facility, sports items, water coolers, water heaters and well equipped mess facilities. All the hostels provide independent mess facility and serve both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: AITAM has its own fleet of buses being run for the conveyance of day-scholars from Srikakulam, Tekkali, Palasa, Amadalavalasa, Singupuram, Komanapalli, Pathapatnam, Rajam, Narasannapeta, Parlakimudi, Sompeta and Palakonda.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 347 published reviews , 284 reviews are verified.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Aditya Institute of Technology and Management

likes.text: Top recruiting companies for our college are TCS, HCL, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini and almost all MNCs.
In our college, the placement opportunities are very good, and most of the people get placed every year in the topmost companies from all the branches.

likes.text: Our college provides good Wi-Fi, labs, excellent classrooms, library, and quality facilities in our hostel.
The hostel facilities are good, the food is good at both mess and canteen, we have a nice ground.

likes.text: Teachers are friendly, helpful, and highly qualified with the highest degrees like Ph.D, and M.Tech. The quality of teaching is admirable.
This course curriculum is relevant and this makes the students to get ready for industry with the help of student activity centre and training and placement cell.
